Kuko akameremere kifuza ivyo Mpwemu yanka, kandi Mpwemu yifuza ivyo akameremere kanka. Kuko ivyo bihiganwa, ngo ntimukore ivyo mugomba.
Ariko namba murongorwa na Mpwemu, ntimuganzwa n'ivyagezwe.
Kandi ibikorwa vy'akameremere kacu biramenyekana, n'ibi: ubusambanyi, ibihumanya, ivyo isoni nke,
gusenga ibigirwamana, uburozi, ubwansi, intonganya, ishari, ishavu, ikeba, kwitandukanya, ibice,
igono, kuborerwa, kudandahirwa, n'ibindi bene ivyo. Ivyo ndabibaburiye, nk'uko nabibaburiye kera, yuko abakora ibisa bityo batazoragwa ubwami bw' Imana.
Ariko ivyo Mpwemu yama ni: urukundo, umunezero, amahoro, ukwihangana, kugira neza, ingeso nziza, kuba umwizigirwa,
ubugwaneza, ukwirinda. Ibimeze bityo nta vyagezwe bibibuza.
Kandi aba Kristo Yesu babambanye akameremere kabo n'ivyo gahahamiye n'ivyo kifuza.
Namba tubeshwaho na Mpwemu, tuyoborwe na Mpwemu.
Ntitwifate uko tutari, ngo twandurutsanye, tugiriranire ishari
Bavukanyi, umuntu n'iyo yobonekako icaha, mwebwe abo impwemu mutunganye uwumeze atyo, mumuhanurishe umutima w'ubugwaneza. Kandi wiyubare ubwawe, nawe nyene ntiwoshwe nabi.
Mwakirane imitwaro, mushikane mutyo ivyagezwe na Kristo.
Umuntu ni yiyumvira ko ari agakomeye, kandi ata co amaze, aribesha.
Ariko umuntu wese asuzume igikorwa ciwe, ni ho azobona ico yirata ku mutumba wiwe bwite, atari kubwo uwundi.
Kuko umuntu wese azokwiyikorerera uwiwe mutwaro.
Ariko uwigishwa ijambo ry'Imana ahe umwigisha mu vyiza vyose.
Ntimuzimire, Imana yo nticokorwa; kuko ico umuntu abiba cose ari co azokwimbura.
Uwubiba mu buryo bw'umubiri azokwimbura ukubora mu mubiri; ariko uwubiba muri Mpwemu azokwimbura muri Mpwemu ubugingo budashira.
Twame dukora ivyiza, ntiducobogore, kuko igihe ni cashika tuzokwimbura, ni tutarambirwa.
Nuko rero, iyo turonse uburyo, tugirire bose neza, canecane abo inzu y'abizera.
Murabe ingene ndabandikishirije ukuboko kwanje inyuguti nininini.
Abagomba bose kwiha igikundiro ku vyo umubiri ni bo babagobera guhimburwa igikoba c'ubugabo; nta yindi nyanduruko, ni ukugira ngo ntibahamwe bahorwa umusaraba wa Kristo.
Kuko abahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo na bo nyene batitondera ivyagezwe, ariko bashaka ko muhimburwa igikoba c'ubugabo, ngo birate imibiri yanyu.
Ariko jeho sinkirate ikindi, atari umusaraba w'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, watumye isi imbera ikibambwe, nanje isi nkayibera ikibambwe.
Kuko guhimburwa igikoba c'ubugabo ata kimazi, no kudahimburwa igikoba c'ubugabo nta kimazi, ikigira ikimazi ni icaremwe gishasha.
Abazogendera kuri urwo rugezo, amahoro abe muri bo n'ikigongwe, no mu Bisirayeli b' Imana.
Uhereye ubu ntihakagire umuntu angora, kuko mfise ku mubiri inkovu za Yesu.
Bavukanyi, ubuntu bw' Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane n'imitima yanyu. Amina.
Pahulo, nagizwe intumwa ya Kristo Yesu ni uko Imana yabigomvye, ndabandikiye abera bari muri Efeso, b'abizigirwa bo muri Kristo Yesu.
Ubuntu bubabemwo n'amahoro, biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Imana y'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, ari yo Se, iragahezagirwa, yaduhezagiriye imihezagiro yose y'impwemu ahantu ho mw'ijuru muri Kristo.
Nk'uko yadutoranirije muri we, itanguriro ry'isi ritarashirwaho, kugira ngo tube abera tutagira agasembwa imbere yayo, turi mu rukundo.
Kuko yagabiye kera ko duheshwa na Yesu Kristo gucika abana bayo kubwayo, nk'uko yabigomvye bikayihimbara.
Kugira ngo ubwiza bw'ubuntu bwayo yatugabiriye mu wo ikunda bushimwe.
Muri we ni ho duherwa gucungurwa n'amaraso yiwe, ni kwo guharirwa ibicumuro vyacu, nk'uko itunga ry'ubuntu bwayo riri.
Yabudusesekarijemwo mu bwenge bwose no kumenya;
itwatiye ibanga ry'ivyo igomba, nk'uko vyayihimbaye, ivyigiriye imigabo kuva kera muri we,
vy'ingene izogenza vyose, igihe gikwiye gishitse, gukoraniriza vyose muri Kristo, ibiri mw'ijuru n'ibiri mw'isi.
Kuba muri uwo kwaduhesheje gucika ihanga ryayo, twashiriweho kera nk'uko Iyo yabigabiye, ikora vyose nk'uko imigabo yo mu mutima wayo iri;
kuzoba abo guhesha icubahiro ubwiza bwayo, twebwe abizigiye Kristo kera.
Muri we namwe mumaze kwumva ijambo ry'ukuri, ni ryo butumwa bwiza bw'agakiza kanyu, mumaze no kumwizera, ni ho mwashiriweko ikimenyetso, ni co Mpwemu Yera yasezeranywe.
Ni we ngwati y'umwandu tuzohabwa, kugira ngo abo Imana yaronse ibacungure, ngo ubwiza bwayo bushimwe.
Ni co gituma nanje, numvise ukwizera Umwami Yesu kuri muri mwebwe, n'urukundo mukunda abera bose,
ntahengeshanya kubashimira Imana, ndabahoza mu kanwa uko nsenze,
ngo Imana y'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, Data wa twese w'ubwiza, ibahe umutima w'ubwenge no guhishurirwa mu kuyimenya;
ngo amaso y'imitima yanyu yihweze, kugira ngo mumenye ivyo mwizigizwa n'uguhamagara kwayo ivyo ari vyo, mumenye n'itunga ry'ubwiza bw'umugabane ufise mu bera.
Mumenye n'ubwinshi buhebuje bw'ubushobozi bwayo ikoreshereza muri twebwe abizera, nk'uko kwa gukora kw'ububasha bw'ubushobozi bwayo kungana,
ukwo yakoreye muri Kristo, hamwe yamuzura mu bapfuye, ikamuvyagiza i buryo bwayo ahantu ho mw'ijuru,
imushize hejuru cane y'ubukuru bwose, ububasha bwose, ubushobozi bwose, ubwami bwose n'izina ryose rivugwa, si muri iki gihe gusa, ariko no mu kizoza.
Kandi yamushikirije vyose, ibishira musi y'ibirenge vyiwe, kandi imuha ishengero ngo abe umutwe waryo wo gusumba vyose,
ni ryo mubiri wiwe w'ubwuzure, bwuzuza vyose vy'ahantu hose.
Namwe yarabagize bazima, hamwe mwari mupfuye mwishwe n'ibigabitanyo n'ivyaha vyanyu,
ivyo mwagenderamwo kera, nk'uko ivyo iyi si bigenda, mwumvira umwami w'abaganza ikirere, ni we mpwemu ikorera mu bantu b'intabarirwa.
Kandi natwe twese twahora muri bo kera mu kwifuza kw'imibiri yacu, tugakora ivyo imibiri n'imitima vyacu bigomba, kandi mu kameremere kacu twari abo kurakirwa, nk'abandi bose.
Ariko Imana, kuko ari umutunzi w'ikigongwe, kubwo urukundo rwayo rwinshi yadukunze,
hamwe twari tugipfuye, twishwe n'ibicumuro vyacu, yatugiranye bazima na Kristo--ubuntu ni bwo bwabakijije—
yatuzuranye na we, itwicarikana na we ahantu ho mw'ijuru, turi muri Kristo Yesu,
kugira ngo mu bihe bizoza izokwerekane itunga rihebuje ry'ubuntu bwayo mu kutugirira neza muri Kristo Yesu.
Ubuntu ni bwo bwabakijije kubwo ukwizera; na vyo nyene ntivyavuye kuri mwebwe, ni ingabire y'Imana;
ntivyavuye ku bikorwa, kugira ngo ntihagire n'umwe yishimagiza.
Kuko turi ibiremwa vyayo, twaremewe muri Kristo Yesu ngo dukore ibikorwa vyiza, ivyo Imana yateguye kera ngo tubigenderemwo.
Nuko mwibuke yuko ubwa mbere, mwebwe abanyamahanga ku rukoba, mwebwe mucitwa abatahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo n'abo bitwa abahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo n'intoke ku mubiri,

ko ico gihe mwari mutandukanye na Kristo, muri n'itandukaniro n'ihanga rya Isirayeli, atasano mufitaniye n'amasezerano y'ivyasezeranywe, ata co mwizigiye ku bizoba, mwari mw'isi mutagira Imana Rurema.
Ariko noneho, kuko muri muri Kristo Yesu, mwebwe abari kure kera mwigijwe hafi n'amaraso ya Kristo.
Ni we mahoro yacu, kuko yahinduye ya macakubiri kuba kimwe, ahomvoye ca gisika co hagati cadutandukanya,
ubwansi amaze kubuhinduza ubusa umubiri wiwe, ni bwo vya vyagezwe birimwo amabwirizwa ava mu vyashinzwe; kugira ngo muri we ya macakubiri ayarememwo umuntu umwe musha, ngo azane amahoro atyo;
kandi ngo ayo macakubiri, amaze kuyagira umubiri umwe, ayuzurishe n'Imana umusaraba, awicishije bwa bwansi.
Yaraje, ababwira ubutumwa bwiza bw'amahoro, mwebwe abari kure. Kandi abari hafi na bo ababwira amahoro.
Kuko, uko twari amoko abiri, ubu ni we adushikiriza Data wa twese, turi muri Mpwemu umwe.
Nuko ntimukiri abashitsi n'abanyamahanga, ariko musangiye ubwoko n'abera, muri abo mu ngoro y'Imana;
kuko mwubatswe ku mabuye y'umushinge, ari yo ntumwa n'abavugishwa n'Imana, Kristo Yesu ari we buye rigumya imfuruka.
Muri we ingoro yose, yubatswe neza, irakura, ngo ibe urusengero rwera mu Mwami wacu.
Muri we namwe murubakanwa, kugira ngo muheshwe na Mpwemu kuba ingoro Imana ibamwo.
Ni co gituma jewe Pahulo, imbohe ya Kristo Yesu, mbohewe mwebwe abanyamahanga,
namba mwarumvise ububwiriza bwa bwa buntu bw'Imana nahawe kubagaburira;
yuko mu guhishurirwa natiwe ibanga, nk'uko nabanje kwandika mu majambo make,
namwe, ni mwayasoma, muzoshobora kubona ingene nzi ibanga rya Kristo.
Ivyo, abana b'abantu ntibabimenyeshejwe mu bindi bihe, nk'uko muri iki gihe intumwa ziwe zera n'abavugishwa na we babihishuriwe na Mpwemu;
yuko abanyamahanga basangiye natwe iragi, basangiye natwe umubiri umwe, basangiye natwe ivyasezeranywe muri Kristo Yesu kubwo ubutumwa bwiza.
Nacitse umukozi wabwo, nk'uko ingabire y'ubuntu bw'Imana iri, nabuhawe, nk'uko ubushobozi bwayo bukora.
Jewe, uwuri mu nyuma y'uwo mu nyuma y'abera bose. Naherewe ubwo buntu kubwira abanyamahanga ubutumwa bwiza bw'itunga rya Kristo ritagira aho riherera,
no guserurira bose ububwiriza bw'ibanga ubwo ari bwo. Ryari rihishijwe, uhereye kera hose, mu Mana Umuremyi wa vyose;
kugira ngo noneho abakuru n'abafise ububasha b'ahantu ho mw'ijuru bamenyere kw'ishengero ubwenge bw'Imana bw'uburyo bwinshi.
Nk'uko imigabo yayo iri, iyo yagabiye uhereye kera hose muri Kristo Yesu Umwami wacu.
Muri we ni ho duherwa ubushizi bw'ubwoba no gushikira Imana tuyizigiye, kubwo kumwizera.
Ni co gituma ndabinginga ngo ntimwihebuzwe n'amarushwa yanje yo kubwanyu, kuko ari yo cubahiro canyu.
Ni co gituma mpfukamira Data wa twese,
uwo imiryango yose yo mw'ijuru n'iyo mw'isi yitirirwa,
ngo abahe, nk'uko itunga ry'ubwiza bwiwe riri, kuremeshwa n'ubushobozi imbere mu mitima mubihawe na Mpwemu wiwe.
Kristo abe mu mitima yanyu kubwo ukwizera; kugira ngo mugize imizi ishinzwe mu rukundo, n'amabuye y'umushinge arwubatswemwo,
mugire inkomezi zibashoboza gutahurira hamwe n'abera bose uburebure bw'ubwaguke, ubwo amakika, ubwo amaja ruguru n'ubwo amajepfo ubwo ari bwo,
mumenye urukundo rwa Kristo ruruta uko rwomenywa; ngo mubone kwuzuzwa mushitse ku kwuzura kw'Imana kwose.
Nuko Iyishobora gukora ibirengeye cane ivyo dusaba n'ivyo twiyumvira vyose, nk'uko ubushobozi bwayo budukoreramwo buri,
icubahiro kibe icayo mw'ishengero no muri Kristo Yesu, kugeza ku buzukuruza bose b'ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Ni co gitumye ndabinginga, jewe imbohe y'Umwami wacu, ngo mugende uko bibereye ihamagarwa mwahamagawe,
mwiyoroheje rwose, mufise ubugwaneza, mwihangana, mubabariranira muri mu rukundo.
Mushishikaye kuzigamisha ubumwe buva kuri Mpwemu umugozi w'amahoro.
Hariho umubiri umwe, na Mpwemu umwe, nk'uko kandi mwahamagariwe icizigiro kimwe c'ihamagarwa ryanyu.
Hariho Umwami umwe, ukwizera kumwe no kubatizwa kumwe.
Hariho n'Imana imwe, ni yo Data wa twese, asumba bose, akoresha bose, ari muri bose.
Ariko umuntu wese muri twebwe yahawe ubuntu, nk'uko tugererwa ingabire ya Kristo.
Ni co gituma ivuga iti: "Yaraduze, aja iyo hejuru, ajanye iminyago, Agabira abantu ingabire."
Ariko iryo jambo ngo Yaraduze, ni ukuvuga iki? Mbega ntiryerekana yuko yabanje kumanuka i kuzimu?
Uwo yamanutse ni we yaduze, aja hejuru y'amajuru yose, kugira ngo anengesere vyose.
Kandi yahaye bamwe kuba intumwa, abandi kuba abavugishwa na we, abandi kuvuga ubutumwa bwiza, abandi kuba abungere n'abigisha,
kugira ngo abera babone gutungana, baheze bakore igikorwa co kugabura ivyo Imana, bubake umubiri wa Kristo;
kugeza aho twese tuzoshikira ku kugiriranira ubumwe buva ku kwizera n'ukumenya Umwana w'Imana, kandi kugeza aho tuzoshikira kuba abantu bakuze, no ku rugezo rw'ubwinshi bw'ukunengesera kwa Kristo;
kugira ngo dushire ubwana, ntituzungazungishwe n'imipfunda, ngo tujanwe irya n'ino n'imiyaga yose y'inyigisho n'ububeshi bw'abantu, n'ubugunge bwabo, n'uburyo bwinshi bwo kutuzimiza.
Ariko tube imvugakuri turi mu rukundo, dukurire muri we muri vyose, ari we mutwe, ni wo Kristo.
Umubiri wiwe wose, uteranijwe neza, ufatanijwe n'ibifashisho vy'ingingo zawo zose, nk'uko igice cose gikora ibango cagerewe, kuri we ni ho uronka gukura kwawo, ukubakwa mu rukundo.
Ni co gituma mvuga ibi, nkabishingira intahe mu Mwami wacu, ngo ntimube mukigenda nk'uko abanyavyaha bagenda, bagendera mu bitagira ikimazi vyo mu bwenge bwabo.
Ivyiyumviro vyabo biri mu mwiza, batandukanijwe n'ubugingo buva ku Mana kubwo ukutamenya kuri muri bo, n'ukudadarara kw'imitima yabo.
Kandi babaye ibitimbe, bishira mu ngeso z'isoni nke, gukora ibihumanya vy'uburyo bwose bifatanije n'ukwifuza.
Ariko mweho ntimwize Kristo mutyo,
namba mwaramwumvise, mukigishirizwa muri we nk'uko ukuri kwo muri Yesu kuri,
kubabwira ku vyo ingeso zanyu za kera ngo mwiyambure wa muntu wa kera, abozwa n'ukwifuza kw'uruhendo;
mugahinduka bashasha mu mpwemu y'ubwenge bwanyu,
mukambara wa muntu mushasha, yaremwe mw'ishusho y'Imana mu kugororoka no mu kwera kw'ukuri.
Maze mwiyambuye ibinyoma, umuntu wese avugane ivyo ukuri n'umubanyi wiwe, kuko turi ingingo z'abandi.
Ni mwaraka ntibibakoreshe icaha. Izuba ntirirenge mukiratse,
kandi ntimuhe wa mugarariji icicaro.
Uwiba ntakongere kwiba, ariko apfume acumukura, akoreshe ayiwe maboko ivyiza, kugira ngo aronke ivyo gufasha uwukenye.
Ntihazogire ibiyago bibi biva mu kanwa kanyu, ariko muvuge ijambo ryiza ryose ryo gukuza uwukwiye kuribwirwa, kugira ngo riheshe abaryumvise ubuntu bw'Imana.
Kandi ntimukababaze Mpwemu w'Imana, yabashiriweko kuba ikimenyetso, gushitsa ku musi wo gucungurwa.
Umururazi wose ukujingitwa, ishavu, gutongana n'ugutukana bibavemwo, hamwe n'inzigo yose.
Mugiriranire neza, mugiriranire imbabazi, muharirane, nk'uko Imana na yo yabahariye muri Kristo.
Nuko mwigane Imana, nk' abana ikunda.
Kandi mugendere mu rukundo, nk'uko Kristo na we yabakunze, akatwigura, akatubera ishikanwa n'ikimazi bihabwa Imana, umubabwe umota neza.
Ariko ubusambanyi n'ibihumanya vyose canke ukwifuza ntimukabishire no mu kanwa, mube nk'uko bibereye abera.
Ibiteye isoni canke amajambo y'ubupfu canke ibitwenza bibi ntibikumvikane muri mwebwe kuko ivyo bitabereye; ikibereye ni ugushima Imana.
Kuko ibi mubizi neza, yuko ata mushakanyi, canke igihumane, canke uwifuza (ni we asenga ibigirwamana), azogira ico aragwa mu bwami bwa Kristo n'Imana.
Ntihakagire umuntu abahendesha amajambo y'ubusa; kuko ivyo ari vyo bizanira ishavu ry'Imana abantu b'intabarirwa.
Nuko ntimugafatanye na bo;
kuko kera mwari umwiza, none mukaba muri umuco mu Mwami wacu. Mugende nk'abana b'umuco,
kuko imbuto y'umuco iboneka mu ngeso nziza zose no mu kugororoka no mu kuri.
Mumenye neza ibihimbara Umwami wacu.
Kandi ntimugafatanye n'ibikorwa vy'imburakimazi vy'umwiza, ariko canecane mubiserure,
kuko ibikorwa na bo mu mpisho biteye isoni no kubivuga.
Ariko vyose, iyo bishizwe ahabona, bigaragazwa n'umuco, kuko ikigaragazwa cose kiri mu muco.
Ni co gituma bivugwa, ngo ikangure, wewe usinziriye, uzuke uve mu bapfuye, Kristo arakumurikira.
Nuko mwirinde cane uburyo mugenda, ntimugende nk'imburabwenge, ariko mugende nk' abanyabwenge.
Akaryo muronse, mugakoresha neza, kuko imisi ari mibi.
Nuko ntimube ibipfu, ariko mutahure ivyo Umwami wacu agomba ivyo ari vyo.
Kandi ntimukaborerwe umuvinyu, urimwo ubuhumbu; ariko mwuzure Mpwemu.
Mubwirane zaburi, indirimbo n'amatazirano y'ivya Mpwemu, muririmba, mucurarangira Umwami wacu mu mitima yanyu.
Imana, Data wa twese, muyishimire vyose imisi yose, mw'izina ry'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Mugamburukanire, kuko mwubashe Kristo.
Bagore, mugamburukire abagabo banyu, nk'uko mugamburukira Umwami wacu.
Kuko umugabo ari we mutwe w'umugore wiwe, nk'uko Kristo na we ari umutwe w'ishengero, akaba Umukiza waryo, ari wo mubiri wiwe.
Ariko nk'uko ishengero rigamburukira Kristo, kube ari ko abagore bagamburukira abagabo babo muri vyose.
Bagabo, mukunde abagore banyu, nk'uko Kristo na we yakunze ishengero, akaryigura,
ngo aryeze, aryogesheje amazi n'ijambo,
maze ngo arirengukane imbere yiwe, ari ishengero rifise ubwiza, ridafise amarabaga canke agatotsi canke ikintu cose gisa gityo, ariko ngo ribe iryera ridafise agasembwa.
Ni ko abagabo na bo bakwiye gukunda abagore babo nk'imibiri yabo bwite. Uwukunda umugore wiwe, aba yikunda,
kuko ata muntu yigeze kwanka umubiri wiwe, ariko arawugaburira, akawubungabunga, nk'uko Kristo na we agirira ishengero.
Kuko turi ingingo z'umubiri wiwe.
Ni co gituma umuntu azosiga se na nyina, akabana n'umugore wiwe ubutakivana, bompi bakaba umubiri umwe.
Iryo banga rirahambaye, ariko ryerekeye kuri Kristo n'ishengero.
Ariko namwe nyene, umuntu wese akunde umugore wiwe nk'uko yikunda; umugore na we ni yubahe umugabo wiwe.
Bana, mwumvire abavyeyi banyu mu Mwami wacu. Kuko ivyo ari vyo bigororotse.
Wubahe so na nyoko; ico ni co cagezwe ca mbere kirimwo isezerano,
kugira ngo uronke amahoro, urambire kw'isi.
Namwe ba se, ntimukaratse abana banyu, ariko mubarere, mubahana mubahanura, uko Umwami wacu agomba.
Bashumba, mwumvire ba shobuja bo ku mubiri, nk'uko mwumvira Kristo, mububashe muhinda agashitsi, mutagira ubupfunya mu mitima yanyu.
Ntimubakorere bakibahagarikiye, nk' abanezereza abantu, ariko mubakorere nk'abashumba ba Kristo, mukora ivyo Imana igomba bivuye ku mutima.
Mubakorere n'umutima ubikunze, nk'abakorera Shobuja mukuru, ntimube nk'abakorera abantu.
Kuko muzi yuko umuntu wese iyo akoze iciza, azocishurwa na Shebuja mukuru, n'iyo yoba umushumba canke uwidegemvya.
Namwe ba shebuja, mubagirire mutyo nyene, mwirinde kubakangisha, kuko muzi yuko Shobuja musangiye ari mw'ijuru, kandi ntarobanura abantu ku butoni.
Ibisigaye, muremesherezwe mu Mwami wacu, no mu bushobozi bwiwe bwinshi.
Mwambare ibirwanisho vyose vy'Imana, kugira ngo mushobore guhagarara mudatsinzwe n'ubugunge bwa wa mugarariji.
Kuko abo tunigana atari abo inyama n'amaraso, ariko tunigana n'abakuru n'abafise ububasha n'abaganza iyi si y'umwiza, n'impwemu mbi z'ahantu ho mw'ijuru.
Kubwo ivyo mwakire ibirwanisho vyose vy'Imana, kugira ngo mushobore kudatsindwa ku musi mubi, kandi ni mwaheza vyose mugahagarara mushikamye.
Nuko rero mushikame, mukenyeje ukuri, mwambaye ukugororoka nk'inkinzo y'icuma ikingira igikiriza.
Mwambaye ibirato ari ivyo mwete w'ubutumwa bwiza bw'amahoro.
Kandi hamwe n'ivyo vyose mwakire inkinzo y'ukwizera, ni yo muzoshoboza kuzimisha imyampi ya wa Mubi yose yaka umuriro.
Mwakire inkofero y'agakiza, bo n'inkota ya Mpwemu, ni yo jambo ry'Imana.
Musengere muri Mpwemu ibihe vyose, mu buryo bwose bwo gusenga no kwinginga, kandi ivyo mubibere maso, mukobeje rwose, musengera abera bose.
Kandi nanje nyene munsengere, kugira ngo mpabwe insiguro uko mvuze kwose, namamaze nshirutse amazinda ibanga ry'ubutumwa bwiza,
kuko ndi intumwa yabwo iboheshejwe umunyororo, nsigure ivyabwo nshize amazinda, nk'uko bimbereye kuvuga.
Kandi Tukiko, umuvukanyi nkunda, umukozi w'umwizigirwa mu vy'Umwami wacu, azobiganira vyose, kugira ngo mumenye ivyanje, uko meze.
Ni we ndabatumyeko kubwo ivyo nyene, ngo mumenye ivyacu, kandi ngo aremeshe imitima yanyu.
Amahoro abe mu bavukanyi, n'urukundo rufatanije n'ukwizera, biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Ubuntu bw'Imana bubane n'abakunda Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bose ata bupfunya. "
Pahulo na Timoteyo, abakozi ba Kristo Yesu, turabandikiye abera bose bo muri Kristo Yesu b'i Filipi, hamwe n'abazezwashengero n'abakozi baryo. "
Ubuntu n'amahoro, biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo bibabemwo.
Nshima Imana yanje, uko ndabibutse kwose.
Kandi uko nsenze kwose ndabasengera mwese nezerewe,
kuko mwafatanije nanje gukwiza ubutumwa bwiza, muhereye ku musi wa mbere, mugashitsa n'ubu.
Kandi ico nizigiye ntakekeranya, ni uko uwatanguye igikorwa ciza muri mwebwe azogiheraheza gushitsa ku musi wa Yesu Kristo.
Nanje birambereye kubiyumvirako gutyo mwese, kuko ndabafise mu mutima, kuko mu ngoyi zanje, no mu gukiranira ubutumwa bwiza no kubutsimbataza, mwese musangiye nanje ubuntu bw'Imana.
Imana ni yo ntanzeko icabona c'ingene ndabagirira igishika mwese, mfise imbabazi za Kristo Yesu. "
Kandi ico nsengera, ni ukugira ngo urukundo rwanyu rugwire rwongerekane mu bwenge no mu kumenya kwose.
Murobanure ibidahwana, muhore mutagira ubupfunya canke ibigwisha gushitsa ku musi wa Kristo,
mwuzuye imbuto zo kugororoka ziheshwa na Yesu Kristo, ngo muheshe Imana icubahiro n'ishimwe.
Bavukanyi, ndagomba ko mumenya yuko ivyambayeko canecane vyashize imbere ubutumwa bwiza.
Bituma iminyororo yanje yo kubwa Kristo imenyekana mu basoda bose bahora bacungera irembo ryo kwa Kayisari, no mu bandi bose.
Kandi abenshi bo mu bavukanyi banje bari mu Mwami wacu, baremeshejwe n'iminyororo yanje, barushiriza gutinyuka kuvuga ijambo ry'Imana bashize amazinda.
Mugabo bamwe ishari n'ibihari ni vyo bibatera kuvuga ivya Kristo; abandi babivugishwa babitumwe n'umutima mwiza.
Abo babivugishwa n'urukundo, kuko bazi ko nashiriweho gukiranira ubutumwa bwiza.
Ba bandi ikeba ni ryo ribatera kuvuga ivya Kristo atari uko bivuye ku mutima, biyumvira ko ari ukwongera kumutoneka mu ngoyi zanje.
Hari ico biriko? Kizima mu buryo bwose, ari mu buryarya ari mu kuri, Kristo avugwa, kandi ivyo ndabinezererewe, kandi nzokwama ndabinezererwa;
kuko nzi yuko ivyo bizomviramwo agakiza, munsengeye kandi mfashijwe na Mpwemu wa Yesu Kristo,

nk'uko niteze cane nkizigira yuko hatazogira ikintu kimaramaza, ariko ko mu bushizi bw'amakenga bwanje bwose Kristo aheshwe icubahiro n'umubiri wanje, nk'uko bihora biba, na none ko ari ko bizoba, naho noba ndiho canke naho noba mpfuye.
Kuko kubwanje kubaho ari Kristo, kandi gupfa ari inyungu.
Ariko namba ari ukubaho mu mubiri, ico kizonyamira imbuto z'igikorwa, kandi sinzi ico mpitamwo.
Ndazazaniwe muri ivyo bibiri, kuko nifuza gutaha ngo mbane na Kristo, kuko ari co kirushirije cane.
Yamara kuguma mu mubiri ni co corushiriza kubagirira ikimazi.
Kandi ko nizigiye ivyo, ndazi neza yuko nzogumaho, nkabana namwe mwese, kugira ngo muje imbere, munezererwe ukwizera;
ngo muzorushirize kunyirata muri Kristo Yesu nsubiye kugaruka i wanyu.

Ariko kimwe gusa, ingeso zanyu zimere nk'uko bibereye ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo, kugira ngo nje kubagendera canke ntaje, numve ivyanyu ko muhagaze mushikamye mufise impwemu imwe, muhuje umutima mu kurwanira ukwizera ubutumwa bwiza,
ko mudakangwa n'abansi ku kintu na kimwe; ico kizobera abo ikimenyetso co guhona, ariko mwebwe ico agakiza, kandi kivuye ku Mana.
Kuko ico mwagabiwe kubwa Kristo, atari ukumwizera gusa, ariko mwagabiwe no kubabazwa kubwiwe;
muri muri ya ntambara mwambonanye kandi iyo munyumvana n'ubu.
Nuko namba hari ukuremeshwa muri Kristo, namba hari ukwirurwa kuva mu rukundo, namba hari ugusangira Mpwemu, namba hari imbabazi n'ikigongwe,
mwuzuze umunezero wanje mwiyumvira kumwe, musangiye urukundo rumwe, muhuje umutima n'inama.
Ntimugire ico mukora kubwo gukebana canke ukwifata uko mutari, ariko mwicishije bugufi, umuntu wese yiyumvire yuko uwundi amuruta,
kandi umuntu wese ntiyiyumvire ivyiwe gusa, ariko yiyumvire n'ivyo abandi.
Mugire wa mutima muri mwebwe wari muri Kristo Yesu.
Uwo, naho yari asanganywe ishusho y'Imana, ntiyiyumviriye yuko kuringanira n'Imana ari ikintu co kwumirako.
Ariko yisiga ubusa, yakira ishusho y'umushumba, acika uwusa n'abantu.
Kandi abonetse afise ishusho nk'iyo umuntu, yicisha bugufi, aragamburuka no gushitsa ku rupfu, kandi urupfu rwo ku musaraba.
Ni co catumye Imana imushira hejuru cane, ikamuha rya zina rirengeye ayandi mazina yose.
Kugira ngo amavi yose azopfukame mw'izina rya Yesu, ayo ivyo mw'ijuru, ayo ivyo kw'isi n'ayo ivyo i kuzimu.
Kandi indimi zose zizokwature yuko Yesu Kristo ari Uhoraho, ngo biheshe Imana Data wa twese icubahiro.
Nuko rero abo nkunda, nk'uko mwamye muganduka mube ari ko mushitsa agakiza kanyu, mutinya muhinda agashitsi, yamara si iyo ndiho gusa, ariko n'ubu nyene naho ntari iyo ni murushirize kugenza gutyo.
Kuko Imana ari yo ikorera mu mitima yanyu, ikabaha gukunda no gukora ibiyihimbara.
Mukore vyose ata kwidodomba, ata guharira,
kugira ngo ntimugire umugayo canke akarohe. Mube abana b'Imana batagira agasembwa, hagati y'abo iki gihe bagoramye ibi vy'uburyo bwose, banduye mukababonekamwo mumeze nk'amatara yakira mw'isi,
mwerekana ijambo ry'ubugingo; kugira ngo mbone ico nzokwirata ku musi wa Kristo, yuko ntirukiye ubusa kandi ntaruhijwe n'ubusa.
Ariko asangwa nkwiye gutangwa ko ikimazi kubwo ukwizera kwanyu no kubwo igikorwa cakwo, ndanezerwa, nezeranwa namwe mwese.
Namwe mube ari ko munezerwa, munezeranwe nanje.
Ariko nizigijwe n'Umwami Yesu yuko nzobatumako Timoteyo vuba, kugira ngo nanje nzoshire umutima hamwe, ni namenya ivyanyu.
Simfise uwundi ari n'umutima nk'uwo uwo, yobabara ivyanyu vy'ukuri.
Kuko bose barondera ivyabo, batarondera ivya Yesu Kristo.
Ariko murazi ingene uwo twagoranywe nka kurya umwana agoranwa na se, ariko twakoranye igikorwa co gukwiza ubutumwa bwiza.
Nuko uwo ni we nizigiye yuko ari we nzoca ndabatumako, aho nzomenyera ibizombako.
Ariko nizigijwe cane n'Umwami wacu yuko nanje nyene nzoza vuba.
Kandi ndabonye yuko bikwiye kubatumako Epafurodito, muvukanyi dufatanije igikorwa n'intambara, ari we ntumwa yanyu inkorera ivyo nkenye;
kuko abagirira igishika mwese, akarandurwa umutima n'uko mwumvise yuko yari arwaye.
Kandi koko yari yararwaye ahakwa guhwera. Ariko Imana imugirira imbabazi, kandi si we wenyene, ni jewe yazigiriye, kugira ngo umubabaro wanje ntiwongerekane.
Ni co gitumye ngira umwete wo kumurungika, kugira ngo ni mwongera kumubona muzonezerwe, nanje nduhuke umubabaro.
Nuko mumwakirane umunezero mwinshi kubwo Umwami wacu; kandi abameze nk'uwo mwame mububaha;
kuko yagarukiye hafi yo gupfa kubwo igikorwa ca Kristo, yahevye amagara yiwe, amfasha ivyo mutari mwaheraheje kumfasha.
Ibisigaye bavukanyi banje, munezererwe mu Mwami wacu. Kubandikira bene ivyo ntikundambira, kandi namwe kurabaremesha.
Mwirinde za mbwa, mwirinde za nkozi z'ibibi, mwirinde bamwe bikebagura.
Kuko tweho turi abahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo, dusenga Imana mu buryo bwa Mpwemu, tukirata Kristo Yesu, ntitwishimire ivyo umubiri;
naho jewe nokwishimiye ivyo umubiri. Hogira uwundi wese yokwiyumvira kwishimira ivyo umubiri, nomurusha.
Nahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo ku musi ugira umunani, ndi uwo mu bwoko bwa Isirayeli, ndi uwo mu muryango wa Benyamini, mu Baheburayo ndi Umuheburayo. Ku vyo gushimikira ivyagezwe, ndi Umufarisayo;
ku vyo ishaka nahama ishengero; ku vyo ukugororoka kuzanwa n'ivyagezwe nta wobonye ico angaya.
Ariko ivyahora bimbera inyungu ndavyiyumvira ko ari ubuhombe kubwa Kristo.

Eka mbere n'ibintu vyose ndavyiyumvira ko ari ubuhombe, kubwo ikibirengeye, ni co kumenya Kristo Yesu Umwami wanje. Kubwo uwo nahomvye ibintu vyose, ndavyiyumvira ko ari ishano, kugira ngo ndonke Kristo,
kandi mboneke ko ndi muri we, ntafise ukwanje kugororoka, kumwe kuva mu vyagezwe, ariko mfise kumwe kuzanwa no kwizera Kristo, ni kwo kugororoka kuva ku Mana, guhabwa uwizeye,
ngo ndamumenye, menye n'ubushobozi bw'ukuzuka kwiwe, n'ugufatanya na we imibabaro yiwe, nshushanywe n'urupfu rwiwe,
ngo kumbure nshike ku kuzuka kw'abapfuye.
Si ukugira ngo mpejeje kubihabwa, canke ngo mpejeje gutunganywa rwose, ariko ndabandanya kugira ngo mbone gufata kimwe catumye nanje ubwanje mfatwa na Kristo Yesu.
Bavukanyi, jeho kubwanje sinibwira yuko maze kugifata, ariko ico nkora ni iki kimwe gusa, nibagira ibiri inyuma, kandi nihutira ibiri imbere,
ndakovya gushika aho dutanguranirwa, ku mpera y'umuhamagaro w'Imana muri Kristo Yesu wo kuja mw'ijuru.
Nuko abatunganijwe uko tungana twiyumvire dutyo; kandi namba hari ico mwiyumvira ukundi, Imana izokibahishurira na co.
Mugabo rero, ukuri dushitsemwo, tube ari kwo tugenderamwo.
Bavukanyi, munyigane, mwitegereze abagenda batwigana, nk'uko mudufiseko akarorero.
Kuko benshi bagenda ukundi, abo nababwiye kenshi, n'ubu ndabababwira ndira, yuko ari abansi b'umusaraba wa Kristo.
Iherezo ryabo ni uguhona, imana yabo ni inda, biratana ibiteye isoni vyabo, ivyo isi ni vyo bababaye.
Tweho i wacu ni mw'ijuru, ni ho twiteze Umukiza ko azova, ni we Mwami Yesu Kristo,
azohindura imibiri y'amagorwa yacu, ishushanywe n'umubiri w'ubwiza bwiwe, nk'uko afise ubushobozi bumubashisha kwigarurira vyose.
Nuko rero, bavukanyi nkunda mporanira igishika, muri umunezero wanje n'igitsibo nambaye, abo nkunda, muhagarare mushikamye muri mu Mwami wacu.
Ndahanura Ewodiya, ndahanura na Sintike, ngo bahurize imitima mu Mwami wacu.

Kandi nawe dufatanije igikorwa vy'ukuri, ndakwinginga ngo wame ufasha abo bagore, kuko twarwaniye ubutumwa bwiza hamwe turi kumwe na Kilementi n'abandi bafatanije nanje, amazina yabo yanditswe mu gitabo c'ubugingo.
Mwame munezererwa mu Mwami wacu imisi yose; nongeye kubivuga; ni munezerwe.
Ubugwaneza bwanyu bumenywe n'abantu bose; Umwami wacu ari hafi.
Ntimugire ico mwiganyira, ariko muri vyose ivyo mugomba bimenyeshwe Imana, mu gusenga no mu kwinginga bifatanije no gukenguruka.
Maze amahoro y'Imana aruta uko yomenywa n'umuntu wese, azorinda imitima yanyu n'ivyiyumviro vyanyu muri Kristo Yesu. "

Ibisigaye bavukanyi, ivyo ukuri vyose, ivyo kwubahwa vyose, ibigororotse vyose, ibitanduye vyose, ivyo igikundiro vyose, ibishimwa vyose, ni haba hariho ingeso nziza, ni haba hariho gushimwa, mube ari vyo mwiyumvira.
Ivyo mwize, ivyo mwakiriye, ivyo mwumvise, ivyo mwambonanye, mube ari vyo mukora; ni ho Imana nyene amahoro izobana namwe.
Ariko ndanezererewe cane mu Mwami wacu kuko ubu mwahavuye mukongera kubabara ivyanje. Kandi mwaranabibabara, ariko mukabura uburyo.
Sindabivuze kubwo ubukene, kuko nize kubumbwa n'ivyo mfise uko ndi kose.
Nzi gucishwa bugufi, nzi no kugira umurengera; muri cose no muri vyose natiwe ibanga ryo mu vyo guhaga no mu vyo gusonza, ryo mu vyo kugira umurengera no mu vyo gukena.
Nshobozwa vyose n'uwumpa inkomezi. "
Ariko mwagize neza, kuko mwafatanije nanje amarushwa.

Kandi yemwe Bafilipi, namwe ni ico muzi yuko kw'itanguriro ry'ubutumwa bwiza, hamwe nava i Makedoniya, ata rindi shengero rya Kristo ryafatanije nanje mu vyo gutanga no guhabwa, atari mwebwe mwenyene.
Kuko n'i Tesalonike na ho mwandungikiyeyo ivyo kumara ubukene si rimwe ni kabiri kose.
Si uko ndondera ingabire, ariko ndondera imbuto zigwiririkanya amaronko yanyu.
Ariko ndafise ibinkwiye vyose, ndafise umurengera. Ndahaze, kuko mpawe na Epafurodito ivyo mwarungitse, ari umubabwe umota neza, ikimazi cemewe gihimbara Imana.
Kandi Imana yanje izobamara ubukene bwanyu bwose, nk'uko itunga ry'ubwiza ryayo riri ryo muri Kristo Yesu.
Nuko icubahiro kibe ico Imana yacu, ni yo Data wa twese, ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Muntahirize abera bose bo muri Kristo Yesu. Bavukanyi turi kumwe barabatasha.
Abera bose barabatasha, canecane abo mu rugo kwa Kayisari.
Ubuntu bw'Umwami Yesu Kristo bubane n'imitima yanyu.
Pahulo, nagizwe intumwa ya Kristo Yesu n'uko Imana yabigomvye, na Timoteyo umuvukanyi,
turabandikiye bavukanyi bo muri Kristo bera b'abizigirwa, muri i Kolosayi. Ubuntu n'amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese bibabemwo.
Dushima Imana Se w'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, twama tubasengera ubudasiba,
kuko twumvise ukwizera Kristo Yesu kwanyu, n'urukundo mufitiye abera bose,
kubwo ivyizigirwa mwabikiwe mw'ijuru, ivyo mwumvise kera, mw'ijambo ry'ukuri kw'ubutumwa bwiza,
bwabashitseko, nk'uko buri mw'isi yose bwama imbuto bugwira, kandi no muri mwebwe bugenza butyo, uhereye wa musi mwumviye mukamenya ubuntu bw'Imana vy'ukuri, "
nk'uko mwigishijwe n'uwo dukunda Epafura, umugurano mugenzi wacu, ni we mukozi wa Kristo wo kwizigirwa abagaburira ivya Kristo mu gishingo cacu,
kandi ni we yatumenyesheje urukundo rwanyu muhabwa na Mpwemu.
Ni co gituma natwe, uhereye igihe twavyumviye, tudahengeshanya kubasengera, no kubasabira ngo mwuzuzwe ukumenya ivyo igomba n'ubwenge bwose no kumenya ivyo impwemu.
Kugira ngo mugende nk'uko bibereye abo Umwami wacu, mumunezereza muri vyose, mwama imbuto mu bikorwa vyiza vyose, mugwizwa no kumenya Imana,
mushobozwa n'ubushobozi bwose, nk'uko inkomezi z'ubwiza bwayo ziri, ngo mwihangane rwose, ntimurambirwe, mubigiranye umunezero.
Mushime Data wa twese yabashoboje kuraganwa n'abera umugabane wo mu muco;
yadukijije ububasha bw'umwiza, atwimurira mu bwami bw' Umwana wiwe akunda.
Muri uwo ni ho dufise ugucungurwa, ni kwo guharirwa ivyaha vyacu.
Ni we shusho y'Imana itaboneka, ni we mfura mu vyaremwe vyose,
kuko muri we ari ho vyose vyaremewe, ivyo mw'ijuru n'ivyo mw'isi, ibiboneka n'ibitaboneka, uri intebe z'icubahiro, uri ubwami, uri ubukuru, uri ububasha; vyose vyaremwe na we, biremerwa kuba ivyiwe.
We yabayeho vyose bitarabaho, kandi muri we vyose ni ho bifataniye.
Ni we mutwe w'umubiri, ni wo shengero, kandi ni we tanguriro, ni we mfura mu kuva mu bapfuye, kugira ngo abe agaheta muri vyose.
Kuko Imana yahimbawe no kumuvyagizamwo ukwuzura kwayo kwose.
Yahimbawe kandi no kumuha kwuzuza vyose na yo, ari ivyo mw'isi, ari ivyo mw'ijuru, izanishije impore amaraso yo ku musaraba wiwe.
Namwe abari baratandukanijwe n'Imana kera, mugahindurwa abansi bayo mu mitima yanyu n'ivyo mwakoze bibi.
None ubu yarabujuje na yo abuzurije mu mubiri wiwe w'umuntu kubwo urupfu yapfuye, ngo abashikane imbere yayo muri abera, mudafise agasembwa, mutagira ico mwogawa;
asangwa muhora mwizeye, mushinzwe neza mutanyiganyiga, mudatirimuka mu vyizigiro biheshwa n'ubutumwa mwumvise, bwavuzwe mu baremwe bose bo musi y'ijuru, ubwo jewe Pahulo nacikiye umukozi wabwo.
None nezererewe amagorwa yanje yo kubwanyu, kandi ivyasigaye ku marushwa ya Kristo nanje ndabishitsa mu mubiri wanje, kubwo umubiri wiwe, ni wo shengero,
iryo nacikiye umukozi, nk'uko nahawe n'Imana ububwiriza bwo kugaburira mwebwe, kugira ngo nkwize ijambo ry'Imana rishitse,
ni ryo banga ryari ryarahishijwe uhereye kera hose n'ibihe vyose, ariko noneho ryahishuriwe abera bayo,
abo Imana yakunze kumenyesha itunga ry'ubwiza bw'iri banga, rivugwa mu banyamahanga, ni ryo Kristo ari muri mwebwe, ivyizigiro vyo kuzoronka ubwiza.
Natwe ni we twamamaza, duhanura umuntu wese, twigishisha umuntu wese ubwenge bwose, ngo dushikirize Imana umuntu wese ahinguriwe muri Kristo;
ico ni co kintamisha, ndabirwanira nk'uko ubushobozi bwiwe buri, bunkoreramwo bishimitse.
Ndagomba ko mumenya ukuntu ndabarwanira intambara, mwe n'abo i Lawodikiya n'abatarankubita ijisho bose uko bangana;
kugira ngo imitima yabo ireme, kuko bamatanirijwe mu rukundo ngo bahabwe itunga ryose ry'ugutahura ata mazinda, babone kumenya ibanga ry'Imana, ni ryo Kristo.
Muri we ni ho itunga ryose ry'ubwenge n'ukumenya ryahishijwe.
Mvuze ivyo kugira ngo ntihagire uwubahendagirisha akarimi gasosa.
Kuko naho ntari kumwe namwe ku mubiri, ndi kumwe namwe ku mutima, nezerewe kandi mbona ugushira hamwe kwanyu kwiza, n'ugushikama mu kwizera Kristo kwanyu.
Nuko nk'uko mwakiriye Kristo Yesu Umwami wacu, mube ari ko mugendera muri we,
mumushinzemwo imizi, mumwubakwamwo, mushikamishijwe n'ukwizera nk'uko mwigishijwe, murushiriza gushima.
Mwirinde, ntihakagire uwubagira imbohe, abanyagishije ubwenge bw'abantu ari ibihendo vy'ubusa, bikurikira akaronda k'imigenzo y'abantu, bikurikira ivya mbere vyo mw'isi, bidakurikira Kristo.
Kuko muri we ari ho haba ukwuzura kwose kw'Ubumana mu buryo bw'umubiri.
Kandi mwuzurizwa no kumubamwo, ni we mutwe w'ubukuru bwose n'ububasha bwose.
Kandi muri we mwahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo kutari uko intoke, hamwe mwiyambura akameremere k'umubiri, ni kwo guhimburwa kwo muri Kristo;
kuko mwahambanywe na we mw'ibatizwa, ni ho kandi mwazuranywe na we, kubwo kwizera ubushobozi bw' Imana yamuzuye mu bapfuye.
Kandi hamwe mwari mugipfuye mwishwe n'ibicumuro vyanyu n'ukudahimburwa igikoba c'ubugabo kw'imibiri yanyu, yabagiranye bazima na we, imaze kuduharira ibicumuro vyacu vyose,
ihanaguye n'ikete itwagiriza, irimwo amabwirizwa yaduhama, iyikura hagati yacu na yo, iyibamba ku musaraba.
Kandi yambuye abakuru n'abafise ububasha, ibateterereza mu maso ya bose, ibashorera bafashwe mpiri kubwo uwo musaraba.
Nuko ntihakagire uwubahinyura ku biribwa, mu vyo imisi mikuru, mu vyo ukwezi kubonetse canke mu vyo isabato.
Ivyo vyari igitutu c'ivyari birariye kuzoza, ariko umutumba ubwawo ni uwa Kristo.

Ntihakagire umuntu abagunga impera yanyu, nk'uko yigombera ubwiwe, ayibagungishije kwicisha bugufi no gusenga abamarayika, aguma mu vyo yabonye gusa, atewe kwihimbariza ubusa n'ubwenge bw'akameremere kiwe,
kandi atifatanya na wa Mutwe, kuri wo umubiri wawo wose, ufashijwe n'ingingo n'imitsi, ugateranywa neza na vyo, ni ho uronka gukura kwawo gutangwa n'Imana.
Asangwa mwarapfanye na Kristo, mukareka ivya mbere vy'isi, Ni igiki gituma mwemera kuganzwa na ya mabwirizwa, nk'abazokwama bari kw'isi--
ngo, Ntugafateko, ntugatamireko, ntugakoreko;
kandi ivyo vyose biba biheze iyo biriwe--mukumvira ivyagezwe n'abantu n'inyigisho zabo?

Ayo mabwirizwa koko afise ishusho y'ubwenge, kuko abwiriza gusenga nk'uko abantu biraritse, no kwicisha bugufi, no kwibabaza umubiri, ariko ntagira ishikanwa ryo kubuza ukwifuza kw'akameremere k'umuntu.
None rero asangwa mwarazuranywe na Kristo, murondere ibiri hejuru, iyo Kristo ari, avyagiye i buryo bw'Imana.
Mushire imitima ku vyo mw'ijuru, ntimuyishire ku biri mw'isi.
Kuko mwapfuye, kandi ubugingo bwanyu bukaba buhishanijwe hamwe na Kristo mu Mana.
Kristo, ni we bugingo bwacu, ni yerekanwa, namwe muzoca mwerekanwa muri kumwe mu bwiza bwiwe.
Nuko mwice ingingo zanyu ziri mw'isi, ubushakanyi, ibihumanya, ukwifuza kw'umubiri, ukwifuza kubi kwose, no kwifuza ivyo abandi, ni kwo gusenga ibigirwamana;
ivyo ni vyo bizanira ishavu ry'Imana abantu b'intabarirwa.
Namwe mwabigenderamwo kera, hamwe mwaba muri vyo.
Ariko noneho mwiyambure n'ibi vyose: ishavu, kujingitwa, urwanko rw'ubusa, gucokorana, kandi ntihakagire amajambo ateye isoni ava mu kanwa kanyu.
Ntimukabeshane, kuko mwiyambuye umuntu wa kera n'ibikorwa vyiwe,
mukambara umuntu musha, ahindurwa musha ngo agire ubwenge, amere nk'ishusho y'Iyamuremye.

Aho ntihaba Umugiriki canke Umuyuda, uwahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo canke uwutahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo, uwuvuga indimi zidatahurika canke umunyarufuri, umugurano canke uwidegemvya; ariko Kristo ni vyose, kandi ari muri bose.
Nuko rero, nk'uko bibereye abatoranijwe n'Imana bera bakundwa na yo, mwambare umutima w'ikigongwe, ineza, ukwicisha bugufi, ugutekereza n'ukwihangana,
mwihanganirana, muharirana, iyo umuntu agize ico apfa n'uwundi. Nk'uko Umwami wacu yabahariye, namwe mube ari ko muharirana.
Ikigeretse kuri ivyo vyose mwambare urukundo, ni rwo mugozi uzana gutungana.
Kandi amahoro ya Kristo aganze mu mitima yanyu, ayo mwahamagariwe ngo mube umubiri umwe. Kandi mube abama bakenguruka.

Ijambo rya Kristo ribe muri mwebwe rigwiriye, ririmwo ubwenge bwose. Mwigishanye, muhanurane, muririmba zaburi n'indirimbo n'amatazirano y'ivya Mpwemu, muririmbire Imana mu mitima yanyu mubiheshwa n'ubuntu bwayo.
Kandi ivyo muzokora vyose, mu majambo no mu bikorwa, muhore mubikora vyose mw'izina ry'Umwami Yesu, mushima Imana Data wa twese kubwo uwo.
Bagore, mugamburukire abagabo banyu, nk'uko bibereye abari mu Mwami wacu.
Bagabo, mukunde abagore banyu, ntimubabere umururazi.
Bana, mwumvire abavyeyi banyu muri vyose, kuko ivyo ari vyo bishimwa mu Mwami wacu.
Ba se, ntimukaratse abana banyu, ngo ntibacike ivutu.
Bagurano, mwumvire ba shobuja bo ku mubiri muri vyose, atari iyo babahagarikiye gusa, nk'abanezereza abantu, ariko mubakorere mushize ubwira mu mitima yanyu, mwubaha Shobuja mukuru.
Ivyo mukora vyose, mubikore bivuye mu mutima, nk'abakorera Shobuja mukuru, ntimube nk'abakorera abantu,
muzi yuko muzohabwa impera na Shobuja mukuru, ni yo wa mugabane. Shobuja uwo Kristo ni we mukorera.
Kuko uwugabitanya azokwihorwa nk'uko yagabitanije. Kandi nta kurobanura ku butoni.
Ba shebuja, namwe ni mugirire abakozi banyu ibigororotse n'ibibereye, kuko muzi yuko namwe mufise Shobuja mw'ijuru.
Mukovye mu gusenga, mukubemwo maso, mushima;
kandi natwe nyene mudusengere, kugira ngo Imana itwugururire urugi rwo kuvuga ijambo ryayo, tuvuge ibanga rya Kristo, iryo mbohewe,
kugira ngo ndariserure nk'uko nkwiye kuvuga.
Mugendane ubwenge ku bo hanze, mugura uburyo mubugwiza.
Imvugo zanyu zamane ubuntu bw'Imana, zirunzwe umunyu, kugira ngo mumenye ingene mukwiye kwishura umuntu wese.
Tukiko umuvukanyi dukunda, umukozi w'umwizigirwa, dukorana mu Mwami wacu, azobiganira ivyanje vyose.
Ni we ndabatumyeko kubwo ivyo nyene, ngo mumenye ivyacu, kandi ngo aremeshe imitima yanyu,
ndamutumanye na Onesimo umuvukanyi w'umwizigirwa, uwo dukunda, yavuye i wanyu; bazobiganira ivyo ino vyose.
Arisitariko, uwo dusangiye umunyororo, arabatasha; na Mariko, mwene se wabo wa Barunaba, arabatasha, umwe mwabwirizwa ivyiwe. Ni yaramuka aje i wanyu muzomwakire.
Na Yesu, ari we Yusito, arabatasha. Abo bonyene bo mu bahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo ni bo bakorana nanje kubwo ubwami bw'Imana, kandi bamaze umubabaro.
Epafura w'i wanyu, umushumba wa Kristo Yesu, arabatasha, yama abarwanira mu gusenga kwiwe kugira ngo mushikame, mutunganye rwose, mumenya neza mudakekeranya ivyo Imana igomba vyose.
Ndamushingira intahe yuko abagirira umwete mwinshi, mwebwe n'abo i Lawodikiya n'abo i Hiyerapoli.
Luka, umuganga akundwa, na Dema, barabatasha.
Muntahirize abavukanyi b'i Lawodikiya, na Numfa, n'ishengero ryo mu nzu yiwe.
Kandi iki cete ni mwaheza kugisomerwa, muzokwitwaririke ko gisomerwa ishengero ry'i Lawodikiya; kandi namwe muzosome ikizova i Lawodikiya nyene.
Kandi muzobarire Arukipo muti: "Urabe igikorwa c'ubusuku wahawe mu Mwami wacu, ucuzuze."
Uku ni kwo gutasha kwanje Pahulo, kwanditswe n'ukwanje kuboko. Mwibuke iminyororo yanje. Ubuntu bubane namwe.
Pahulo, Siluwano na Timoteyo turabandikiye abo mw'ishengero ry'i Tesalonike, bari mu Mana Data wa twese no mu Mwami Yesu Kristo. Ubuntu bubabemwo n'amahoro.
Mwese tubashimira Imana imisi yose, tubahoza mu kanwa uko dusenze,
twibuka ubudasiba ibikorwa vyanyu biva ku kwizera, n'ubutame buva mu rukundo, n'ukwihangana kuva ku kwizigira Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, imbere y'Imana yacu, ni yo Data wa twese. "
Bavukanyi bakundwa n'Imana, tuzi yuko mwatoranijwe na yo.
Kuko ubutumwa bwacu butabashitseko ari amajambo yonyene ariko bwarimwo n'ubushobozi na Mpwemu Yera, no kumara amazinda rwose; namwe murazi ubugene twari tumeze hagati muri mwebwe kubwanyu.
Namwe mwaratwiganye, mwigana n'Umwami wacu, mumaze kwakirira ijambo ry'Imana mu marushwa menshi, munezerejwe na Mpwemu Yera,
bituma muba ikigereranyo c'abizera bose bari i Makedoniya no muri Akaya.
Kuko muri mwebwe humvikanye ijambo ry'Umwami wacu, kandi ntiryumvikanye i Makedoniya no muri Akaya honyene, ariko ukwizera Imana kwanyu kwaramamaye hose; bituma tutarinda kugira ico tuvuga muri ivyo.
Kuko bose bivugira ubwabo inkuru z'ingene twaje muri mwebwe, kandi ingene mwahindukiriye Imana, mugaheba ibigirwamana, ngo mukorere Imana nyakuri kandi nzima,
kandi ngo mwitege Umwana wayo ko ava mw'ijuru, umwe yazura imukuye mu bapfuye, ni Yesu, adukiza ishavu rigira rize.
Bavukanyi, ubwanyu murazi yuko ugushika muri mwebwe kwacu kutabaye uko ubusa;
ariko tumaze kubabarizwa i Filipi no kuhatetererezwa, nk'uko muzi, dushira amanga mu Mana yacu kubwira mwebwe ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana turi mu ntambara nyinshi.
Kuko uguhanura kwacu kutava mu buzimire, canke mu buhumane, kandi atari uko ubugunge;
ariko nk'uko Imana yatwemeye ko turi abo kuzezwa ubutumwa, ni ko tuvuga. Ntituvuga nk'abagomba kunezereza abantu, ariko nk'abagomba kunezereza Imana isuzuma imitima yacu.
Kuko ata na rimwe twigeze kuvuga ijambo ducishije iruhande, murabizi, canke ijambo ryo guhisha ukunohoka, Imana ni yo cabona c'ivyo.
Kandi ntitwarondera icubahiro co ku bantu, ari kuri mwebwe canke ku bandi; naho tuba twarashoboye kubaremera, kuko turi intumwa za Kristo.
Ariko twaritonda hagati muri mwebwe, nk'uko umuvyeyi abungabunga abana biwe.
Ni ko twabagirira igishika, ni co catumye duhimbarwa no kubaha, si ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana gusa, ariko n'ubwacu bugingo na bwo, kuko mwabaye abo dukunda rwose.
Bavukanyi, muribuka ubutame bwacu n'ubucumukure; twababwira ubutumwa bwiza bw'Imana. Twakora umurango n'ijoro, kugira ngo ntihagire uwo muri mwebwe turemera.
Mwebwe muri ivyabona hamwe n'Imana vy'ingene twamerera mwebwe abizera, turi abera, tugororoka, tutariko umugayo.
Nk'uko muzi ingene twari tumeze ku muntu wese muri mwebwe, nk'uko se amera ku bana biwe, tubahanura, tubaremesha, dushinga intahe,
kugira ngo mugende nk'uko bibereye ab' Imana, ibahamagarira kuja mu bwami bwayo no mu bwiza bwayo.

Natwe igituma dushima Imana ubudasiba, ni uko hamwe mwakira ijambo ry'ubutumwa mwatwumvanye, ni ryo ry'Imana, mutaryemeye nk'ijambo ry'abantu, ariko nk'ijambo ry'Imana, nk'uko riri koko, rikorera muri mwebwe abizera.
Namwe bavukanyi, mwiganye amashengero y'Imana y'i Yudaya, ari muri Kristo Yesu, kuko ivyo mwababajwe n'ubwoko bwanyu ari bimwe n'ivyo abo bababajwe n'Abayuda,
bishe Umwami Yesu n'abavugishwa n'Imana, kandi natwe baratwirukanye, ntibanezereje Imana, barwanya abantu bose;
batubuza kubarira abanyamahanga ngo bakire; na ntaryo buzuza ingero y'ivyaha vyabo. Ariko ishavu rirabashikiye kubamara rwose.
Ariko twebwe, bavukanyi, hamwe twatandukanywa namwe igihe gito ubwo amaso, ariko si mu mutima, twarushirije kugira umwete wo kubonana namwe imbonankubone, tubafitiye inkumbu nyinshi;
kuko twagomba kuza i wanyu, mbere jewe Pahulo kubigomba si rimwe ni kabiri kose, Satani akatubuza.
None ivyizigiro vyacu n'iki, canke umunezero, canke igitsibo co mu mutwe twirata? Mbega si mwebwe, imbere y'Umwami wacu Yesu aho azozira?
Kuko ari mwebwe cubahiro cacu n'umunezero wacu.
Nuko tutagishoboye kwihangana, dushima gusigara twenyene muri Atenayi,
dutuma Timoteyo, muvukanyi, umukozi w'Imana agabura ubutumwa bwiza bwa Kristo, ngo abakomeze abaremeshe ku vyo ukwizera kwanyu,
kugira ngo ntihagire uwo muri mwebwe anyiganyizwa n'ayo marushwa; kuko ubwanyu muzi yuko ari ico twashiriweho nyene.
Kandi hamwe twari kumwe namwe, twababuriye yuko tutazobura kubabazwa; kandi ni ko vyabaye, murabizi.
Nanje ni co catumye ntuma iyo, bitakinkundiye kwihangana, kugira ngo menye ukwizera kwanyu, nikenga ko wa musukanyi yoba yarabasutse, natwe tukaba twaratamijwe n'ubusa.

Ariko none Timoteyo arashitse, avuye i wanyu, atuzaniye inkuru nziza y'ukwizera kwanyu n'urukundo rwanyu, kandi yuko mutwibuka neza imisi yose, mudukumbura mugomba kubonana natwe, nk'uko natwe tubakumbura.
Ni co catumye bavukanyi, turemeshwa kubwanyu n'ukwizera kwanyu, mu mubabaro wacu wose no mu marushwa.
Kuko none turiho, asangwa muhagaze mu Mwami.
Ni ishimwe ki twoshobora kwishura Imana kubwanyu, kubwo umunezero wose tubanezererwa imbere y'Imana yacu?
Dusenga cane ijoro n'umurango kugira ngo twibonanire namwe imbonankubone, tunonosore ivyasigaye ku kwizera kwanyu.
None Imana yacu ubwayo, ni yo Data wa twese, n'Umwami wacu Yesu, agorore inzira yacu yo kuza iyo.
Namwe Umwami wacu abagwirize, abongerereze urukundo mukundana, no gukunda abandi bose, nk'uko natwe tumeze kuri mwebwe;
kugira ngo aremeshe imitima yanyu, ntigire umugayo, ibe iyera imbere y'Imana yacu ni yo Data wa twese, izosangwe ityo aho Umwami wacu Yesu azozananira n'abera biwe bose.
Nuko bavukanyi, ibisigaye, turabinginga tubahanura mu Mwami Yesu, nk'uko mwize kuri twebwe ingene mukwiye kugenda no kunezereza Imana (kandi ni ko mugenda), murushirize cane kugenza mutyo.
Murazi ivyagezwe twahawe n'Umwami Yesu kubabarira ivyo ari vyo.
Ico Imana igomba, ni ukwezwa kwanyu, ko mwirinda ubushakanyi;
kugira ngo umuntu wese muri mwebwe amenye kuganziriza uwiwe mubiri mu kwezwa no mu kuwubaha,
atari mu buryo bwo kwangaza umutima mu vyifuzo, nk'uko abanyamahanga batazi Imana bagira;
ngo umuntu wese ntarenge ibikwiye, kandi ntagunge umuvukanyi wundi kuri ivyo, kuko Umwami wacu ari umuhozi kuri ivyo vyose, nk'uko twababuriye tuvyemeza.
Kuko Imana itaduhamagariye guhumana, ariko yaduhamagariye kwezwa.
Ni co gituma uwuvyanka ataba yanse umuntu ariko aba yanse Imana, kandi ari yo ibaha Mpwemu wayo Yera.
Ariko ivyo gukunda bavukanyi ntimurinda kuvyandikirwa, kuko ubwanyu mwigishijwe n' Imana gukundana;
kandi ni ko nyene mugiriranira n'abavukanyi bose b'i Makedoniya hose. Ariko bavukanyi turabahanura ngo murushirize kugira rwinshi.
Kandi mushishikare kwiyorosha, no gukora ivyanyu, no gukoresha amaboko yanyu, nk'uko twababariye,
kugira ngo mugendane ingeso nziza ku bo hanze, kandi mutagira ico mukenye.
Ariko bavukanyi, ntitugomba ko muyoberwa ivyo abasinzira itiro ry'urupfu, ngo ntimubabare nka ba bandi badafise ivyizigiro.
Uko twizera yuko Yesu yapfuye akazuka, tube ari ko twizera yuko abasinziririye muri Yesu, Imana izobazanana na we.
Iki ni co tubabwira, ni ijambo ry'Umwami twashikirijwe, yuko twebwe abazoba bakiriho, dusigaye gushitsa ku kuza kw'Umwami wacu, tutazokwitangira na gatoya imbere y' abasinziriye.
Kuko Umwami wacu ubwiwe azoza, amanutse avuye mw'ijuru, aranguruye ijwi rirenga, hamwe n'akamo k'umumarayika mukuru, n'inzumbeti y'Imana. Maze abapfiriye muri Kristo ni bo bazobanza kuzuka;
maze natwe abazoba bakiriho, dusigaye, tuzoca duteruranwa na bo mu bicu, dusanganirire Umwami mu kirere. Ni ho tuzokwama tubana n'Umwami.
Nuko mwiruranishe ayo majambo.
Ariko bavukanyi, ivyo ibihe n'imisi ntimurinda kuvyandikirwa.
Kuko ubwanyu muzi neza yuko umusi w'Umwami wacu uzoza nk'uko igisuma kiza mw'ijoro.
Aho bazoba bavuga bati: "Hari amahoro, nta nkomanzi; ni ho uguhona kuzobazako giturumbuka, nk'uko ibise biza ku mugore akuriwe, kandi ntibazokwikiza na gatoya."
Ariko mweho, bavukanyi, ntimuri mu mwiza, ngo uwo musi ubashikeko giturumbuka;
kuko mwese muri abana b'umuco n'abana b'umurango. Ntituri abo ijoro canke abo umwiza.
Nuko rero ntidusinzire nka ba bandi, ariko twame tugavye, twirinde ibiboreza.
Kuko abasinzira basinzira mw'ijoro, n'ababorerwa baborerwa mw'ijoro.
Ariko tweho, ko turi abo umurango, twirinde ibiboreza, twambaye icuma gikingira igikiriza c'ukwizera n'urukundo, kandi twambaye nk'inkofero ukwizigira agakiza.
Kuko Imana itadushiriyeho kuturakira, ariko yadushiriyeho guheshwa agakiza n'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo,
ni we yadupfiriye kugira ngo tubaneho na we, ari iyo turi maso canke dusinziriye itiro ry'urupfu.
Nuko muhanurane, mukomezanye, nk'uko mubikora nyene.
Ariko bavukanyi, turabinginga, mumenye abakora muri mwebwe bagatama, babaganza mu Mwami wacu, bakabahanura,
mububahe rwose mu rukundo kubwo igikorwa cabo. Mubane amahoro.
Kandi turabahanura, bavukanyi, muhanure abasaragurika batagomba gukora, muremeshe abarandutse imitima, muramire abanyantege nke, mwihanganire bose.
Mwirinde, ntihagire umuntu yihora uwundi ikibi yamugiriye, ariko mwame mukurikira iciza mu vyo mugiriranira no mu vyo mugirira abandi bose.
Munezerwe imisi yose;
musenge ubudasiba;
mwame mukenguruka muri vyose, kuko ico ari co Imana ibagombako muri Kristo Yesu.
Ntimukazimye Mpwemu;
ntimugakengere ivyo abavugishwa n'Imana;
musuzume vyose, mugumye ivyiza,
mwirinde icitwa ikibi cose.
Kandi Imana Nyenamahoro ibe ari yo ibeza rwose. Kandi impwemu yanyu, ubugingo n'umubiri wose hamwe bizigamwe, ngo bizosangwe bitagira umugayo, aho umwami wacu Yesu Kristo azozira.
Iyibahamagara ni iyo kwizigirwa; no kubikora izobikora.
Bavukanyi, mudusengere.
Muramukishe abavukanyi kugumbirana kwera.
Ndabarahiye Umwami wacu, iki cete ntikizobure gusomerwa mu bavukanyi bose.
Ubuntu bw'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane namwe.
Pahulo na Siluwano na Timoteyo turabandikiye abo mw'ishengero ry'i Tesalonike, bari mu Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo.
Ubuntu n'amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo bibe muri mwebwe.
Biradukwiye kwama tubashimira Imana, bavukanyi, nk'uko bikwiye, kuko ukwizera kwanyu gukura cane, n'urukundo rw'umuntu wese muri mwebwe mukundana rugwira.
Ni co gituma ubwacu tubirata mu mashengero y'Imana, kubwo ukwihangana kwanyu n'ukwizera mu guhamwa kwanyu kwose n'amagorwa mushinyiriza.
Ico ni ikimenyetso co guca imanza kw'Imana kugororotse, ngo muzokwemererwe gushika mu bwami bw'Imana, ubwo namwe mubabarizwa.
Kuko ari ibigororotse ku Mana kwishura amarushwa abayabatera,
no kwishura mwebwe abayaterwa kuruhukana natwe, aho Umwami Yesu azohishurirwa, ava mw'ijuru, azananye n'abamarayika b'ubushobozi bwiwe,
hagati mu muriro waka, yishure guhorwa abatamenye Imana n'abatumvira ubutumwa bwiza bw'Umwami wacu Yesu.
Bazohanwa, ni kwo guhona kw'ibihe bidashira, kuva mu maso y'Umwami no mu bwiza bw'ubushobozi bwiwe,
aho azozira gushimirwa mu bera biwe kuri wa musi, no gutangarirwa kubwo abamwizeye bose, kuko intahe twashinze muri mwebwe yemewe.
Ni co gituma tubasengera imisi yose, ngo Imana yacu ibemere ko mumeze nk'uko bibereye ihamagarwa ryanyu, kandi ishikishe ubushobozi iciza cose munezererwa n'igikorwa canyu cose kiva ku kwizera:
kugira ngo izina ry'Umwami wacu Yesu rishimagizwe muri mwebwe, namwe mushimagizwe muri we, nk'uko ubuntu bw'Imana yacu n'ubwo Umwami Yesu Kristo buri.
Turabinginga, bavukanyi, kubwo kuzoza kw'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo no kuzokoranirizwa kuri we kwacu,

ntimushoke munyiganyiga ngo mugwe igihumura, canke ngo muhagarike imitima, naho mwoba mubitewe n'impwemu canke n'ijambo canke n'ikete rimeze nk'irivuye kuri twebwe, rivuga yuko umusi w'Umwami wacu uhejeje gushika.
Ntihakagire umuntu abahenda mu buryo na bumwe, kuko utazoza, kwa kureka Imana kutabanje kuboneka, kandi wa muntu w'umugarariji atarahishurwa, ni we mwana wo kuranduka,
umurwanizi yishira hejuru y'icitwa Imana cose canke igisengwa; nuko azokwicara mu rusengero rw' Imana, yiyerekana ngo ni Imana.
Ntimwibuka yuko nababwiye ivyo nkiri kumwe namwe?
Kandi none murazi ikibuza, kugira ngo azohishurwe mu gihe ciwe.
Kuko ibanga ry'umugararizo n'ubu ririko rirakora, mugabo hari uwubibuza ubu, gushitsa igihe azokurirwaho.
Ni ho wa mugarariji azohishurirwa, umwe Umwami Yesu azokwicisha impwemu ziva mu kanwa kiwe, azomutituza uguseruka kw'ukuza kwiwe.
Ukuza kw'uwo mugarariji kuri mu buryo bw'inkomezi za Satani, kuri n'ubushobozi bwose n'ibimenyetso n'ibitangaza vy'ibinyoma,
n'ubugunge bwose bwo kugabitanya ku bahona, kuko batemeye gukunda ivyo ukuri ngo bakizwe.
Ni co gituma Imana ibarungikira ubuzimire bubakoreramwo, ngo bizere ibinyoma:
kugira ngo abatizeye ukuri bose, bagahimbarirwa ukugabitanya, batsindwe n'urubanza.
Ariko bavukanyi bakundwa n'Umwami wacu, biradukwiye kwama tubashimira Imana, kuko uhereye mu bihe vya kera Imana yabatoranije ngo muronkere agakiza mu kwezwa na Mpwemu no mu kwizera ukuri.
Ni vyo yabahamagariye, ibahamagarishije ubutumwa bwiza twajejwe, kugira ngo muhabwe ubwiza bw'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Nuko bavukanyi, mushikame, mugumye ivyo mwashikirijwe, mwigishijwe, ari ivyo mwigishirijwe mu majambo canke mw'ikete ryacu.
Ariko, Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo ubwiwe, n'Imana Data wa twese, yadukunze, ikaduha kwirurwa imibabaro guhoraho, bo n'ivyizigiro vyiza biheshwa n'ubuntu bwayo,
babirure mu mitima yanyu, bayikomeze mu gikorwa cose ciza, n'ijambo ryose ryiza.
Ibisigaye bavukanyi mudusengere, ijambo ry'Umwami wacu ryamamare rishimagizwe, nk'uko biri no muri mwebwe,
kandi dukire abantu babi badadika; kuko ukwizera kudafiswe na bose.
Ariko, Umwami n'uwo kwizigirwa, ni we azobashinga neza abarinde wa Mubi.
Kandi twizigiye Umwami ku vyanyu, yuko ivyo tugeze mubikora kandi muzokwama mubikora.
Umwami arongore imitima yanyu, ayerekeze ku rukundo rw'Imana no ku kwihangana kwa Kristo.
Ariko bavukanyi, turabagera mw'izina ry'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, kuzibukira umuvukanyi wese w'umunebwe, canke adakurikira ivyo mwashikirijwe natwe.
Ubwanyu murazi ingene mukwiye kutwigana, kuko tutari abanebwe muri mwebwe,
ntitwarya ivyo kurya vy' umuntu n'umwe ku busa, ariko twagira ubutame n'ubucumukure, dukora ku murango no mw'ijoro, kugira ngo ntitugire umuntu muri mwebwe tugora.
Si uko tutavyemerewe, ariko ni ukugira ngo tubabere icitegererezo ngo mutwigane.
Kuko tukiri kumwe namwe twabageze iki, ngo umuntu wese ni yanka gukora ntakarye.
Kuko twumvise yuko hariho bamwe bo muri mwebwe bagenda basaragurika, bama bineganegera bakita mu bitabakwiye.
Ariko abameze bartyo turabagera tubahanura kubwo Umwami Yesu Kristo, gukora ibikorwa batekereje, babone kurya ivyo bironkeye ubwabo.
Ariko mweho bavukanyi, ntimurambirwe no gukora iciza.
Ni hagira umuntu atumvira ijambo ryacu ryo muri iri kete, mumwitegereze, ntimufatanye na we, kugira ngo amaramare.
Ariko ntimumwiyumvire ko ari umwansi wanyu, ariko mumuhanure nka umwana wa So.
Kandi Umwami Nyenamahoro ubwiwe, yame abaha amahoro ibihe vyose uburyo bwose. Umwami abane namwe mwese.
Uku ni kwo gutasha kwanje jewe Pahulo, kwanditswe n'ukwanje kuboko, ni co kimenyetso mu kete ryanje ryose: ni ko nandika.
Ubuntu bw'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo bubane namwe mwese
Pahulo, intumwa ya Kristo Yesu, nk'uko vyagezwe n' Imana Umukiza wacu na Kristo Yesu ivyizigiro vyacu,
ndakwandikiye Timoteyo, umwana wanje nyakuri mu kwizera. Ubuntu, imbabazi n'amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no kuri Kristo Yesu Umwami wacu bikubeko.
Nuko guma muri Efeso, nk'uko nakugiriye inama hamwe naja i Makedoniya, kugira ngo uteshe ba bandi ntibigishe ibiteye ukundi.
Ntibababare ivyo imigani y'ibinyoma n'ivyo kuzura akaboze k'urufatane rw'imiryango katagira iherezo, bidafasha igikorwa c'Imana gikorera mu kwizera, ariko bizana impari.
Ariko inyanduruko y'ukwigisha kwacu ni ukugira ngo bagire urukundo ruva mu mutima utanduye, utarimwo ijwi ribagiriza ikibi, no ku kwizera kutari ukwo uburyarya.
Ivyo bamwe barabihushije, bata inzira, baja mu bitagira ikimazi biba ari vyo bavuga.
Bagomba kuba abigisha b'ivyagezwe, ariko ntibatahura ivyo bavuga n'ivyo bashingira intahe babishimikiye. "
Ariko turazi yuko ivyagezwe ari vyiza, iyo umuntu abigenjeje nk'uko bikwiye ivyagezwe,
azi yuko ivyagezwe bitashiriweho umugororotsi, ariko vyashiriweho abagarariji n'ibigaba, abatubaha Imana n'abanyavyaha, abanegura ivyayo n'abakora ibizira, abica ba se na ba nyina, abicanyi,
abashakanyi, abagabo basambana n'abandi bagabo, abanyaga abantu bakabashora, ababeshi, abarahira nabi, n'ibindi vyose birwanya ukwigisha kuzima,
gukurikira ubutumwa bw'ubwiza bw'Imana ishemagizwa, ubwo najejwe.
Ndashimira Kristo Yesu Umwami wacu yabinshoboje, kuko yanyiyumviriye ko ndi uwo kwizigirwa, akampa ubusuku;
naho nabanje kumutyoza, kumuhiga no kumwambika ibara. Ariko naragiriwe ikigongwe kuko nabikoze ntabizi ntarizera.
Kandi ubuntu bw' Umwami wacu bwiyongeranyako, bo n'ukwizera n'urukundo rubonerwa muri Kristo Yesu.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizerwa, rikwiye kwemerwa rwose, yuko Kristo Yesu yazanywe mw'isi no gukiza abanyavyaha; muri bo jewe ndi agahebuza.
Ariko, icatumye ngirirwa ikigongwe ni ukugira ngo Yesu Kristo anyerekaniremwo gahebuza, ukwihangana kwiwe kwose, mbe icitegererezo c'abazomwizera bakaronka ubugingo budashira.
Umwami ahoraho, adapfa, ataboneka, ari we Mana imwe yonyene, igitinyiro n'icubahiro bibe ivyayo, ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Iri bwirizwa ndariguhaye, mwana wanje Timoteyo, nk'uko abavugishwa n'Imana bakuvuzeko ubwa mbere, ngo ufashwe na vyo kurwana intambara nziza.
Ugumye ukwizera, ufise umutima utarimwo ijwi rikwagiriza ikibi; iryo bamwe bashibuye bakamera nk'ubwato busavye mu vy'ukwizera.
Muri abo, umwe ni Humenayo na Alekisandero, abo nahaye Satani, kugira ngo bibigishe kudatyoza Imana.
Irya mbere y'ibindi vyose, ndabahanura kwingingira abantu bose, kubasengera, kubasabira no kubashimira Imana;
kandi canecane abami n'abashizwe hejuru bose, kugira ngo twame mu mahoro dutekereje, twubaha Imana turi inyankamugayo rwose.
Ivyo ni vyo vyiza vyemerwa mu maso y'Imana Umukiza wacu,
igomba ko abantu bose bakizwa bagashika ku kumenya ivyo ukuri.
Kuko hari Imana imwe, kandi hari Umuhuza umwe w'Imana n'abantu, na we nyene ni umuntu, ni Kristo Yesu,
yitanze ko incungu ya bose. Kandi ivyo bishingirwe intahe mu bihe vyavyo,
ni co nashiriweho kuba umusiguzi n'intumwa (mvuze ukuri, simbeshe) ni umwigisha wo kwigisha abanyamahanga ukwizera n'ivyo ukuri.
Nuko ndagomba ko abagabo basenga hose, batarika amaboko yera, bataratse, batagira ibihari.
Kandi n'abagore nyene, ndagomba ko bambara imyambaro biberanye, bagendane isoni badasaragurika kandi badashazisha gutsiba umushatsi, canke izahabu, canke ubudede, canke impuzu z'igiciro kinini,
ariko bashazishe ibikorwa vy'ingeso nziza, nk'uko bikwiye abagore bavuga yuko bubaha Imana.
Umugore yige atekereje agamburuka rwose.
Ariko sinkundira umugore ko yigisha canke ko aganza umugabo, ariko atekereze.
Kuko Adamu ari we yabanje kuremwa, hanyuma Eva.
Kandi Adamu si we yahenzwe, ariko umugore ni we yahenzwe, agwa mu bicumuro.
Yamara azokizwa kubwo ukuvyara, ni bashishikara kwizera no kugira urukundo no kwezwa, bifatanye no kwitonda.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizerwa; umuntu ni yagomba kuzezwa ishengero, aba yifuje igikorwa ciza.

Nuko umuzezwashengero akwiye kutabako umugayo, kandi akwiye kuba umugabo afise umugore umwe gusa; abe uwutarenza urugero, yitonda, aganza ingeso ziwe, akunda gutanga indaro, afise ubwenge bwo kwigisha,
atari umunoho w'umuvinyu, canke umusinzi, ariko abe umugwaneza, atitoraguza, atari inkunzi y'amahera,
aganza neza abo mu rugo rwiwe, abana biwe bamwumvira, yanka umugayo wose.
(Uwutazi kuganza abo mu rugo rwiwe yoshobora ate kuzigama ishengero ry'Imana?)
Kandi ntakwiye kuba muto mu kwizera, kugira ngo ntiyikakishe, ngo atembe, agacirwako iteka wa mugarariji yaciriweko.
Kandi akwiye gushingirwa intahe neza n'abo hanze, kugira ngo ntatembere mu mugayo no mu mutego wa wa mugarariji.
Kandi n'abadiyakoni b'ishengero na bo nyene, bakwiye kuba inyankamugayo batavuga indimi zibiri, kandi ntibabe abatwawe n'umuvinyu mwinshi, canke abifuza inyungu mbi.
Ariko bagumye ibanga ry'ukwizera, bafise imitima itarimwo ijwi ribagiriza ikibi.
Kandi abo babanze kumenyerezwa, maze ni batabonekako umugayo babone gukora igikorwa c'ibango ryabo.
N'abagore nyene babe inyankamugayo, batarementaniriza abandi, batarenza urugero, bizigirwa muri vyose.
Umukozi w'ishengero wese abe umugabo afise umugore umwe gusa, aganza neza abana biwe n'abo mu rugo rwiwe.
Kuko abakoze neza ico gikorwa c'ibango ryabo bironkera ikibanza c'iteka n'umwidegemvyo mwinshi mu kwizera Kristo Yesu.
Nkwandikiye ivyo, nizigiye ko nzoza i wawe vuba.
Ariko ni naba ngitevye ni ukugira ngo uzomenye uko bikwiye kugenzwa mu ngoro y'Imana, ni yo shengero ry'Imana nzima, vyongeye ni yo nkingi ishigikiye ukuri.

Nta wuhakana yuko ibanga ryo kwubaha Imana ridahambaye cane, ni iri: umwe yerekanywe afise umubiri, akaboneka ko ari umugororotsi mu mpwemu, akabonwa n'abamarayika, akamenyekanishwa mu banyamahanga, akizererwa mw'isi, akaduzwa agahabwa ubwiza.
Ariko Mpwemu avuga avyeruye yuko mu bihe bizoza bamwe bazota ivyizerwa, bagashira umutima ku vyo impwemu zizimiza no ku vyo inyigisho z'abadayimoni,
bavugisha uburyarya bw'abanyabinyoma, batewe ikidodo mu mitima yabo ibagiriza ikibi,
babuza kurongora no kurya ivyo kurya, kandi ari vyo Imana yaremye kugira ngo abizera, bakamenya ivyo ukuri, babirye bashima.
Ico Imana yaremye cose ni ciza, ntiharimwo ico gutabwa, iyo cakiriwe n'uwushima;
kuko kiba gihezagiwe n'ijambo ry'Imana no gusenga.
Ni wibutsa abavukanyi ivyo, uzoba uri umukozi mwiza wa Kristo Yesu, yarerewe mu majambo y'ukwizera n'ayo inyigisho nziza wakurikiye.
Ariko imigani ihumanya n'iyo abakecuru ntuyemere. Wimenyereze kwubaha Imana;
kuko kwimenyereza kw'umubiri kugira ikimazi kuri bike, ariko kwubaha Imana kugira ikimazi kuri vyose, kuko kuzana isezerano ry'ubugingo bw'ubu n'ubuzoza.
Iryo jambo ni iryo kwizerwa rikwiye kwemerwa rwose.
Kuko igituma turuha tukama mu ntambara ari uko twizigiye Imana nzima, ni yo Mukiza w'abantu bose, canecane w'abizera.
Wame ubwiriza ivyo kandi uvyigisha.
Ntihakagire uwukugayira ubusore, ariko ubere abizera ikigereranyo mu vyo uvuga, mu ngeso zawe, mu rukundo, mu kwizera no ku mutima utanduye.
Gushitsa aho nzozira wame ugira umwete wo gusomera abantu, kubahanura no kubigisha.
Ntiwanjanjwe ku ngabire iri muri wewe, imwe waheshwa n'ivyo abavugishwa n' Imana mu kurambikwako ibiganza vy'abakuru.
Ivyo ubishireko umwete, uvyamemwo, kugira ngo kuja imbere kwawe kubonekere bose.
Wirinde ubwawe no ku vyo wigisha. Wame ushishikara ivyo, kuko ni wagira utyo uzokwikizanya n'abakwumva.
Ntuhambarire umutama, ariko umuhanure nka so, abakiri bato n'imisore ubahanure nk'abavukanyi bawe.
Abatamakazi nyene ubahanure nka ba nyoko, abakiri bato n'abigeme nka bashiki bawe, uri n'umutima utanduye na gatoya.
Wubahe abapfakazi b'inyakamwe vy'ukuri.
Ariko, umupfakazi wese, namba afise abana canke abuzukuru, ni babanze kwiga kwubaha Imana ku vyo bagirira ababo, no kwishura ivyiza abavyeyi babo; kuko ivyo ari vyo bishimwa mu maso y'Imana.
Umupfakazi w'inyakamwe asigaye ari umwe, yizigira Imana, agashishikara kwinginga no gusenga ku murango no mw'ijoro.
Ariko, uwihaye ukwifuza aba apfuye ahagaze.
Ubabwirize ivyo, kugira ngo ntibabeko umugayo.
Ariko umuntu ni atatunga abo mu nzu y'i wabo, canecane abiwe, azoba yihakanye ukwizera, kandi azoba abaye hanyuma y'uwutizera.
Ntihakagire umupfakazi yandikirwa gufashwa ataramara imyaka mirongo itandatu y'amavuka, kandi handikwe uwari afiswe n'umugabo umwe gusa.
Handikwe uwushimirwa ibikorwa vyiza, namba yararera abana, namba yaratanga indaro, yaroza ibirenge vy'abera, yarafasha abababaye, yarashishikara gukurikira ibikorwa vyiza vyose.
Ariko abapfakazi bakiri bato ntubemerere, kuko kwifuza kw'umubiri ni kwamara kubatera kugarariza Kristo bazogomba kurongorwa,
bagatsindwa n'urubanza kuko bavuye mw'isezerano ryabo rya mbere.
Kandi ikindi, biga kugira ubunebwe, bagenda imihana; ariko rero si ubunebwe gusa, ikigeretseko bararegeteranya bita mu bitari ivyabo, bavuga ivyo badakwiye.
Ni co gituma ngomba ko abapfakazi bakiri bato barongorwa, bakavyara abana, bakubaka ingo zabo, ntibahe umwansi urwitwazo rw'ibitutsi.
Kuko n'ubu bamwe bamaze guta inzira, ngo bakurikire Satani.
Umugore wese yizera namba afise incuti z'abapfakazi, abafashe, ishengero ntiriremerwe, ribone gufasha abapfakazi b'inyakamwe.
Abakuru b'ishengero baganza neza ni babiyumvire ko bakwiye guhabwa icubahiro kirushiriza, kandi canecane abacumukura mu kuvuga ijambo ry'Imana no mu kwigisha.
Kuko icanditswe kivuga, ngo Ntimuzorumye umunwa w'inka iriko irasekura ingano; kandi ngo Umukozi akwiye ingero yiwe.
Umukuru ntukemere ico bazomukuregako hatabonetse ivyabona bibiri canke bitatu.
Abakora ivyaha ubahanire mu maso ya bose, kugira ngo abandi na bo batinye.
Ndakwihanikiririza mu maso y'Imana na Yesu Kristo n'imbere y'abamarayika batoranijwe, witondere ivyo, ntuce urwo umwe, ntukore ivyo guca urwa nkunzi.
Ntukagire umuntu wihutira kurambikako ibiganza, kandi ntugafatanye n'abandi mu vyaha vyabo. Uzokwame wirinda ubuhumane.
Uhereye ubu ntunywe amazi gusa, ariko unywe n'utuvinyu dukeya kubwo mu nda hawe, kuko urwaragurika.
Hari abantu ivyaha vyabo biboneka bikabatanga mu kuja mu rubanza; hari n'abandi bibaza inyuma.
Kandi ibikorwa vyiza na vyo ni uko, hari ibiboneka; kandi n'ibitameze bityo ntibishobora kunyegezwa.
Abaja bose bari mu buja ni biyumvire ba shebuja ko bakwiye kwubahwa rwose, ngo izina ry'Imana n'ukwigisha ntibitukwe.
Kandi abafise ba shebuja bizera, ntibagayishwe n'uko ari abavukanyi, ariko barushirize kubakorera, kuko abagirirwa ico kimazi ari abizera n'abakundwa. Uzokwigishe ivyo, ubibahanure.
Umuntu ni yigisha ukundi, ntiyemere amajambo mazima, ari yo majambo y'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, n'inyigisho zihura n'ukwubaha Imana;
azoba yikakishije, ata co azi, arwaye ibihari, n'intambara z'amajambo, zivamwo igono, gutongana, ibitutsi, umwikeko mubi
n'ibihari bidashira vy'abantu bononekaye ubwenge, bakuweko ivyo ukuri, bibwira yuko kwubaha Imana ari ukwironkera inyungu.
Ariko kwubaha Imana gufatanije no kubumbwa n'ivyo ufise kuvamwo inyungu nyinshi koko.
Kuko ata co twazanye mw'isi kandi ata co dushobora kuyivanamwo.
Ariko iyo dufise ivyo turya n'ivyo twambara biba bitubumvye.
Ariko abagomba kuba abatunzi bagwa mu nyosha no mu mutego no mu kwifuza kwinshi kw'ubupfu gusinzikaza, kudobeza abantu mu bibonona bikabarandura.
Kuko gukunda amahera ari imizi y'ibibi vyose; ayo bamwe bifuje, bakazimira, bagata ukwizera, bitobekeranisha imibabaro myinshi.
Ariko weho, muntu w'Imana, wame uhunga ivyo, ariko ukurikire ukugororoka, ukwubaha Imana, ukwizera, urukundo, ukwihangana n'ubugwaneza.
Wame urwana intambara nziza yo kwizera, ucakire ubugingo budashira, ubwo wahamagariwe, ukabwaturira ukwatura kwiza mu maso y'ivyabona vyinshi.
Ndakubwiririza mu maso y'Imana ibeshaho vyose, no mu za Kristo Yesu yashingishije intahe ukwatura kwiza imbere ya Pontiyo Pilato,
witondere icagezwe, ntugire agasembwa, ntubeko umugayo, gushitsa ku guseruka kw' Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo,
kuzokwerekanwa mu gihe cakwo n'Inyabushobozi yonyene, ishemagizwa, ni yo Mwami w'abami, uwuganza abaganza.
Ni yo yonyene ifise ukudapfa, iba mu muco utegerwa, ata muntu yigeze ayibona, ata wushobora kuyibona. Icubahiro n'ubushobozi bidashira bibe ivyayo. Amina.
Wihanize abatunzi bo mu vy'iki gihe, ntibibone, canke kwishimira ubutunzi butari ubwo kwishimirwa, ariko bishimire Imana, iduha vyose bisesekaye, ngo tubinezererwe.
Kandi bakore iciza, babe abatunzi ku bikorwa vyiza, babe abanyabuntu bakunda gutanga,
bibikire ubutunzi buzoba itanguriro ryiza mu gihe kizoza, kugira ngo bacakire ubugingo nyakuri.
Ewe Timoteyo, wame uzigama ico wabikijwe, utere ibitugu ibizira vy'amajambo ahumanya n'ukurwana kw'ivyitwa ubwenge atari bwo,
ubwo bamwe bivuga ko babufise bakazimira, bagata ukwizera. Ubuntu bubane namwe.
Pahulo, intumwa ya Kristo Yesu, nk'uko Imana yagomvye, intumwa yo kuvuga isezerano ry'ubugingo bubonerwa muri Kristo Yesu,
ndakwandikiye Timoteyo, umwana wanje nkunda. Ubuntu, imbabazi n'amahoro biva ku Mana Data wa twese no kuri Kristo Yesu Umwami wacu bikubeko.
Imana nkorera nkurikiye ba sogokuruza, mfise umutima utanduye, utarimwo ijwi rinyagiriza ikibi, ndayishimira yuko nkwibuka ubudasiba, uko nsenze, ijoro n'umurango.
Nibuka amosozi yawe, ngakumbura kukubona, ngo nuzure umunezero;
kuko nibutse ukwizera kutari ukwo uburyarya kuri muri wewe, kwabanje kuba muri nyogokuru Lowisi no muri nyoko Ewunike. Ndazi kandi ntakekeranya yuko kukurimwo nawe.
Ni co gituma ndakwibutsa kuvyura ya ngabire Imana yaguhaye ngo yake, yagushizwemwo no kurambikwako ibiganza vyanje.
Kuko Imana itaduhaye umutima w'isoni n'ubwoba; ariko yaduhaye uwo ubushobozi, urukundo n'ukwirinda. "
Nuko ntugire isoni zo gushingira intahe Umwami wacu, canke jewe imbohe yiwe. Ariko ufatanye nanje kwihanganira imibabaro kubwo ubutumwa bwiza, nk'uko ubushobozi bw'Imana bugushoboza,
yadukijije, ikaduhamagarisha umuhamagaro wera, udatewe n'ibikorwa vyacu, ariko utewe n'uko yabigabiye ubwayo, kandi utewe n'ubuntu bwayo, twaherewe muri Kristo Yesu ibihe vyose bitaraba.
Ariko none, bwaseruwe n'ukuboneka kw'Umukiza wacu Kristo Yesu, yahinduye urupfu ubusa, ubugingo no kutagipfa akabiserurisha ubutumwa bwiza.
Nashiriweho kuba umuvuzi, intumwa n'umwigisha w'ubwo butumwa.
Ni co gituma kandi mbabazwa ntya, yamara ntibintera isoni, kuko nzi uwo nizeye, kandi nzi ntakekeranya yuko ashobora kuzigama ikibitsanyo namubikije gushitsa kuri wa musi.
Shishikara mu karorero k'amajambo mazima wanyumvanye, ugashigikize ukwizera n'urukundo rubonerwa muri Kristo Yesu.
Ivyiza wabikijwe, ubizigamishe Mpwemu Yera atubemwo.
Urazi yuko abo muri Asiya bose banteye ibitugu, muri abo harimwo Fugelo na Herumogene.
Umwami agirire ikigongwe abo kwa Onesiforo, kuko yanduhura kenshi; kandi ntiyatewe n'isoni n'umunyororo wanje,
ariko, ashitse i Roma, agira umwete wo kundondera, arambona.
Umwami amuhe kuzoronka imbabazi ziva ku Mwami kuri wa musi. Kandi ivyo yankoreye muri Efeso uko bingana, nta wukurusha kubimenya.
Weho mwana wanje, ugirire ubushobozi mu buntu buri muri Kristo Yesu,
kandi ivyo wanyumvanye mu maso y'ivyabona vyinshi, ubishikirize abantu bo kwizigirwa, bazoshobora kuvyigisha n'abandi.
Ufatanye nanje kwihanganira imibabaro, nk'uko bikwiye umusoda mwiza wa Kristo Yesu.
Nta musoda yikwegera mu vy'ubu bugingo, ngo azohimbare uwamwandikiye ubusoda.
Kandi iyo umuntu arushanywa, ntahabwa igitsibo, kiretse arushanijwe nk'uko vyagezwe.
Umurimyi kuko ari we yacumukuye ni we akwiye kubanza gusoroma ku vyeze.
Umenye ivyo mvuze, kuko Umwami wacu azoguha ubwenge muri vyose.
Wame wibuka Yesu Kristo yazutse mu bapfuye, yakomotse mu ruvyaro rwa Dawidi, nk'uko ubutumwa nahawe buvuga;
ubwo mbabarizwamwo, no kubohwa nkabohwa, nk'inkozi y'ikibi; ariko ijambo ry'Imana ntiriboshwe.
Ni co gituma nihanganira vyose kubwo abatoranijwe, kugira ngo na bo baronke agakiza kari muri Kristo Yesu, gafatanije n'ubwiza budashira.
Iri jambo ni iryo kwizerwa, ngo Namba twarapfanye na we, tuzobanaho na we;
namba twihangana, tuzokwimikanwa na we; namba waramwihakanye, na we azotwihakana;
naho tutoba abizigirwa, we ahora ari umwizigirwa, kuko adashobora guhindagurika.
Wame ubibutsa ivyo, ubihanikiririza mu maso y'Imana ntibarwanire amajambo kuko bitagira ikimazi, bigwisha abumva.
Wame ugira umwete wo kwiha Imana nk'uwamaze kurama, umukozi atarinda guteterwa, aramiriza neza mw'ijambo ry'ukuri.
Ariko, ibihumanya vy'amajambo y'ubusa ubizibukire, kuko ababivuga bazoshishikara inzira yo kutubaha Imana,
kandi ijambo ryabo rizorandagurana nk'igisebe gishikurana kidakira. Muri abo umwe ni Humenayo na Fileto,
kuko bazimiye bakava mu vy'ukuri, bavuga ngo ukuzuka kwarahejeje kubaho, bagahenura ukwizera kwa bamwe.
Ariko ibuye ry' umushinge w'Imana wo kwubakako urakomeye, ryanditsweko iki kimenyetso, ngo Uhoraho arazi abiwe; kandi ngo Umuntu wese avuga izina ry' Uhoraho ave mu kugabitanya.

Mu nzu nini y'umutunzi ntihabamwo ibikoresho vy'ivyacuzwe mw'izahabu no mw'ifeza gusa, ariko habamwo n'ivyo ibiti n'ivyo ibumba, kandi bimwe babikoresha ivyo icubahiro, ibindi babikoresha ibiteye isoni.
Umuntu ni yiyeza, akitandukanya n'ivyo, azoba igikoreshwa c'icubahiro, cejejwe, kigirira nyene co ikimazi, catunganirijwe igikorwa ciza cose.
Ariko kwifuza kw'ubusore uguhunge, maze ukurikire ukugororoka, ukwizera, urukundo n'amahoro, ufatanya n'abambaza Umwami wacu n'imitima itanduye.
Ariko ibihari vy'ubupfu n'ivyo ubutungu ntukavyemere, uzi yuko bivyara impari z'ubupfu.
Kandi umushumba w'Umwami wacu ntakwiye gutongana, ariko akwiye kugira ineza kuri bose, no kuba uburyo bwo kwigisha, no kwihangana,
no guhanurisha uburwaneza abamuhaririza, ngo kumbure, bishobotse, Imana ibahe kwihana ngo bamenye ivyo ukuri,
bagaruke mu bwitonzi, bave mu mutego wa wa mugarariji yabafashe ngo bakore ivyo agomba.
Ariko umenye yuko mu misi y'iherezo hazoza ibihe bigoye.
Kuko abantu bazoba bikunda gusa, bakunda amahera, birarira, bibona, batukana, batumvira abavyeyi, intashima, abanegura ivyo Imana,
badakunda n'ababo, banka kwuzura, barementanya, batigarura, inkazi, badakunda ivyiza,
abaguranyi, ibirandamuke, abivyimvya, bakunda ibibahimbara bakabirutisha Imana.
Bafise ishusho yo kwubaha Imana, ariko bahakana ubushobozi bwakwo. Abameze batyo wame ubatera ibitugu.
Kuko muri bo harimwo abagabo banyegetera mu mazu, bagatwara abagore batagira imitima, baremerewe n'ivyaha, batwarwa n'ukwifuza kw'uburyo bwinshi,
bama biga, ariko nta ho bashobora gushitsa ku kumenya ukuri.
Nk'uko Yane na Yambure barwanije Mose, ni ko n'abo bagabo barwanya ukuri, abo ni abononekaye ubwenge, babaye ibihombe ku kwizera.
Mugabo ntibazoshobora kurengaho; kuko ubusazi bwabo buzogaragarira abantu bose, nk'uko ubwa ba bandi bwagaragaye.
Ariko weho wakurikiye neza ukwigisha kwanje, ingeso, imigabo, ukwizera, ukutarambirwa, urukundo, ukwihangana,
guhamwa n'imibabaro, nk'ivyambereyeko muri Antiyokiya, Ikoniyo n'i Lusitira; ivyo nihanganiye vyose mpamwa, kandi vyose Umwami wacu arabinkiza.
Mbere abagomba bose kugenda bubaha Imana bari muri Kristo Yesu, bazohamwa.
Ariko abantu babi, bo n'abahumbuzi, bazorushiriza kuba babi, bazimiza bakazimizwa.
Ariko weho ugume mu vyo wize, ukavyizezwa, kuko uzi abakwigishije.
Kandi uzi yuko uhereye mu buto bwawe wamye uzi ivyanditswe vyera bishobora kukumenyesha ubwenge bwo kukuzanira agakiza gaheshwa no kwizera Kristo Yesu.
Ivyanditswe vyose vyahumetswe n' Imana, kandi bifise akamaro ko kwigisha umuntu, kumuhana, kumutunganya no kumutoza indero nziza mu kugororoka;
kugira ngo umuntu w'Imana abe uwushitse, afise ibimukwiye vyose, ngo akore igikorwa ciza cose.
Ndakwihanikiririza mu maso y'Imana no mu ya Kristo Yesu azocira urubanza abazoba bariho n'abazoba bapfuye, kandi no kubwo kuzoboneka kwiwe n'ubwami bwiwe.
Uvuge ijambo ry'Imana, uhore ugavye mu gihe gikwiye no mu kidakwiye, uhane, wihanize, uhanure, mu kwihangana kwose no mu kwigisha.
Kuko igihe kizoza, batazokwemera kwumva ukwigisha kuzima; ariko kuko amatwi abarya yifuza kwumva ibibanezereza, bazokwirundaniriza abigisha bahuje n'ukwifuza kwabo,
kandi bazokwiziba amatwi, ngo ntibumve ukuri, bazozimira bakurikire imigani y'ibinyoma.
Ariko weho, wirinde muri vyose, wihanganire imibabaro, ukore igikorwa c'umuvuzi w'ubutumwa bwiza, ushitse igikorwa c'ibango ryawe.
Kuko jeho n'ubu ndiko ndasukwa nk'ibisukwa ku gicaniro, igihe co kwitahira kwanje kirashitse.
Narwanye intambara nziza, narangije urugendo, nazigamye ukwizera.
Ibisigaye mbikiwe igitsibo c'ukugororoka ico Umwami wacu, umucamanza agororotse, azompa kuri wa musi kandi si jewe jenyene nzogihabwa ariko kandi n'abakunze kuzoseruka kwiwe bose bazogihabwa.
Gira umwete wo kuza aho ndi vuba.
Dema yarantaye, kuko akunze ivyo iyi y'ubu, yigira i Tesalonike. Keresikenti yagiye i Galatiya Tito nawe i Dalumatiya.
Luka gusa ni we twasigaranye. Hitana Mariko, umuzane, kuko angirira ikimazi mu gikorwa c'ibango ryanje.
Ariko Tukiko namurungitse muri Efeso.
Aho uzozira uranzanira impuzu yo kwipfuka nasize i Tirowa kwa Karupo, n'ibitabo, kandi canecane uzozane ivyo insato.
Alekisandero umucuzi yangiriye inabi nyinshi. Umwami wacu azomwishura ibikwiranye n'ivyo yakoze.
Nawe umwirinde kuko yarwanije amajambo yacu cane. "
Mw'iburana ryanje rya mbere nta wanyunganiye, ariko bose barantaye; icompa ntibabiharurweko.
Ariko Umwami wacu ni we yampagarikiye, arandemesha, kugira ngo ubutumwa ndabuvuge nanje butagabanije, abanyamahanga bose babwumve. Nuko mva mu menyo y'intambwe.
Umwami wacu azonkiza ibibi vyose bangirira, azondokora kugira ngo anjane mu bwami bwiwe bwo mw'ijuru. Icubahiro kibe iciwe, ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Untahirize Purisikila na Akwila n'abo kwa Onesiforo.
Erasito yagumye i Korinto, ariko Tirofimo namusize i Mileto arwaye.
Gira umwete wo kuza agatasi katarashana. Ewubulo, Pudenti, Lino, Kilawudiya n'abavukanyi bose baragutasha.
Umwami abane n'umutima wawe. Ubuntu bw'Imana bubane namwe.
Jewe Pahulo, umushumba w'Imana, intumwa ya Yesu Kristo, ndabiherewe kwizeza abo Imana yatoranije no kwigisha kumenya ivyo ukuri gufatanije n'ukwubaha Imana.
Nkora nizigiye kuzoronka ubugingo budashira, ubwo Imana itazi kubesha yasezeranye kera, ibihe vyose bitarabaho.
Ariko mu bihe yitoranirije yerekanishije ijambo ryayo ubutumwa najejwe, nk'uko Imana Umukiza wacu yageze.
Ndakwandikiye Tito, umwana wanje nyakuri kubwo ukwizera dusangiye. Ubuntu n'amahoro bikubeko biva ku Mana Data wa twese no kuri Kristo Yesu Umukiza wacu.
Icatumye ndagusiga i Kirete kwari ukugira ngo utunganye ivyasigaye, kandi mu gisagara caho cose ngo uhashinge abakuru b'ishengero, nk'uko nabikubariye.
Abe umuntu atabonekako umugayo, afise umugore umwe gusa, afise abana bizera, bataregwa ko ari ibihumbu canke itagonda.

Kuko umuzezwashengero akwiye kutabako umugayo, nk'umukuru w'abakozi bo mu rugo w'Imana nyene; kandi ntakwiye kuba uwudakurwa kw'ijambo, ushangashirwa, umunywi w'umuvinyu, umusinzi canke uwunohokera inyungu mbi.
Ariko abe uwukunda gutanga indaro, akunda ivyiza, yitonda, agororoka, yera, yirinda,
agumya ijambo ryo kwizerwa rihura n'ukwigisha kwacu, kugira ngo abone guhanura abantu mu kwigisha kuzima no gutsinda abamuhaririza.
Kuko hariho benshi b'intagondwa, canecane n'abo mu bahimbuwe igikoba c'ubugabo, bavuga ibitagira ikimazi, n'inyosha mbi.
Bakwiye kuzibwa iminwa, kuko hari imiryango bagwisha igahenebera, bigisha ibidakwiye kubwo inyungu mbi.
Umwe muri bo w'umuvugishwa wabo yaravuze ati: "Na ntaryo Abanyakirete, ababeshi, ibikoko bibi n'abanebwe b'abakunzi b'inda."
Iyo ntahe yashinze ni iyo ukuri. Ni co gituma ukwiye kubahana cane, kugira ngo babe abahangaye mu kwizera,
ntibashire imitima ku migani y'ibinyoma y'Abayuda no ku vyagezwe vy'abantu batera ibitugu ukuri.
Ku badahumanye nta gihumanye, ariko ku banduye, batizera, nta kidahumanye, ariko ubwenge bwabo n'imitima ibagiriza vyaranduye.
Bavuga yuko bazi Imana, ariko bayihakanisha ivyo bakora; n'abo kwankwa urunuka, n'abatumvira Imana, no mu bikorwa vyiza vyose nta co bamaze.
Ariko weho uvuge ibihwanye na kwa kwigisha kuzima.
Bwira abatama ntibarenze urugero, babe inyankamugayo, badasaragurika, bagire kwizera kuzima no mu rukundo no mu kwihangana.
N'abatamakazi nyene, ubabwire bagende nk'uko bibereye abera, batarementaniriza abandi, batanohorwa imitima n'umuvinyu mwinshi, bigisha ivyiza,
kugira ngo batoze abagore bakiri bato ubwenge bwo gukunda abagabo babo n'abana babo,
no kudasaragurika, no kwirinda ubweruzi, no kwubaka ingo zabo, no kuba inda nziza, bagororokere abagabo babo, kugira ngo ijambo ry'Imana ntiritukwe.
N'imisore ni uko ubahanure ntibasaragurike;
