nawe ubwawe wiyerekane muri vyose nk'ikigereranyo c'ibikorwa vyiza, ugire ukwigisha kudatosekaye, ube inyankamugayo,
ugire n'ijambo rizima ritogawa, kugira ngo umuntu ari mu ruhande rw' abansi amaramare, abuze ikibi yotuvuga.
Hanura abakozi bagororokere ba shebuja, babahimbare muri vyose, ata guharira,
badakorakora, ariko berekane ukuyoboka kwiza kwose, kugira ngo muri vyose basharize ivyigishwa vy'Imana, Umukiza wacu.
Kuko ubuntu bw'Imana bwaserutse, buzanira abantu bose agakiza,
butwigisha kwikunkumura ukutubaha Imana n'ukwifuza ivyo isi, bukatwigisha kwama tudasaragurika, tugororoka, twubaha Imana, muri kino gihe,
twitega ivyizigiro vy'amahirwe no kuzoseruka kw'ubwiza bwa Yesu Kristo, ni we Mana yacu ihambaye n'Umukiza,
yatwiguze kugira ngo aducungure, adukureko ivyo twagabitanije vyose, kandi yihumanurire ubwoko ngo babe icibare ciwe, barwane ishaka ry'ibikorwa vyiza.
Wame uvuga ivyo, ubahanura, ubahana, nk'uwufise ububasha rwose. Ntihakagire uwugukengera.
Ubibutse kugamburukira abakuru n'abafise ubushobozi, no kubumvira, no kwitegurira igikorwa ciza cose,
no kutagira uwo bambika ibara, no kutitoraguza no kwengenga, berekana ubugwaneza bwose ku bantu bose.
Kuko natwe nyene kera twari ibipfu, turi intabarirwa, tuzimizwa, tujakariye ukwifuza n'ukwinezereza vy'uburyo bwinshi, twama tugira urwanko n'igono, turi abo kwankwa natwe twankana.
Ariko ineza y'Imana Umukiza wacu n'urukundo ikunda abantu, bimaze kuboneka,
iradukiza, itadukirishije ibikorwa vyo kugororoka twakoze, ariko, ikurikije ubwinshi bw'imbabazi zayo, idukirisha ukwozwa kuzana ukuvyarwa ubwa kabiri, ikadukirisha uguhindurwa basha na Mpwemu Yera,
uwo yaducuncuburiyeko kubwa Yesu Kristo Umukiza wacu,
kugira ngo tugirwe intungane n'ubuntu bwayo, duce tuba abaragwa b'ubugingo budashira, nk'uko tuvyizigiye.
Iryo jambo ni iryo kwizerwa, ndagomba yuko utsindagira ivyo, ubikobereje, kugira ngo abizeye Imana bagire umwete wo gushishikara gukora ibikorwa vyiza. Ivyo ni vyiza, bigira ico bimarira abantu.
Ariko, impari z'ubupfu no kudondora ivyo amamuko yabo n'imitongano no guharira ivyo mu vyagezwe, wame ubizibukira, kuko bitagira ikimazi kandi ari ivyo ubusa.
Uwuzana ibice ni wamara kumuhanura ubwa mbere n'ubwa kabiri akanka, ntukamwemere,
kuko uzi yuko uwumeze atyo agoramye kandi akora ivyaha, yitsindisha.
Ni nagutumako Arutema canke Tukiko, uzogire umwete wo kunsanga i Nikopoli; kuko ari ho nagabiye kuzomara agatasi.
Witwaririke guherekeza no gusezera neza Zena umuhinga w'ivyagezwe, na Apolo, kugira ngo ntihazogire ico babura.
Kandi abacu na bo ni bige gushishikara gukora ibikorwa vyiza ngo babone kumara ubukene ababikwiye rwose, kugira ngo abacu ntibabure ico bamarira abandi.
Abo turi kumwe bose baragutasha. Untahirize abadukunda dusangiye ukwizera. Ubuntu bubane namwe mwese.
Pahulo, imbohe ya Kristo Yesu, na Timoteyo umuvukanyi, turakwandikiye Filemoni uwo dukunda, dusangiye igikorwa,
na Apiya mushiki wacu, na Arukipo tusangiye urugamba, hamwe n'ishengero ryo mu nzu yawe.
Ubuntu n'amahoro biva ku Mana, Data wa twese, no ku Mwami Yesu Kristo bibabemwo.
Ndashima Imana yanje ubudasiba, ndaguhoza mu kanwa uko nsenze,
kuko numvise urukundo rwawe n'ukwizera Umwami Yesu kwawe, ukwo wereka abera bose.
Ndagusaba ngo ugufatanya kwawe mu kwizera gushobore vyinshi kubwa Kristo, mu kumenyekanisha ivyiza vyose vyo muri twebwe.
Kuko urukundo rwawe rwanteye umunezero mwinshi rukandemesha, kandi imitima y'abera warayiruhuye, muvukanyi."
Kubwo ivyo, naho mfise muri Kristo uburenganzira bwose bwo kugutegeka gukora ibikwiye,
ndahisemwo kukwinginga kubwo urukundo, uko ndi kwose Pahulo umutama, kandi ubu hoho ndi imbohe ya Kristo Yesu.
Ndakwitwayeko kubwo umwana wanje Onesimo uwo navyariye mu minyororo yanje,
atakugirira ikimazi kera, ariko noneho atugirira ikimazi twempi.
Ni we nyene ndakurungikiye, ni we mutima wanje.
Mba ndamugumije kugira ngo ankorere mu gishingo cawe, mboshwe n'iminyororo y'ubutumwa bwiza.
Ariko nta co ngomba gukora ntakugishije inama, kugira ngo iciza ukora ntikibe ico ugoberewe, ariko ugikore ubikunze.
Kumbure icatumye atandukanywa nawe igihe gito kwari ukugira ngo uzomwamane imisi yose.
Atakiri umushumba wawe, ariko aruta umushumba, ari umwana wa So, akundwa. Akundwa nanje cane, ariko arushiriza gukundwa nawe, mu vyo umubiri no mu Mwami wacu. "
Nuko namba unyiyumvira ko dusangiye igikorwa, umwakire nk'uko nanje wonyakiriye.
Ariko asangwa hari ico yaguhemukiyeko, canke hari umwenda agufitiye, ubimparureko.
Ni jewe Pahulo nandikishije ukuboko kwanje yuko nzovyishura. Reka ndeke kukubwira yuko uri n'umwenda wanje, uwo mwenda ni wewe ubwawe.
Ego, muvukanyi, ndakubonemwo ikimazi mu Mwami wacu; unduhure umutima muri Kristo.
Ndakwandikiye nizigiye ko uzonyumvira, nzi yuko uzokora n'ibiruta ivyo mvuze.
Kandi n'ikindi, untegurire indaro; kuko nizigiye yuko muzompabwa kubwo amasengesho yanyu.
Epafura, mugenzanje tubohanywe muri Kristo, aragutasha,
Mariko, Arisitariko, Dema na Luka, abo dusangiye igikorwa, baragutasha.
Ubuntu bw'Umwami Yesu Kristo bubane n'imitima yanyu. Amina. "
Kera mu bihe vyinshi no mu buryo bwinshi, Imana yaganiriye ba sogokuruza ibicishije mu kanwa k'abavugishwa nayo.
Muri iyi misi y'iherezo yatuganiriye mu kanwa k'Umwana wayo, uwo yashiriweho kuba samuragwa wa vyose, ni we yahaye kurema isi.

Uwo, kuko ari ugukayangana kw'ubwiza bwayo, n'ishusho y'akameremere kayo, kandi ashigikiza vyose ijambo ry'ubushobozi bwiwe, ahejeje gushiraho umwuhagiro w'ivyaha, avyagira i buryo bw'icubahiro c'ubwami bwo mw'ijuru;
amaze kuba uwuhambaye kurusha abamarayika, nk'uko izina yarazwe rirengeye ayabo.
Ni nde wo mu bamarayika Imana yigeze kubarira iti: "Uri Ubura bwanje? Uwu musi ndakuvyaye?" Kandi iti: "Nzomubera Se. Na we azombera Umwana wanje?"
Kandi aho izokwongera kuzana imfura yayo mw'isi izovuga iti: "Abamarayika b'Imana bose bamusenge."
Kandi ivyo abamarayika yarabivuze iti: "Ihindura abamarayika bayo imiyaga, Abasavyi bayo ibahindura imbeya z'umuriro."
Ariko, ivyo Umwana wayo yabivuze iti: "Ubutware bwawe, Mana, buhangamye ibihe bidashira, Icumu ry'ubutware bwawe n'icumu ry'uwuganza atunganye.
Wakunze ukugororoka, wanka ubugarariji, Ni co catumye Imana, ni yo Mana yawe, ikurobanuza amavuta y'umunezero, ikakurutisha bagenzi bawe."
Kandi ni wewe, Uhoraho, mu bihe vya kera washizeho itanguriro ry'isi, Kandi amajuru n'igikorwa c'intoke zawe.
Ivyo bizoshira, ariko weho uzokwamaho; Ivyo vyose bizosaza nk'impuzu,
Kandi uzobizinga nk'umutamana, Bikuranwe n'ibindi nk'uko impuzu zikuranywa. Ariko weho uri uko wamye, Imyaka y'ukubaho kwawe ntizoshira.
Ariko ni nde wo mu bamarayika yigeze kubarira iti: "Icara i buryo bwanje, Ushitse aho nzohindurira abansi bawe indava yo musi y'ibirenge vyawe?"
Mbega abamarayika bose si impwemu ziyikorera, zitumwa gukora igikorwa kubwo abazoragwa agakiza?
Ni co gituma dukwiye kurushiriza kwitwaririka ivyo twumvise, kugira ngo ntidutwarwe akayombekere tukabivako.
Ko ijambo ryavugiwe mu kanwa k'abamarayika ryagumyeho, kandi ibicumuro vyose no kutaryumvira bikagererwa ingero bikwiranye;
tweho tuzokwikiza dute, ni twanjanjwa ku gakiza kangana gatyo? Kabanje kuvugwa n'Umwami wacu, kakadukomezwako n'abakumvise,
Imana ifatanije na bo kugashingira intahe, iyishingisha ibimenyetso, ibitangaza, ibikomeye vy'uburyo bwinshi n'ingabire za Mpwemu Yera zagabanganijwe nk'uko yagomvye.
Kuko atari abamarayika Imana yahaye gutwara isi izobaho, iyo tuvuga.
Ariko hari aho umuntu yashinze intahe ati: "Umuntu aho umwibuka, Canke umwana w'umuntu aho umugendera?"
Wamucishije bugufi, aba musi y'abamarayika gato. Wamwambitse ubwiza n'icubahiro nk'igitsibo, Wamuhaye kugaba ibikorwa vy'amaboko yawe.
Wamuhaye kuganza ibintu vyose, ubishira musi y'ibirenge vyiwe. Ko Imana yamuhaye kuganza ibintu vyose nta co yishigarije itamuhaye kukiganza. Ariko none ntiturabona ibintu vyose biganzwa na we.

Ariko, uwacishijwe bugufi, akaba musi y' abamarayika gato, ni we Yesu, tumubona yambitswe ubwiza n'icubahiro nk'igitsibo, kubwo imibabaro y'urupfu, kugira ngo ubuntu bw'Imana butume arogorera umuntu wese urupfu.
Mu vy'ukuri vyari bikwiye ko Imana yo irema vyose kandi ikabibeshaho itunganisha Yesu ukubabazwa; kugira ngo abana benshi baze mu bwiza bwiwe. Kuko Yesu wenyene ari we ndongozi ibarongora ku gakiza.
Kuko uweza ni abezwa bose bakomotse kuri Imwe; ni co gituma atagira isoni zo kubita abana ba Se
ati: "Nzobarira abavukanyi izina ryawe, Nzoririmba ndagutazira hagati y'ishengero."
Kandi ati: "Nzokwama ndayizigira." Kandi ati: "Ehe twe n'abana Imana yampaye."
Nuko rero, kuko abana bahuje inyama n'amaraso, na we ubwiwe yahuje ivyo na bo, kugira ngo abone uko apfa, kandi urupfu rwiwe aruhindurishe ubusa uwufise ubushobozi bw'urupfu, ni we wa mugarariji,
kandi ngo arokore abajakariye ubwoba bw'urupfu bose, imisi yose y'ukubaho kwabo.
Kuko tuzi neza ko abamarayika atari bo yatoye, ariko yatoye uruvyaro rwa Aburahamu.
Ni co catumye vyaramubereye gushushanywa na abana ba Se kuri vyose, ngo abe umuherezi mukuru wo mu vy'Imana, w'imbabazi kandi agororoka, abe indishi y'ivyaha vy'abantu.
Kuko ubwiwe ko yababajwe no kugeragezwa, ashobora no gutabara abageragezwa.
Nuko rero, bavukanyi bera, abasangiye ihamagarwa riva mw'ijuru, ni mwitegereze Yesu, intumwa n'umuherezi mukuru w'ivyo twizeye tukavyatura,
agamburukira iyamutoranije, nk'uko Mose yayoboka mu rugo rwayo hose.
Kuko uwo yiyumviriwe ko akwiye guhabwa icubahiro kiruta ica Mose, nk'uko ishimwe ry'uwubatse urugo riruta iryo urugo.
Kuko urugo rwose rugira uwurwubaka, ariko Imana ni yo yubatse ibintu vyose.
Kandi Mose yayoboka mu rugo rwayo hose nk'umushumba, kugira ngo abe icabona co gushingira intahe ibizovugwa hanyuma.
Nuko, nk'uko Mpwemu Yera avuga ati: "Uwu musi aho mwumvira Ijwi ryayo,
Ntimukomantaze imitima yanyu, nk'uko mwayikomantaje mu gihe co kuratsa, Kuri wa musi wo kugerageza mu bugaragwa,
Aho ba sogokuruza banyu bangeragereje bancaca, Bakabona ibikorwa vyanje imyaka mirongo ine.
Ni co catumye ngirira umwikomo abo ico gihe, Nkavuga ko bama bazimira mu mitima yabo, Kandi ntibamenya inzira zanje;
Nk'uko narahiranye ishavu ryanje Nti: "Ntibazoshika mu buruhukiro bwanje."
Bavukanyi, ni mwirinde, ntihagire uwo muri mwebwe agira umutima mubi utizera, umutera kureka Imana nzima.
Ariko muhanurane uko bukeye bicitwa uwu musi, ntihagire uwo muri mwebwe akomantazwa umutima n'uruhendo rw'icaha.
Kuko twacitse abasangiye Kristo, namba dukomeje rwose ivyizigiro vyacu twatanguranye gushitsa kw'iherezo;
bikivugwa, ngo uwu musi aho mwumvira ijwi ryayo, Ntimukomantaze imitima yanyu, nk'uko mwayikomantaje mu gihe co kuratsa.
Ni ba nde bamaze kwumva bakayiratsa? Mbega si abavuye i Misiri bose, barongowe na Mose?
Kandi ni ba nde yagiriye umwikomo imyaka mirongo ine? Si abacumuye, imivyimba yabo igahindikirana mu bugaragwa?
Ni ba nde yarahiye ko batazoshika mu buruhukiro bwayo? Si abatayumviye?
Kandi tubona ko batashoboye kubushikamwo, kuko batizeye.
Nuko, kuko isezerano ryo gushika mu buruhukiro bwayo rikiriho, twiyubare kugira ngo kumbure ntihagire uwo muri mwebwe yiyumvirwa ko akererewe.
Kuko natwe twabwiwe ubutumwa bwiza nka bo, ariko, ijambo bumvise ntiryabagiriye ikimazi, kuko ritavanzwe n'ukwizera mu mitima y'abaryumvise.

Kuko twebwe abizeye dushika muri ubwo buruhukiro, nk'uko yavuze iti: "Nk'uko narahiranye ishavu ryanje Ko batazoshika mu buruhukiro bwanje; naho yari yarahejeje ibikorwa vyayo, uhereye ku kuremwa kw'isi."
Kuko hari aho yavuze ku vyo umusi w'indwi nk'ibi iti: "Imana yaruhutse ku musi ugira indwi ibikorwa vyayo vyose."
Kandi na hano, ngo Ntibazoshika mu buruhukiro bwanje.
Nuko rero, kuko bukibikiwe bamwe ngo babushikemwo, ariko ababanje kubwirwa ubutumwa bwiza babujijwe kubushikamwo no kutumvira Imana,
yongera gutoranya umusi, ni wo uwu musi; ivugira mu kanwa ka Dawidi, igihe kirekire cane gihise, nk'uko tumaze kuvuga tuti: "Uwu musi aho mwumvira ijwi ryayo Ntimukomantaze imitima yanyu."
Kuko iyaba Yosuwa yarabaruhuye, ntiba yaravuze ubwa nyuma ivyo uwundi musi.
Nuko rero haracariho uburuhukiro bw'isabato bubikiwe abantu b'Imana.
Kuko uwushitse mu buruhukiro bwayo, na we aba aruhutse ibikorwa vyiwe, nk'uko Imana yaruhutse ivyayo.
Nuko tugire umwete wo gushika muri ubwo buruhukiro, ntihagire umuntu agwa, akurikiye ikigereranyo ca ba bandi co kutumvira Imana.

Kuko ijambo ry'Imana ari rizima, rifise ubushobozi, rifise ubugi buruta ubwo inkota zose, rikinjira n'aho ritanya ubugingo n'impwemu, rigatanya ingingo n'umusokoro, risuzuma ivyo umutima wiyumvira, ukagabira.
Kandi imbere yayo nta caremwe gihishijwe, ariko vyose vyambaye ubusa, biragaragara, imbere y'amaso y'Iyizotubaza ivyo twakoze.
Nuko, ko dufise umuherezi mukuru akomeye, yaciye mw'ijuru, ni Yesu Umwana w'Imana, tubangirize ivyo twizera tukavyatura.
Kuko umuherezi mukuru dufise, atari uwudashobora kubabarana natwe mu ntege nke zacu, ariko ni uwageragejwe uburyo bwose nkatwe, yamara we nta caha yakoze.
Nuko ni twegere intebe y'ubuntu dushize ubwoba, kugira ngo turonke ikigongwe, tubone ubuntu bwo kudutabara mu gihe gikwiye.
Umuherezi wese mukuru, kuko yarobanuwe mu bantu, ashirirwaho gukorera Imana kubwo abantu, kugira ngo ashikane amashikanwa, atange ikimazi, vyompi vy'ivyaha;
kandi ashobora kwihanganira inyoberwa n'abazimiye, kuko na we nyene hari aho agira intege nke.
Ni co gituma akwiye no kwitangira ibimazi vy'ivyaha vyiwe, nk'uko abitangira abandi bantu.
Nta muntu yiha ico cubahiro, kiretse ahamagawe n'Imana, nk'uko Aroni yahamagawe.
Ni ko biri, na Kristo si we yihaye ico cubahiro co kuba umuherezi mukuru, ariko yagihawe n'iyamubariye iti: "Uri Ubura bwanje, Uwu musi ndakuvyaye."
Nk'uko yavuze ahandi iti: "Uri umuherezi ibihe bidashira, Mu buryo bwa Melekisedeki."
Kristo mu misi yabaye mu mubiri, amaze kwinginga no gusenga cane iyashoboye kumukiza urupfu, atakamba cane arira, kandi amaze kwumvirwa kubwo kuyubaha kwiwe,
naho yari Umwana, yigishwa kwumvira Imana n'ivyo yababajwe,
kandi amaze guhingurwa rwose, abera abamwumvira bose inyanduruko y'agakiza kadashira,
Imana imaze kumwita umuherezi mukuru mu buryo bwa Melekisedeki.
Tumufiseko vyinshi vyo kuvuga, kandi bigoye isobanura, kuko mwabaye ibitumva.

Naho mwari mugeze kuba abigisha, kuko mumaze igihe kirekire mwiga, mukwiye kwongera kwigishwa namwe nyene ivya mbere vy'itanguriro ry'ivyavuzwe n'Imana. Kandi mwahindutse abakwiye gutungwa n'amata, si ukugaburirwa ivyo kurya bigumye.
Nuko uwutunzwe n'amata aba ataramenya ijambo ry'ukugororoka, kuko aba ari uruhinja.
Ariko, ivyo kurya bigumye ni ivyo abakuze, bafise ubwenge, maze kubwo kwama babukoresha, bumenyera gutandukanya ikibi n'iciza.
Nuko rero turengane ivya mbere vya Kristo, twigire imbere, dushike ku vyo gutunganywa rwose, ntidusubire gushiraho itanguriro ryo kwihana ibikorwa vy'impfagusa, no kwizera Imana,
no kwigisha ivyo kubatizwa, ivyo kurambikwako ibiganza, ivyo kuzuka kw'abapfuye, ivyo gutsindwa n'urubanza kw'ibihe bidashira.
Imana ni yabikunda turagenza dutyo.
Kuko abamaze kwakirwa n'umuco, bagatamira ingabire iva mw'ijuru, bagasangira Mpwemu Yera,
bagatamira ijambo ryiza ry'Imana, n'ububasha bwo mu gihe kizoza,
maze bakagwa bakabivamwo, ntibishoboka gusubira kubahindura bashasha ngo bihane. Kuko bongera kwibambira Umwana w'Imana, bakamuteterereza ahibonekeza.
Indimo zinyoye imvura yaziguyeko kenshi, iyo zimezemwo ibirimwa bikwiye abazirimiwe, zironka umugisha w'Imana.
Ariko iyo zimezemwo imikere n'ibitovu, ziba zisivye, ziba zisigaje gatoya zikavumwa, iherezo ryazo ni uguturirwa.
Ariko, abo nkunda, naho tuvuze dutyo, turazi ivyanyu tudakekeranya yuko birusha ivyo kuba vyiza, kandi bizanana n'agakiza.
Imana ntigabitanya ngo yibagire ibikorwa vyanyu n'urukundo mwerekanye ko mukunze izina ryayo, kuko mwatunga abera, na none mukibatunze.
Kandi turagomba cane yuko umuntu wese wo muri mwebwe yerekana uwo mwete nyene w'ivyizigiro vyuzuye gushitsa kw'iherezo;
kugira ngo ntimube ibinebwe, ariko mwigane abaheshwa n'ukwizera n'ukwihangana kuragwa ivyasezeranywe.
Hamwe Imana yasezeranira Aburahamu isezerano, kuko ata we yogira indahiro ayiruta, yarirahiye
iti: "Eka no kuguha umugisha nzowuguha, kandi no kukugwiza nzokugwiza."
Ni ko vyamubereye amaze kwihangana, ahabwa ivyasezeranywe.
Kuko abantu bagira indahiro uwubaruta, no mu mpari zabo zose indahiro irengeje ikaba ari yo iziheraheza.
Ni co catumye Imana, kuko igomba kurushiriza kwereka abaragwa b'ivyasezeranywe ingene imigabo yayo idahinduka, ishira hagati indahiro kuba umuhuza;
kugira ngo bibiri bidahinduka, ivyo Imana itabasha kubesheramwo, biduheshe kurema cane, twebwe ahashitse mu buhungiro, ni bwo kugumya cane ivyizigiro vyashizwe imbere yacu.
Ivyo vyizigiro tubifise nk'ikizirika umutima kigumye, gikomeye, cinjira hirya y'igitambara gikingiriye ahera cane,
aho Yesu yatwinjiriye, atwitangiye imbere, amaze guhinduka umuherezi mukuru w'ibihe bidashira mu buryo bwa Melekisedeki.
Uwo Melekisedeki, umwami w'i Salemu, umuherezi w'Imana Isumbavyose, ni we yasanganiye Aburahamu, aramuhezagira, hamwe Aburahamu yagaruka, avuye kunesha abami.
Ni we kandi Aburahamu yagabanirije ikigira icumi muri vyose, irya mbere asobanurwa, ngo Umwami agororoka, kandi irya kabiri yitwa Umwami w'i Salemu, risobanurwa, ngo Umwami w'amahoro.
Nta se, nta nyina, nta mamuko, nta tanguriro ry'imisi canke iherezo ry'ubugingo, ariko agereranywa n'Umwana w'Imana, kandi na ntaryo ahora ari umuherezi.
Nuko mwiyumvire uwo muntu ingene ahambaye, uwo Aburahamu sogokuruza mukuru yahaye icacumi co mu minyago iruta iyindi.
Kandi mu bana ba Lewi, ivyagezwe bigera yuko abahawe ubuherezi batangisha abantu icacumi, ni bo bavukanyi, naho abo bakomotse mu rura rwa Aburahamu.
Ariko wa wundi adaharurwa mu muryango wabo yatangishije Aburahamu ikigira icumi, kandi ahezagira nyene gusezeranywa.
Ariko nta wohakana ko uworoshe adahezagirwa n'uwumurengeye.
Kandi muri twebwe, abantu bapfa ni bo bahabwa icacumi, ariko muri ya yandi majambo cahawe uwushingirwa intahe ko ariho.
Kandi twoshobora kuvuga yuko Lewi, umwe ahabwa icacumi, na we yari yaragitanze muri Aburahamu,
kuko yari akiri mu rura rwa sekuruza, hamwe Melekisedeki yamusanganira.

None iyaba gutunganywa rwose kwazanywe n'ubuherezi bw'Abalewi,--kuko ku butware bwabwo ari ho ubwo bwoko bwahawe ivyagezwe,--ni iki catumye bigikwiye ko haboneka uwundi muherezi wo mu buryo bwa Melekisedeki, atavugwa mu buryo bwa Aroni?
Iyo ubuherezi buhindutse, ivyagezwe ntibibura guhinduka na vyo.
Kuko uwavuzweko ivyo, ari uwo mu wundi muryango, utigeze kuvamwo uwakoze igikorwa co ku gicaniro.
Birazwi yuko Umwami wacu yakomotse kuri Yuda, kandi uwo muryango Mose nta co yawuvuzeko c'ubuherezi.
Ivyo birushiriza guseruka rwose, ko haboneka uwundi muherezi, ahwanye na Melekisedeki,
atahawe ubuherezi n'uko vyashinzweho n'ivyagezwe vyo mu buryo bw'abantu, ariko yahawe ubushinzwe n'ubushobozi bw'ubugingo budashobora gukurwaho.
Kuko ashingirwa intahe, ngo uri umuherezi ibihe bidashira, Mu buryo bwa Melekisedeki.
Nuko rero icagezwe ca mbere cakuweho kubwo inkomezi nke zaco n'ikimazi gike,
(kuko ivyagezwe bitigeze kugira ico bihingura rwose) hasubizwaho ivyizigiro bikiruta, biduhesha kwegera Imana.
Kandi ivyo ntivyabaye hatariho indahiro.
Abalewi bo bahawe ubuherezi ata ndahiro; ariko iyabuhaye uwo yararahiye, imubwiye iti: "Uhoraho ararahiye," ntazokwicuza Ati: "Uri umuherezi ibihe bidashira."
Uko ni ko Yesu yabaye umwishinzi w'isezerano riruta rya rindi.
Kandi ba bandi Babaye abaherezi benshi, kuko urupfu rubabuza kwamaho;
ariko uwo we, kuko yamaho ibihe bidashira, afise ubuherezi budakurwaho.
Ni co gituma ashobora gukiza rwose abashikira Imana kubwiwe kuko na ntaryo yamaho ngo abasabire.
Vyari bitubereye kugira umuherezi mukuru ameze atyo, yera, atagira ubugunge, atanduye, yatandukanijwe n'abanyavyaha, yashizwe hejuru y'amajuru,
atarinda kubanza gutanga ibimazi vy'ivyaha vyiwe uko bukeye, nka ba baherezi bakuru bandi, hanyuma agatanga ivyo abandi bantu. Kuko ivyo yabikoze rimwe, hamwe yitanga.
Ivyagezwe bishiraho abanyantege nke kuba abaherezi bakuru, ariko ijambo ry'indahiro yaherukiye ivyagezwe rishiraho Umwana w'Imana yahinguwe rwose gushitsa ibihe bidashira.
Mu yo tuvuga, yose arutwa na rimwe, ni iri: dufise umuherezi mukuru ameze atyo, avyagiye i buryo bw'intebe y'Iyihambaye cane yo mw'ijuru,
akorera ahera, no mw'ihema nyakuri, ryashinzwe n'Uhoraho atari abantu.
Kuko umuherezi mukuru wese ashirirwaho gushikana amashikanwa no gucumita ibimazi. Ni co gituma wa wundi na we akwiye kugira ico ashikana.
Iyaba ari mw'isi ntiyobaye umuherezi, kuko hari abandi bashikana amashikanwa nk'uko ivyagezwe bibibwiriza.

Kandi abo bakorera igishushanyo n'igitutu c'ivyo mw'ijuru, nk'uko Mose yabwiwe n' Imana, agira akoreshe rya hema iti: "Ugire umwete wo gukoresha vyose, ubigereranye n'ikigereranyo werekewe kuri wa musozi."
Ariko none, igikorwa yahawe kirusha icabo kuba ciza, nk'uko ari umuhuza w'isezerano riruta iryabo, kuko ryashizweho n'ivyasezeranywe biruta ivyo iryabo.
Iyo rya rindi rya mbere ritabako agasembwa, ntihari hakwiye kuronderwa irindi.
Kuko yavuze ibagaya iti: "Ehe imisi igira ize," ni jewe Uhoraho ndabivuze, Aho nzosezerana isezerano rishasha n'inzu ya Isirayeli n'umuryango wa Yuda,
ridahwanye n'isezerano nasezeranye na ba sekuruza, Ku musi nabafata ukuboko nkabakura mu gihugu ca Misiri, Kuko batagumye mw'isezerano ryanje, Nanje sinabababara, ni jewe Uhoraho ndabivuze.

Kuko iri ari ryo sezerano nzosezerana n'umuryango w'Abisirayeli Hanyuma y'iyo misi, ni jewe Uhoraho ndabivuze. Nzoshira ivyagezwe vyanje mu bwenge bwabo, No ku mitima yabo kandi ni ho nzovyandika, Nanje nzobabera Imana, Na bo bazoba abantu banje.
Kandi ntibazokwigishanya, ngo umuntu wese yigishe mugenzi we, Canke ngo yigishe uwo bavukana ati: "Menya Uhoraho, Kuko bose bazonyimenyera, Uhereye k'uwo hasi ugashitsa k'uwuhambaye muri bo.
Kuko nzobagirira ikigongwe ku kugabitanya kwabo, Kandi ivyaha vyabo sinzovyibuka ukundi.
Ko avuga ati: "Isezerano rishasha rero irya mbere yarishajishije; ariko igisaza kikaba akaheze kiba kigira gikamangane.
Nuko isezerano rya mbere na ryo ryarimwo ibirongora ivyo ubuherezi, rifise n'ahera, ariko ho muri iyi si.
Kuko hari ihema ryubatswe, mu ryo hino harimwo igiterekwako amatara, imeza n'imitsima yagenewe gushikanirwa Imana yama kuri yo. Iryo ryitwa Ahera.
Kandi hirya y'igihuzu ca kabiri gikinze, hari ihema ryitwa Ahera Cane.

Harimwo igicaniro co guturirirako imibavu cakozwe mw'izahabu, harimwo n'isandugu y'isezerano yometsweko izahabu impande zose, irimwo urwavya rw'izahabu rurimwo manu, irimwo na ya nkoni ya Aroni yashurika, na vya bisate vy' amabuye vyanditsweko isezerano.
Kandi hejuru yayo hari abakerubi b'ubwiza bateye igitutu umutemere wo gutangirako ibimazi; ivyo ntidushobora kubidonda kimwekimwe ubu nyene.
Nuko ivyo vyateguwe bityo, abaherezi na ntaryo bama binjira mw'ihema ryo hino, kugira ngo bashitse ivyo ubuherezi.
Ariko mu rya kabiri hinjiramwo umuherezi mukuru wenyene, rimwe gusa uko umwaka uheze, ariko ntiyinjiramwo atajanye amaraso yo kwitangira no gutangirira ivyaha vy'abantu batabizi.
Mpwemu Yera amenyekanisha atyo yuko inzira ija ahera cane itaribwerekanwe, ihema rya mbere rikiriho.
Ni ryo kigereranyo c'igihe ca none, abakurikira ivyagezwe vyaryo bashikana ibimazi bagatanga ibimazi, ariko ku ruhande rw'ijwi ryo mu mutima ntibishobora gutunganya usenga,
kuko ivyo, hamwe n'ivyo ivyo kurya, ivyo kunywa, ivyo kwiyuhagira bo n'ukwoza vy'uburyo bwinshi, ari amabwirizwa yo mu buryo bw'abantu gusa, yashinzwe gushitsa igihe co gutunganywa.
Ariko Kristo amaze kuza, umuherezi mukuru w'ivyiza bizoza, aca mw'ihema rirusha rya rindi kuba irihambaye n'iritunganye rwose, ritakozwe n'intoke, bisobanurwa ngo ritari iryo mu vyaremwe vy'ubu.
Kandi amaraso y'impene canke ayo amashuri, si yo yamushikanye ahera cane, ariko yahashikanywe n'amaraso yiwe rimwe gusa, yironkeye ugucungura kw'ibihe bidashira.
None amaraso y'impene n'ayo impfizi bo n'umunyota w'inka yavutse ubwa mbere umijwe abahumanye, ko vyeza imibiri igahumanuka,

mbega amaraso ya Kristo, uwo yitanze ku Mana atagira agasembwa, abitewe na Mpwemu ahoraho, ntazorushiriza guhumanura imitima yanyu ngo ibikorwa vy'impfagusa biyivemwo, kugira ngo mubone ingene mukorera Imana nzima?
Ni co gituma aba umuhuza, ahesha isezerano risha, kugira ngo abahamagawe bahabwe umwandu udashira w'isezerano, bitewe n'uko habayeho urupfu rucungura abacumuye bakiganzwa n'isezerano rya mbere.
Kuko aho ikete ry'iragi riri hakwiye rwose yuko urupfu rw'uwaraze ruseruka.
Ikete ry'iragi kibeshwaho n'urupfu rwonyene, kuko ritagira ikimazi uwaraze akiriho.
Ni co gituma isezerano rya mbere ritasezeranywe ata maraso.

Mose amaze kubwira abantu bose amabwirizwa yose nk'uko vyagezwe, yakira amaraso y'ishuri n'ayo impene, amazi n'ubwoya bw'intama bujobetswe agahama, yakira na ezobu, acucagira bacucagirisha. Igitabo c'ivyagezwe, bo n'abantu bose,
arababwira ati: "Aya ni yo maraso y'isezerano Imana yabagereye."
Kandi ihema n'ibikoresho vyose vy'ivyo ubuherezi, na vyo ni uko abicucagira amaraso.
Nk'uko ivyagezwe biri, ibintu ni nka vyose vyozwa n'amaraso, kandi hatavuye amaraso ntihaba guharirwa ivyaha.
Nuko vyari bibereye ko ibigereranyo vy'ivyo mw'ijuru vyozwa n'ivyo bimazi, ariko, ivyo mw'ijuru ubwavyo bikozwa n'ibimazi biruta ivyo.
Kuko Kristo atinjiye ahera cane hakozwe n'intoke, h'ikigereranyo c'aho ukuri, ariko yinjiye mw'ijuru ubwaho, kugira ngo noneho aduserukire imbere y'amaso y'Imana.
Kandi ntiyashikanyweyo no kwitanga kenshi, nk'uko umuherezi mukuru yinjira ahera cane uko umwaka uheze, ajanye amaraso atari ayiwe;
kuko iyo biba bityo, aba yari akwiye kubabazwa kenshi uhereye ku kuremwa kw'isi. Yamara ubu yabonetse rimwe kw'iherezo ry'ibihe, kugira ngo akuzeho icaha ukwitanga.
Kandi nk'uko abantu babikiwe gupfa rimwe, hanyuma yaho hakaza imanza,
na Kristo ni uko, yamaze gutangwa rimwe ngo yishireko ivyaha vya benshi, azoboneka ubwa kabiri, atazanywe n'ivyaha, abonekere abamwiteze ngo abakize.
Ivyagezwe ko bifise igitutu c'ivyiza bizoza, bidafise ishusho bwite y'ivyo vyiza, nta ho vyoshobora guhingura abegera igicaniro, bibahingurisha ivyo bimazi nyene bahora batanga imyaka n'imyaka.
Iyo bibishobora, mbega ntibaba barasizeho kubitanga? Kuko abavyitangirira bamaze guhumanurwa rwose rimwe, bataba bakigira imitima irimwo ijwi ribagiriza ivyaha.
Ariko muri ivyo bimazi hari icibukiriza ivyaha uko umwaka uheze.
Kuko bidashoboka ko amaraso y'impfizi n'ayo impene akuraho ivyaha.
Ni co catumye, hamwe yaza mw'isi, avuga Ati: "Ibimazi n'amashikanwa ntiwabigomvye, Ariko wanteguriye umubiri."
Ibimazi bituriwe bitagabanije, n'ibimazi vy'ivyaha, ntivyaguhimbaye.
Mperako ndavuga nti: "Ehe ndaje, (Mu muzingo w'igitabo ni ko binyanditsweko) Nzanywe no gukora ivyo ugomba, Mana."
Ahejeje kuvuga haruguru ati: "Ibimazi n'amashikanwa, n'ibimazi bituriwe bitagabanije n'ibimazi vy'ivyaha, ntiwabigomvye kandi ntivyaguhimbaye (ni vyo bitangwa nk'uko bibwirijwe n'ivyagezwe),"
aherako aravuga ati: "Ehe nzanywe no gukora ivyo ugomba." Akuraho ivya mbere ngo ashinge ivya kabiri.
Ukwo kugomba kwayo ni kwo kwatumye twezwa, tubiheshwa n'uko umubiri wa Yesu Kristo watanzwe rimwe gusa.
Kandi umuherezi wese ahagarara uko bukeye akora ivyo ubuherezi, atanga kenshi ivyo bimazi nyene, ata ho vyoshobora gukuraho ivyaha na mba.
Ariko uwo we, amaze gutanga ikimazi kimwe c'ivyaha kidahinduka, avyagira i buryo bw'Imana,
aheraho, arorera igihe abansi biwe bazohindurirwa intebe yo musi y'ibirenge vyiwe.
Kuko ikimazi kimwe ari co yatunganishije rwose abezwa, ukazoshitsa ibihe bidashira.
Kandi na Mpwemu Yera ni we cabona kidushingira intahe y'ivyo. Amaze kuvuga
ati: "Iri ni ryo sezerano nzosezerana na bo Hanyuma y'iyo misi, ni jewe Uhoraho ndabivuze; Nzoshira ivyagezwe vyanje mu mitima yabo, No mu bwenge bwabo kandi ni ho nzovyandika; arongera
ati: "Kandi ivyaha vyabo n'ukugabitanya kwabo sinzovyibuka ukundi."
Ariko, aho ivyo bihariwe, ntihaba hakiriho gutanga ikimazi c'ivyaha.
Nuko bavukanyi, ko turi n'ubushizi bw'ubwoba bwo gushikanwa ahera cane n'amaraso ya Yesu,
duciye mu nzira yadutoboreye nshasha iri n'ubugingo, ica mu gihuzu gikinze, bisobanurwa ngo mu mubiri wiwe;
kandi ko dufise umuherezi akomeye aganza urugo rw'Imana.
Twegereze dufise imitima y'ukuri, twizeye ata mazinda, imitima yacu yogejwe ngo ivanwemwo ibitwagiriza bibi, imibiri yacu yuhagijwe amazi meza.
Tugumye ukwatura ivyizigiro vyacu ntikunyiganyige, kuko uwasezeranye ari uwo kwizerwa,
kandi twiyumviraneko, kugira ngo duterane umwete wo gukundana n'iryo ibikorwa vyiza.
Ntiduhebe gukoranira hamwe, nk'uko bamwe bagira, ariko duhanurane, kandi uko mubonye wa musi wegereza, murushirize kugenza mutyo.
Kuko namba dukora ivyaha ibigirankana, kandi tumaze guhabwa kumenya ivyo ukuri, ntihaba hagisigaye ikimazi c'ivyaha,
ariko haba hasigaye kwitegana ubwoba gutsindwa n'urubanza, no kwitega umuriro w'inkazi, uzorigata abansi b'Imana.
Uwukengereye ivyagezwe vya Mose, ivyabona bibiri canke bitatu biramwicisha, ata kagongwe.
Mugira ngo umuntu ntazoba akwiye guhanwa ibirushirije cane, asiribanze Umwana w'Imana, akiyumvira amaraso y'isezerano yamwejeje ko ari igihumane, agacokora Mpwemu w'ubuntu?
Kuko tuzi uwavuze ati: "Uguhora ni ukwanje, ni jewe nzobasubiriza mu nkoko." Kandi ati: "Uhoraho azocira urubanza abantu biwe.
Erega birateye ubwoba gukorokera mu maboko y'Imana nzima."
Ariko mwibuke imisi ya mbere, hamwe mwari mumaze kwakirwa n'umuco, mwihanganira ibisinzikaza vy'indwano nyinshi;
kimwe, mwacitse akamenyero mutukwa mubabazwa; ikindi, mwafatanije n'abagirirwa batyo.
Kuko mwababaranye n'ababoshwe, kandi mwemeye munezerewe kunyagwa ivyo mutunze, mumenya yuko mufise itunga riruta ivyo kuba ryiza, rikamaho.
Nuko ntimute ubushizi bw'ubwoba bwanyu! buri n'impera ikomeye.
Kuko mukwiye kwihangana, kugira ngo ni mwamara gukora ivyo Imana igomba mubone guhabwa ivyasezeranywe.
Kuko hasigaye igihe gito cane, Kandi uwugira aze, azoza, ntazoteba.
Ariko, umugororotsi wanje azobeshwaho n'ukwizera, Naho ni yisokora ntazohimbara umutima wanje.
Ariko tweho ntituri abo mu bisokora bagahona, ariko turi abo mu bizera, ubugingo bwabo bugakizwa.
Ukwizera ni ukumenya rwose ivyizigirwa, udakekeranya ngo ntibizoba, kandi ibitabonwa ni kwo kubitumenyesha ko ari ivyo ukuri.
Icatumye aba kera bashingirwa intahe ni uko bari bagufise.
Ukwizera ni kwo kutumenyesha yuko isi yaremwe n'ijambo ry'Imana, ni co catumye ibiboneka bitaremwe mu biseruka.

Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Abeli aha Imana ikimazi kiruta ica Kayini, ni kwo kwamuhesheje gushingirwa intahe ko ari umugororotsi, hamwe Imana yashingira intahe ibimazi vyiwe yuko ari vyiza, kandi ni kwo kwatumye n'ubu akivuga, naho yapfuye.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Henoki ajanwa mw'ijuru, ngo ntabone urupfu, kandi ntiyaboneka, kuko Imana yamujanye. Kuko yashingiwe intahe atarajanwa yuko yahimbaye Imana.
Kandi uwutizera ntibishoboka ko ayihimbara; kuko uwegera Imana akwiye kwizera yuko iriho, igaha impera abayirondera.

Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Nowa yubaha, amaze kuburirwa n'Imana ibitaribwaboneke, akabaza ubwato bwo kurokora abo mu nzu yiwe, kandi ni kwo kwamuhaye gutsindisha abari mw'isi, no kuragwa ukugororoka kuzanwa n'ukwizera.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Aburahamu yumvira Imana imuhamagaye, akaja ahantu yari abikiwe kuragwa. Nuko agenda, atazi iyo aja.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye aba umwimuka mu gihugu yasezeraniwe, nk'ikitari iciwe, akabana mu mahema na Isaka na Yakobo, abaraganywe na we ivyo vyasezeranywe.
Kuko yari arorereye ca gisagara cubatswe kw'umushinge, umugezi n'umwubatsi waco n'Imana.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye na Sara ashobozwa gusama inda, naho yari yaraciye, kuko yiyumviriye yuko iyasezeranye ari iyo kwizerwa.
Ni co catumye umuntu umwe--kandi uwo yari akaheze--yamukwako n'isinzi nk'inyenyeri zo kw'ijuru, kandi n'abangana n'umusenyi utoharurika uri kw'isesero ry'ikiyaga utoharurika.
Abo bose bapfuye bacizeye, batarahabwa ivyasezeranywe, ariko barabibona biri kure bakabisanganira, bakemera ko ari akavantara n'ingenzi kw'isi.
Abavuga batyo baba berekana yuko barondera igihugu cabo bwite.
Iyo baba barakumbuye ico bavuyemwo, baba barabonye uburyo bwo gusubirayo.
Ariko noneho barifuza igihugu kirushije ico kuba ciza, ni ico mw'ijuru. Ni co gituma Imana itamaramazwa no kwitwa Imana yabo, kuko yabateguriye igisagara.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Aburahamu atanga Isaka ko ikimazi, hamwe yagezwa; mbere uwari yarakiranye igishika amasezerano, yariko aratanga umwana wiwe w'ikinege kw'ikimazi,
uwo yari yarabariwe ivyiwe, ngo Kuri Isaka ni ho uruvyaro rwawe ruzokwitirirwa;
kuko yishimiye yuko Imana ishobora no kuzura abapfuye, ni co catumye amugarurirwa nk'uwuzutse.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Isaka ahezagira Yakobo na Esawu abahesha imigisha y'ibizoba.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Yakobo, aho yagira acikane, ahezagira abana ba Yosefu bompi, agasenga yishimikije ipfundo ry'inkoni yiwe.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Yosefu, aho yagira apfe, avuga ivyo kuvayo kw'Abisirayeli, agatanga amategeko y'ivyo amagufa yiwe.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Mose, amaze kuvuka, anyegezwa n'abavyeyi biwe amezi atatu, kuko babonye ko ari akana keza, ntibatinya ibwirizwa ry'umwami.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Mose, amaze gukura, yanka kwitwa umwana w'umukobwa wa Farawo,
agahitamwo kugiriranwa nabi n'abantu b'Imana, akabirutisha kumara igihe mu bihimbaro vy'ivyaha.
Kuko yiyumviriye yuko gucokoranwa na Kristo ari ubutunzi burengeye itunga ryo mu Misiri, kuko yatumbera ingero azogererwa.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye ava mu Misiri, ntiyatinya ishavu ry'umwami, kuko yashikamye nk'aho abona Iyitaboneka.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye ashinga Pasika, no kumijagira amaraso, kugira ngo uwuhonya imfura ntabakoreko.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye baca mu Kiyaga Gitukura, nk' abaca ku musozi, ariko Abanyamisiri babigejeje, bararengerwa.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye impome z'amabuye z'i Yeriko zisenyuka, bamaze kuzikikuza imisi indwi.
Ukwizera ni kwo kwatumye Rahabu, maraya, ataranduranwa n'abatumviye Imana, kuko yakiranye amahoro abaje gusuma urusaku.
Mvuge ikindi ki? Kuko igihe condengana ndondoye ivya Gideyoni, ivya Baraki, ivya Samusoni, ivya Yefuta, ivya Dawidi, ivya Samweli n'ivyo abavugishwa n'Imana,
baheshejwe n'ukwizera gutsinda abami, no gukora ibigororotse, no kuronka ivyasezeranywe, no kuziba iminwa y'intambwe,
no kuzimya ubukare bw'umuriro, no gukira ubugi bw'inkota, no guhindurwa mu ntege nke ngo zicike inkomezi, no kuba agahebuza mu ntambara, no kunesha ingabo z'abanyamahanga.
Abagore basubiye kubona abo babuze kuko bazutse, abandi bicishwa amahiri ntibemera gucungurwa, kugira ngo bazohabwe ukuzuka kurushiriza kuba kwiza.
Abandi bageragereshwa gushinyagurirwa no gukubitwa ibimoko, mbere bashirwa mu migozi no mu mabohero;
bicishijwe amabuye, bakerewemwo kubiri, barageragejwe, bicishijwe inkota, bayerera bambaye insato z'intama n'izo impene, bari baburaniwe, bababazwa, bagirirwa nabi,
(isi ntiyari ibabereye ko bayibamwo), bayerera mu bugaragwa no mu misozi no mu masenga yo mu vyobo.
Abo bose bamaze gushingirwa intahe kubwo ukwizera kwabo, ntibahabwa ivyasezeranywe,
kuko Imana yabonye kera ikirushiriza kutubera iciza, kugira ngo abo ntibatunganywe rwose tutari kumwe.
Nuko natwe, ko dukikijwe n'igipfungu c'ivyabona kingana gityo, twiyambure ibituremera vyose, n'icaha gikunda kutwizingirako vuba, dusiganirwe ivyo twashizwe imbere twihanganye,

dutumbereye Yesu wenyene, ni we nyanduruko yo kwizera kandi ni we yagusozereye. Uwo, kubwo umunezero yashizwe imbere, yihanganiye umusaraba, arihangana ntiyagira isoni zawo, avyagira i buryo bw'intebe y'Imana.
Nuko mushire imitima kuri uwo yihanganiye ibihari bihambaye bityo abanyavyaha bamuharirije, ntimudohoke, ntimwihebure mu mitima yanyu.
Ntimuragera ku kuvishwa amaraso murwanya icaha,
kandi mwibagiye rya jambo ribahubura ribahanura nk'abana, ngo Mwana wanje, ntugaye igikangiro c'Uhoraho, Kandi ntiwihebure ni yaguhana.
Kuko uwo Uhoraho akunda ari we ahana, Kandi akubita uwo yemera wese ko ari umwana wiwe.
Ico mukwiye kwihanganira ni ugutozwa indero nziza. Imana ibagirira nk'abana bayo. Ni umwana ki, adakangirwa na se?
Ariko namba mudakangirwa nk'ico abandi bose bakorerwa, muri ibivyarwa, ntimuri ubura bwayo.
Kandi twari dufise ba data b'imibiri, baradukangira, natwe tukabubaha. None ntituzorushiriza cane kugororokera Se w'impwemu tugahoraho?
Kuko ba bandi badukangira imisi mike nk'uko bagomba, ariko we adukangirira ikigira ikimazi, kugira ngo dusangire na we ukwera kwiwe.
Nta gikangiro kiboneka ko giteye umunezero ako kanya, atari umubabaro, ariko hanyuma abamenyerejwe na co kibamira imbuto zizana amahoro zo kugororoka.
Nuko mugorore amaboko acitse urudendevu, n'amavi aregarega.
Kandi muharurire ibirenge vyanyu inzira zigororotse, kugira ngo igihinyiza ntigikondoke, ariko gikire.
Mukurikire kugiriranira amahoro n'abantu bose, n'ukwezwa, kuko utejejwe atazoraba Umwami.
Mwizigame, ntihagire umuntu adashikira ubuntu bw'Imana, kandi ntihagire umuzi wo kurura umera, ukabahagarika imitima, abenshi bakandura.
Ntihabeho umushirasoni, canke igihumane nka Esawu, yagurishije ivyo kuba samuragwa kwiwe ingaburo imwe.
Kuko muzi yuko hanyuma, hamwe yagomba kuragwa umugisha, atemerewe, kuko atabonye uburyo bwo kwihana, naho yawurondera cane arira.
Ntimwegereye umusozi wokorwako, waka umuriro, kandi ntimwegereye umwiza w'umuzimagiza, uwo umuzitanya, igihuhuta,
inzumbeti ivuga n'ijwi ry'amajambo; abaryumvise binginga kutabwirwa irindi jambo.
Kuko batashoboye kwemera ivyagezwe, ngo Naho coba igitungwa gikoze kuri uwo musozi bacicishe amabuye.
Kandi ivyabonetse vyari ibiteye ubwoba, vyatumye Mose avuga ati: "Mfise ubwoba cane, ndahinda agashitsi."
Ariko mwegereye umusozi Siyoni, n'umurwa w'Imana nzima, Yerusalemu ho mw'ijuru, n'ikoraniro rikuru ry'isinzi ry'abamarayika,
n'ishengero ry'abana b'imfura banditswe mw'ijuru, mwegereye n'Imana umucamanza wa bose n'impwemu z'abagororotsi batunganijwe rwose.
Mwegereye na Yesu, umuhuza ahesha isezerano rishasha, mwegereye n'amaraso acucagirwa, avuga ivyiza kurusha aya Abeli.
Mwirinde ntimwanke kwumva Iyiriko iravuga. Ba bandi ko batakize, hamwe banka uwababuririye mw'isi, tweho tuzorushiriza cane kudakira, namba dutera ibitugu Iyituburira iri mw'ijuru.
Ijwi ryayo ryanyiganyigije isi ico gihe; ariko noneho irasezeranye ati: "Hasigaye rimwe, ngatigitisha, si isi gusa, ariko n'ijuru na ryo."
Iryo jambo, ngo Hasigaye rimwe, ryerekana gukurwaho kw'ibinyiganyizwa, kuko ari ivyaremwe, kugira ngo ibitoshobora kunyiganyizwa bigumeho.
Ni co gituma, kuko twakira ubwami budashobora kunyiganyizwa, dukwiye gukenguruka, kugira ngo tubone ingene dukorera Imana tuyihimbaye, tuyubaha tuyitinya;
kuko Imana yacu ari umuriro utongora.
Ni hagumeho urukundo rw'abavukanyi.
Ntimwibagire kugirira neza abashitsi; kuko bamwe bagize batyo bahaye indaro abamarayika batabizi.
Mwibuke ababoshwe nk'ababohanywe na bo. Mwibuke n'abagirirwa nabi, kuko namwe muri mu mubiri.
Umubano w'abarongoranye ni wubahwe na bose, kandi uburiri bwabo ntibuhumanywe kuko Imana izocira urubanza inshirasoni n'abasambanyi.
Gukunda amahera ntikube mu ngeso zanyu; ivyo mufise bibabumbe; kuko ubwayo yavuze iti: "Nta ho nzoguhemukira, nta ho nzoguta."
Ni co gituma tuvuga dushize ubwoba tuti: "Uhoraho ni umutabazi wanje, sinzotinya; None umuntu yoshobora kungira iki?"
Mwibuke ababaganza, bakababwira ijambo ry'Imana; mwitegereje iherezo ry'ingeso zabo, mwigane ukwizera kwabo.
Yesu Kristo uko yari ari ejo, n'uwu musi ni ko akiri, ni ko azokwama ibihe bidashira.
Ntimutwarwe n'inyigisho z'uburyo bwinshi zadutse; kuko iciza ari uko umutima ukomezwa n'ubuntu bw'Imana, ntukomezwe n'ivyo kurya, kuko abishize muri vyo bitabagiriye ikimazi.
Dufise igicaniro, ico abakorera muri rya hema batemererwa kurirako.
Kuko imivyimba ya vya bitungwa, ivyo umuherezi mukuru ajana amaraso yavyo ahera kuba indishi y'ivyaha, ituririrwa inyuma y'amahema.
Ni co catumye na Yesu ababarizwa inyuma y'irembo, kugira ngo yezeshe abantu amaraso yawe.
Nuko tuve muri ayo mahema, tumusange inyuma yayo, twiremetse ugucokorwa kwiwe.
Kuko hano tutahafise igisagara kizokwamaho, ariko turondera ikizoza.
Nuko na ntaryo twame duha Imana ishikanwa ryo gukenguruka tubiheshwa n'uwo, ni co mbuto z'iminwa ishima izina ryayo.
Kugira neza no kugira ubuntu ntimukavyibagire, kuko ibimazi bimeze bityo ari vyo bihimbara Imana.

Mwumvire ababaganza, mubagamburukire; kuko ari bo bama bagavye bazigama imitima yanyu, nk'abazobibazwa. Mugenze mutyo kugira ngo babikore banezerewe, batitsa umutima, kuko bimeze bityo ata co vyomarira mwebwe.
Mudusengere, kuko tuzi tudakekeranya ko turi n'imitima itarimwo ijwi ritwagiriza ikibi, tugomba kugira ingeso nziza muri vyose.
Kandi ndabinginga nshimitse ngo mudusengere, kugira ngo ntebutswe kubagarukanirwa vuba.
Imana nyene amahoro, imwe yakura Umwami wacu Yesu mu bapfuye, ari we Mwungere mukuru w'intama, imukujeyo amaraso y'isezerano ry'ibihe bidashira,
ibe ari yo ibatunganya rwose mu ciza cose, kugira ngo mukore ivyo igomba, ikorera muri twebwe ibishimwa mu maso yayo, kubwa Yesu Kristo. Icubahiro kibe icayo ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Ariko bavukanyi, ndabahanura, mwihanganire iri jambo ribahanura, kuko ndabandikiye amajambo make.
Mumenye yuko umuvukanyi Timoteyo yarekuwe; ni yaza vuba tuzobonana namwe.
Muntahirize ababaganza bose, bo n'abera bose. Abo muri Italiya barabatasha.
Ubuntu bubane namwe mwese. Amina.
Yakobo, umushumba w'Imana n'uwo Umwami Yesu Kristo, ndabandikiye abo mu miryango icumi n'ibiri y'abasabagiye. Ni muganuke.
Mwiyumvire ko ari ivyo kunezererwa rwose, bavukanyi, ni mwagwa mu bibagerageza bitari bimwe,
mumenye yuko ibigeza ukwizera kwanyu bitera ukwihangana.
Ariko ukwihangana gukwiye guhingura igikorwa cakwo, ngo mubone gutungana rwose muhinguwe; mudahajije na kamwe.
Ariko asangwa hari uwo muri mwebwe akenye ubwenge, ni abusabe Imana, igabira bose ititangiriye itama, idaterana imiragwe, azobuhabwa.
Ariko asabe yizeye, ata co akekeranya, kuko uwukekeranya ameze nk'umupfunda wo mu kiyaga, utwarwa n'umuyaga, usimbaguritswa.
Uwo muntu ntiyiyumvire ko ari n'ico azohabwa n'Umwami Imana,
kuko ari umuntu w'imitima ibiri, ahindagurika mu nzira ziwe zose."
Ariko, umuvukanyi w'umufafara ni yirate ko akujijwe,
umutunzi na we, ni yirate ko acishijwe bugufi, kuko azoyoka nk'amashurwe y'ivyatsi.
Kuko izuba rirasa, rizanye indugumba, rikumisha ivyatsi, amashurwe yavyo agahunguruka, ubwiza bw'ishusho yayo bugashira. Uko ni ko umutunzi azoyonga mu ngendo ziwe.
Harahiriwe umuntu yihanganira ibimugerageza, kuko ni yamara kurama azohabwa igitsibo c'ubugingo, ico Imana yasezeraniye abayikunda.
Umuntu ni yageragezwa ngo akora ibibi, ntavuge ngo Imana ni yo ingerageje. Kuko Imana itageragezwa n'ibibi, kandi na yo nta we ibigerageresha.
Ariko umuntu wese ageragezwa, iyo akwezwe n'ivyo yifuza bikamusuka.
Maze ukwo kwifuza gutwara inda, kukavyara icaha, icaha kimaze gukura kikavyara urupfu.
Ntimuzimire, bavukanyi nkunda.
Gutanga kwose kwiza n'ingabire yose itunganye rwose biva mw'ijuru, vyururuka biva kuri Se w'imico, adashobora guhinduka canke kugira igitutu gitewe n'uguhindagurika.
Nk'uko yabigabiye ubwayo, yatuvyarishije ijambo ry'ukuri, kugira ngo tube nk'ivyeze ubwa mbere mu biremwa vyayo.
Ivyo murabizi, bavukanyi nkunda. Yamara umuntu wese ni yihutire kwumva, atebe kuvuga, atebe kuraka.
Kuko ishavu ry'umuntu ridakora ivyo ukugororoka kw'Imana.
Nuko rero, mwiyambure imyanda yose n'ububi busigaye, mwakirane ubugwaneza ijambo ritewe muri mwebwe, rishobora gukiza ubugingo bwanyu.
Kandi mube abakora ivyo iryo jambo, ntimube abaryumva gusa, mwibesha.
Kuko uwumva iryo jambo ntarikore, ameze nk'umuntu yirabiye mu cirore mu maso hiwe yavukanye.
Amaze kwiraba, akagenda, uwo mwanya agaca yiyibagira uko asa.
Ariko, uwitegereza ivyagezwe bitunganye rwose, ari vyo vy'umwidegemvyo, akabishishikara, atari uwumva akavyibagira, ariko ari uwubikora, ni we azohabwa umugisha mu vyo akora.
Umuntu ni yigira ngo n'umunyedini, ntafate ururimi, ariko agahenda umutima wiwe, idini y'uwo izoba ari iyo ubusa.
Idini itunganye itagira agasembwa imbere y'Imana Data wa twese, ni ukuraba impfuvyi n'abapfakazi mu marushwa yabo, no kwirinda ngo ntiwanduzwe n'ivyo isi.
Bavukanyi, kwizera Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo w'ubwiza ntikubemwo kurobanura abantu ku cubahiro.
Mw'ishengero ryanyu ni hinjiramwo umuntu yambaye impeta y'izahabu n'impuzu zishajije, hakinjira n'umworo yambaye impuzu mbi y'ubuhoma,
namwe mukitegereza uwambaye impuzu zishajije, mukamubarira muti: "Ni wicare hano heza;" kandi mukabarira nya mworo muti: "Weho hagarara hariya, canke icara hambavu y'ibirenge vyanje;"
none se ntimuba mwisobanuye, mukaba abacamanza biyumvira ibibi?
Ni mwumve, bavukanyi nkunda. Mbega Imana ntiyatoranirije aboro b'ivyo isi ngo babe abatunzi mu kwizera, no kuragwa ubwami yasezeraniye abayikunda?
Ariko mweho mwatetereje umworo. None abatunzi si bo babatwaza amanyama, bakaba ari bo babakwega babajana mu manza?
Si bo batyoza izina ryiza mwitirirwa?
Mugabo namba mushitsa icagezwe c'i bwami nk'uko canditswe, ngo Mukunde ababanyi banyu nk'uko mwikunda, muba mugize neza.
Ariko iyo murobanuye abantu ku cubahiro, muba mukoze icaha, mutsinzwe n'ivyagezwe ko mubaye abanyabicumuro.
Kuko umuntu wese azokwitondera ivyagezwe vyose, agatsitara kuri kimwe, azoba acumuye kuri vyose.
Uwavuze ati: "Ntugasambane," ni we yavuze ati: "Ntukice." "Nuko rero niyo utasambana ariko ukica, uzoba ucumuye ku vyagezwe.
Muvuge kandi mukore nk'abagira bacirwe urubanza n'ivyagezwe bizana umwidegemvyo.
Kuko urubanza rutagirira akagongwe uwutagize akagongwe. Ariko mu rubanza ikigongwe kiratsinda.
Vyomara iki ga bavukanyi, namba umuntu avuga yuko afise ukwizera, ata bikorwa akora? Mbega ukwo kwizera kwoshobora kumukiza?
Ni haba hariho uwo muvukana ari we wese yoba yambaye ubusa, agenda aburanirwa ku vyo kurya,
maze umwe muri mwebwe akamubwira ati: ""Genda amahoro, ususuruke, uhage""; ariko ntimumuhe ivyo umubiri ukena, vyomara iki?
Ni ko bimeze, n'ukwizera kutari n'ibikorwa, kuri kwonyene, kuba gupfuye.
Nk'umuntu yovuga ati: ""Weho ufise ukwizera, jeho mfise ibikorwa: nyereka ukwizera kwawe kutagira ibikorwa, nanje ndakwereka ukwizera kwanje guserurwa n'ibikorwa vyanje."" "
Wemera yuko Imana ari imwe. Ugize neza; abadayimoni na bo nyene baravyemera, bagahinda agashitsi.
Ariko wa muntu w'imburakimazi we, mbega ugomba kumenya ingene ukwizera kutagira ibikorwa ari uko ubusa?
Aburahamu sogokuruza, mbega ntiyahinduwe umwere n'ibikorwa, hamwe yari atanze umwana wiwe Isaka ko ishikanwa amutanze ku gicaniro?
Ntubona yuko ukwizera kwafatanije n'ibikorwa vyiwe, kandi ko ukwizera kwahinguwe rwose n'ibikorwa?
Kandi icanditswe kirashika, kivuga ngo Aburahamu yizeye Imana, ibimuharurako nk'ukugororoka; kandi yitwa umukunzi w' Imana.
Murabona yuko ibikorwa ari vyo bihindura umuntu intungane, atari ukwizera kwonyene.
Kandi na Rahabu maraya ni ko vyabaye. Mbega ntiyahinduwe umwere n'ibikorwa kuko yahaye za ntumwa indaro, akazirangira iyindi nzira?
Nk'uko umubiri utarimwo impwemu uba upfuye, ni ko ukwizera kutagira ibikorwa kumera, kuba gupfuye.
Bavukanyi, muri mwebwe ntihakabe benshi barondera kuba abigisha. Murazi ko tuzocirwa urubanza ruruta izo abandi.
Kuko twese dutsitara muri vyinshi. Umuntu wese adatsitara mu vyo avuga, aba ari umuntu atunganye rwose, ashobora no kuganza umubiri wiwe wose.
Iyo twambitse iminyororo mu minwa y'ifarasi, kugira ngo zidukurikire, duhindukiza n'imibiri yazo zose.
Kandi raba, n'amato naho yoba maninimanini ate, agakubebwa n'umuyaga uhuhuta cane, ingafe naho ari ntonto cane ni zo ziyerekeza aho abayatumbereza bagomba.
N'ururimi ni ko ruri. Ni urugingo rutoya, rukirarira ibikomeye. Raba ishamba, naho ryoba rinini rite, ridomekwa n'akariro gake.
Ururimi ni umuriro, ni ikibi kingana n'isi. Ururimi rwashizwe mu ngingo zacu, ruhumanya umubiri wose, rudomeka ukubaho kwacu kwose, na rwo ruba rwadometswe na Gehinomu.
Kuko amoko yose y'ibikoko n'ibiguruka n'ivyikwega n'ivyo mu kiyaga bigundwa n'abantu, kandi barabigunze;
ariko, ururimi nta muntu yoshobora kurugunda. Ni ububi bucambagirana, rwuzuye ubumara bwica.
Urwo ni rwo dushimisha Umwami Data wa twese, kandi ni rwo tuvumisha abantu, baremwe mw'ishusho y'Imana.
Mu kanwa kamwe havamwo umuhezagiro n'umuvumo. Bavukanyi, ivyo ntibikwiye kumera bityo.
Mbega iriba ryodudubiza amazi aryoshe n'ayo umururazi mu mbizi imwe?
Bavukanyi, Mbega umusukoni woshobora kwama elayo, canke umuzabibu wokwama insukoni? Ni ko amazi y'umunyu adashobora kuvamwo ayaryoshe.
Ni nde muri mwebwe w'umunyabwenge kandi w'umuhanga? Ni yerekanishe ibikorwa vyiwe ingeso nziza mu bugwaneza bufatanije n'ubwenge.
Ariko namba mugira ishari ry'inkazi mu mitima yanyu, mugakunda kwirema ibice, ntimwirate, mubesha, mucumura ku kuri.
Ubwo bwenge si bwo bwururuka buvuye mw'ijuru, ariko ubwo isi, ubwo abantu n'ubwo abadayimoni.
Kuko aho ishari riri, bo no kwirema ibice, ari ho umuvurungano uri, n'igikorwa kibi cose.
Ariko ubwenge buva mw'ijuru, irya mbere buratunganye, kandi n'ubwo amahoro, burengenga, bukunda kugirwa inama, bwuzuye imbabazi n'imbuto nziza, ntibukekeranya, ntibugira uburyarya.
Kandi imbuto zo kugororoka zibibwa mu mahoro n'ababanguranya.
Muri mwebwe intambara ziva hehe, n'imitongano iva hehe? Mbega ntibiva mu bibahimbara birwanira mu ngingo zanyu?
Murifuza, ariko ntimuhabwa. Murica, mugira ishari, ariko ntimushobora kuronka; murarwana muratabara. Ntimuhabwa kuko mudasaba.
Murasaba ntimuhabwe, kuko musaba nabi, kugira ngo muvyononere mu bibahimbara.
Yemwe basambanyi, ntimuzi yuko gucudika n'isi ari ukwankana n'Imana? Nuko umuntu wese agomba kuba incuti y'isi aba yigize umwansi w'Imana.
Canke mwiyumvira yuko ivyanditswe bivugira ubusa, ngo Uwo Mpwemu yatugerereyemwo atwiyegereza afuha?
Ariko itanga ubuntu burushirije. Ni co gituma ivuga iti: "Imana irwanya abibona, ariko abicisha bugufi ibaha ubuntu." "
Nuko mugamburukire Imana, ariko murwanye wa mugarariji, na we azobahunga.
Mwiyegereze Imana, na yo izobegera. Yemwe banyavyaha, ni mukarabe; yemwe abo imitima ibiri, ni mwiyeze imitima.
Mubabare, muboroge, murire; ibitwengo vyanyu bihinduke amaborogo, umunezero uhinduke umubabaro.
Mwicishe bugufi imbere y'Umwami Imana, na yo izobashira hejuru.

Bavukanyi, ntimuvuganane nabi. Uwuvuga nabi umuvukanyi, canke uwuhinyurira umuvukanyi ku mutima, aba avuze nabi ivyagezwe, ni vyo aba ahinyuye. Ariko iyo uhinyura ivyagezwe, ntuba uvyitondera, uba ubaye umucamanza wavyo.
Uwushinga ivyagezwe, ari we mucamanza, ni Imwe gusa; ni yo ishobora kurokora no guhonya. Ariko wewe uri iki, uhinyura mugenzawe? "
Umve rero, yemwe abavuga ngo uwu musi canke ejo tuzoja mu gisagara c'i naka, tuzomarayo umwaka, tudandaze, turonke inyungu;
ariko mutazi ibizoba ejo. Ubuzima bwanyu ni nk'iki? muri umwuka uboneka umwanya muto, ugahava uyongayonga.
Ariko mwari mukwiye kuvuga muti: "Umwami wacu ni yabikunda, tuzoramba, kandi tuzokora dutya canke dutya."
Yamara none mwirata ukwihayagiza kwanyu; ukwirata kwose bene ukwo ni kubi.
Nuko uwuzi gukora neza ntabikore, bimubera icaha.
Ehe rero, yemwe batunzi, ni murire muboroge kuko mugira mufutane.
Ubutunzi bwanyu buraboze, impuzu zanyu ziriwe n'inyenzi;
izahabu n'ifeza vyanyu binyengeterewe n'ingese; ingese zavyo zizoba icabona co kubagiriza, zizonyengetera imibiri yanyu nk'umuriro. Mwarundanije mu misi y'umuhero.
Ehe ingero z' abashwabuzi babashwaburiye imirima, izo mwabagunze, zirataka. Amaborogo y'ababashwaburiye yinjiye mu matwi y'Uhoraho Nyeningabo.
Mwidibamiye mw'isi, mwihaye ibibahimbara: mwaguwe mpishi mu mitima ku musi wo gukekagurwa.
Mwatsindishije intungane, muramwica, ntiyabarwanya. "
Nuko bavukanyi, mwihangane mushitse aho umwami Yesu azozira. Ehe umurimyi arorera imirima myiza, ayirindira yihanganye, gushitsa aho izoronkera imvura y' agatasi n'iyo urushana.
Nuko namwe mwihangane, mureme mu mitima, kuko ukuza kw' Umwami kuri hafi.
Ntimwidodomberanire, bavukanyi, kugira ngo ntimucirweko iteka. Ehe umucamanza ahagaze ku rugi.
Abavugishijwe mw'izina ry'Umwami Imana bababere ikigereranyo bavukanyi, co kubabazwa no kwihangana.
Ehe abihanganye tubita abahirwe. Mwarumvise ukwihangana kwa Yobu, mwabonye ivyo Umwami Imana yaherutse kumugirira, ingene yuzuye imbabazi no kugira ikigongwe.
Ariko bavukanyi, ikiruta vyose, ntimukarahire. Ntimurahire ijuru, isi canke iyindi ndahiro yose; ariko ijambo ryanyu ribe Ego, ego; Oya, oya; kugira ngo ntimucirirweko urubanza rubatsinda. "
Muri mwebwe ni haba hariho uwubabaye, ni asenge; namba hariho uwuroraniwe n'umutima, ni aririmbe ishimwe;
muri mwebwe namba hariho uwurwaye, ni atumeko abashingantahe b'ishengero, baze kumusengera, bamusige amavuta ya elayo mw'izina ry'Umwami wacu.
Kandi ugusenga gufatanije n'ukwizera kuzokiza umurwayi, Umwami azomuvyura; kandi asanzwe yarakoze ivyaha azobiharirwa.
Mwaturanire ivyaha vyanyu, musengeranire, kugira ngo mukire indwara. Ugusaba kw'umugororotsi kugira ikimazi kuri vyinshi mu gikorwa cakwo.
Eliya yari umuntu ameze nkatwe, asaba yinginga ngo imvura ntigwe, imvura imara imyaka itatu n'amezi atandatu itagwa mu gihugu;
yongera gusaba, ijuru rirekura imvura, isi imeza imirima yayo.
Bavukanyi, ni hagira umuntu muri mwebwe azimira, akava ku vy'ukuri, uwundi akamuzimurura,
mumenye yuko uwuzimuruye umunyavyaha, akamukura mu nzira yiwe yazimiriyemwo, aba amukirije ubugingo urupfu, kandi aba apfutse ivyaha vyinshi.
Petero, intumwa ya Yesu Kristo, ndabandikiye abatoranijwe b'abanyamahanga bo mu basanzariye i Ponto, i Galatiya, i Kapadokiya, muri Asiya n'i Bituniya,
mwatoranirijwe mu kweza kwa Mpwemu nk'uko Imana Data wa twese yabamenye uhereye kera, kugira ngo mwumvire Imana, mumijwe amaraso ya Yesu Kristo. Ubuntu n'amahoro bigwire muri mwebwe.
Imana y'Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo, ari yo Se, iragahezagirwa, yatuvyaye ubwa kabiri nk'uko imbabazi zayo nyinshi ziri, kugira ngo tugire ivyizigiro bizima, ituvyaza ukuzuka mu bapfuye kwa Yesu Kristo,
ngo tuzokwegukire umugabane utazobora, utanduye, udatituka, mwabikiwe mw'ijuru,
mwebwe abazigamwa n'ubushobozi bw'Imana kubwo ukwizera, muzigamirwa agakiza kateguwe kuzohishurwa mu gihe c'iherezo.
Ivyo murabinezererwa cane, naho ubu ari igihe gito mubabazwa n'ibibagerageza vyinshi, kuko bitobura kuza;
kugira ngo ukwizera kwanyu kugezwe (kandi ukwo kwizera kurusha igiciro izahabu ishira, naho ivugutirwa mu muriro ikakaka) kuzoboneke kuri n'ishimwe n'ubwiza n'icubahiro mu guhishurwa kwa Yesu Kristo.
Uwo muramukunda naho mutigeze kumubona; kandi n'ubu, naho mutaramubona, muramwizera, bibatera kunezerwa akanyamuneza k'ubwiza katovugwa,
mugahabwa ikizanwa n'ukwizera kwanyu, ni co gakiza k'ubugingo bwanyu.
Ivyo ako gakiza, abavugishwa n'Imana, ari bo bavuze ubuntu mwagira muzohabwe, barabirondera, barabisesura,
basesa igihe ico ari co n'ibimenyetso vyaryo, cerekanwa na Mpwemu wa Kristo yari muri bo, yavuga yatagura ivyo imibabaro ya Kristo bitaribwabe, n'ivyo ubwiza bw'uburyo bwinshi bwagira buzoyiherukire.

Kandi bahishurirwa yuko atari bo bavyikorera, ariko ko ari mwebwe babikorera; ni vyo none mumaze kubarirwa n'abababwiye ubutumwa bwiza, bavugishijwe na Mpwemu Yera yatumwe ava mw'ijuru, kandi ivyo abamarayika bifuza kubirunguruka.
Nuko rero mwiteguye gukora mu mitima yanyu, mwirinde ibiboreza, mwizigire rwose ubuntu muzozanirwa mu kuzohishurwa kwa Yesu Kristo.
Mumere nk' abana bagamburuka, ntimwishushanye n'ukwifuza kwanyu kwa kera kwo mu gihe c'ukutamenya kwanyu.
Ariko nk'uko Iyabahamagaye ari iyera, namwe mube ari ko muba abera mu ngeso zanyu zose.
Kuko vyanditswe, ngo mube abera, kuko nanje ndi uwera.
Kandi ko Iyo mwambaza muyita So ari yo icira umuntu wese urubanza rukwiranye n'ivyo yakoze itarobanuye ku cubahiro, mumare igihe co kuba abanyamahanga mugende mwubashe Imana kandi muyitinya.
Muzi yuko ivyo mwacungujwe ngo muve mu ngeso zanyu z'imburakimazi mwarazwe na ba sogokuruza atari ibishira, nk'ifeza canke izahabu,
ariko mwacungujwe amaraso y'igiciro kinini, nk'ayo umwagazi w'intama utagira agasembwa canke ibara, ni yo ya Kristo.
Uwo yamenywe n'Imana kera, itanguriro ry'isi ritarashirwaho, ariko yerekanywe kw'iherezo ry'ibihe kubwanyu,
mwebwe abo yahaye kwizera Imana, ni yo yamuzuye mu bapfuye ikamuha ubwiza. Ni co gituma ukwizera kwanyu n'ivyizigiro vyanyu biba ku Mana.
Nuko rero, ko mwejesheje imitima kwumvira ukuri, kugira ngo mukunde abavukanyi bitari uruheyiheyi, mukovye mu gukundana bivuye mu mitima.
Kuko mwavyawe ubwa kabiri, mutavyawe n'imbuto ibora, ariko mwavyawe n'imbuto itabora, mubiheshejwe n'ijambo ry'Imana ririho rigahoraho.
Kuko, Abafise umubiri bose basa n'ivyatsi, Ubwiza bwabo bwose bumeze nk'amashurwe y'ivyatsi; Ivyatsi biruma, amashurwe agahunguruka,
Ariko ijambo ry'Uhoraho ryamaho ibihe bidashira. Kandi iryo ni ryo jambo ry'ubutumwa bwiza mwabwiwe.
Nuko rero mwiyambure inzigo yose, ubugunge bwose, uburyarya, ishari no kuvuga abandi nabi kwose,
mumere nk'inzoya zivutse vuba, mwifuze amata y'umutima adafunguye, kugira ngo abakuze abashitse ku gakiza;
asangwa mwarayumvirije mukumva yuko Umwami wacu agira neza.
Nuko mumwegere, ari we buye rifise ubugingo, ryagawe n'abantu, ariko ku Mana ryaratoronijwe, riri n'igiciro,
mwubakwe nk'amabuye afise ubugingo, kugira ngo mube inzu yo mu buryo bw'impwemu, mugire igikorwa cera c'ubuherezi, ngo Muzotange ibimazi mu buryo bw'impwemu, bishimwa n' Imana kubwa Yesu Kristo.
Kuko mu vyanditswe harimwo aya majambo, ngo Raba, ndashira i Siyoni ibuye rigumya imfuruka, ryatoranijwe, riri n'igiciro, Kandi uwuryizera ntazomaramazwa.
Nuko mwebwe abizera ni mwebwe mwagerewe ico giciro, ariko ku banka kwizera, ngo Ibuye abubatsi bagaye, Ni ryo ryahindutse irigumya imfuruka,
Ni ibuye ritsitaza ni urutare rugwisha; kuko batsitara kw'ijambo ry'Imana, bataryumvira; kandi ni co bashiriweho.

Ariko mweho muri ubwoko bwatoranijwe, muri abaherezi b'ibwami, muri ihanga ryera, abantu bashiriweho kuba inyegu yiharije, kugira ngo mukwize ishimwe ry'Iyabahamagaye, ikabakura mu mwiza, ikabashitsa mu muco wayo utangaje.
Kera nta bantu mwarimwo, ariko noneho muri abantu b'Imana; kera ntimwaribwagirirwe imbabazi, ariko noneho mwarazigiriwe.
Abo nkunda, ndabinginga, ko muri abanyamahanga n'ingenzi mwirinde ivyifuzo vy'umubiri birwanya ubugingo;
mugire ingeso nziza mu mahanga, kugira ngo, no ku vyo babavuga nabi nk'inkozi z'ibibi, ibikorwa vyanyu vyiza babona bizotume bahimbaza Imana ku musi ibagendeye.
Kubwo Umwami wacu, ni mugamburukire ubukuru bwose bwashizweho n'abantu; ari umwami, kuko ari we gahebuza;
canke abakuru, kuko ari bo atuma guhana inkozi z'ibibi no gushima inkozi z'ivyiza.
Kuko ivyo Imana igomba ari uko ugukora neza kwanyu kuba agahomerabunwa ku bantu b'imburabwenge batagira ico bazi,
ngo mube nk'abidegemvya, ariko atari ukugira umwidegemvyo wanyu umwitwikiro w'inzigo, ariko mube nk'abakozi b'Imana.
Mwubahe abantu bose; mukunde abavukanyi banyu; mutinye Imana; mwubahe umwami.
Bakozi, mugamburukire ba shobuja, mububashe rwose, atari ababagirira neza n'ababihaganira gusa, ariko n'abadadika.
Kuko igishimwa ari uko umuntu, namba ahanuwe n'ijwi ryo mu mutima gukora ivyo Imana igomba, yokwihanganira imibabaro ahowe ubusa.
Mwokwihanganira gukubitwa ibipfunsi muhowe icaha, mwokwihaya iki? Ariko mwokwihanganira kubabazwa muhowe gukora neza, ivyo ni vyo bishimwa ku Mana.
Ivyo ni vyo mwahamagariwe, kuko na Kristo yabababarijwe, akabasigarana akarorero, kugira ngo mugere ikirenge mu ciwe.
We nta caha yakoze, kandi nta bugunge bwabonetse mu kanwa kiwe;
yaratutswe, ntiyabasubiza; yarababajwe, ntiyabahigira; ariko yiha Iyidaca urwa nkunzi.
Ubwiwe yikoreye ivyaha vyacu mu mubiri wiwe, abambwe ku giti, kugira ngo dupfuye ku vyaha tubeho ku kugororoka; inguma ziwe ni zo zabakijije.
Kuko mwari muzimiye nk'intama, ariko noneho mugarutse ku Mwungere w'ubugingo bwanyu, ari we nyene abujejwe.
Namwe bagore ni uko, mugamburukire abagabo banyu, kugira ngo, naho bamwe batumvira ijambo ry'Imana, bareshwe n'ingeso nziza z'abagore babo, batagize ijambo bavuze,
ni babona ingeso zanyu zitunganye zifatanije n'ugutinya.
Ugushaza kwanyu ntikube ukwo ku rukoba kwo gutsiba umushatsi, ukwo kwambara izahabu canke ukwo kwambara impuzu nziza;
ariko kube uko umuntu ahishijwe wo mu mutima, ugushaza kudashira, ni kwo mutima w'ubugwaneza utekereje, ni kwo kw'igiciro kinini imbere y'Imana. "
Ni ko abagore bera bizigira Imana bashaza kera, bagamburukira abagabo babo,
nk'uko Sara yumvira Aburahamu, akamwita umwami wiwe; namwe muri abana b'uwo, ni mwahora mukora neza, mudaterwa ubwoba n'icobaca ivutu.

Namwe bagabo ni uko, mubane n'abagore banyu nk'abazi ibibereye, kuko ari nk'ibikoresho bidahwanije namwe inkomezi. Kandi mubahe icubahiro, kuko na bo ari abaraganwa namwe ubuntu bw'ubugingo, kugira ngo ugusenga kwanyu ntikugire ikigutesha.
Ibisigaye, mwese muhuze umutima, mubabarane, mukundane nk'abavukana, mugiriranire imbabazi, mwicishe bugufi mu mutima;
ntimugere ikibi ku kindi, canke igitutsi ku kindi; ariko muvyishurane n'umuhezagiro, kuko ico ari co mwahamagariwe, kugira ngo namwe muragwe umugisha.
Kuko handitswe, " ngo Uwugomba gukunda ubugingo, No kubona imisi myiza, N'abuze ururimi rwiwe, ntiruvuge ikibi, Ni iminwa yiwe ntivuge ivyo uguhendana,
Kandi azibukire ibibi, akore ivyiza; Arondere amahoro, ayakurikire, kugira ngo ayashikire.
Kuko inyonga z'Uhoraho ziri ku bagororotsi, N'amatwi yiwe ari ku vyo basenga, Ariko igitsure c'Uhoraho kiri ku bakora ibibi.
Kandi ni nde yobagirira nabi, ni mwagira ishaka ry'ivyiza?
Yamara naho mwobabazwa muhowe ukugororoka, mwoba muhiriwe. Ntimuzotinye ivyo babakangisha, ntimuhagarike imitima,
ariko mwubahe Kristo mu mitima yanyu ko ari we Mwami, muhore mwiteguye kwishura umuntu wese ababajije inyanduruko y'ivyizigiro biri muri mwebwe, ariko muri n'ubugwaneza, mutinya.
Mufise imitima itarimwo ijwi ribagiriza ikibi, kugira ngo no ku vyo muvugwa nabi, abatuka ingeso zanyu nziza zo muri Kristo bamaramare.
Ivyoba vyiza ni uko mwobabazwa muhowe gukora ivyiza, ari co Imana igomvye, hako muhorwa gukora ibibi.
Kuko na Kristo yababajwe rimwe ahorwa ivyaha, umugororotsi yababarijwe abagabitanya, kugira ngo adushikirize Imana; yishwe umubiri, ariko yahinduwe muzima mu buryo bw'impwemu,
ni bwo yagiyemwo abarira impwemu ziri mw'ibohero ijambo ry'Imana,
ni zo z'abatumviye Imana kera, hamwe ukwihangana kwayo kwari kukirorereye mu misi ya Nowa, bwa bwato bukibazwa; muri bwo harokokeye abantu bakeya, bashika umunani, bakirijwe mu mazi.

Ayo ni yo abakiza namwe ubu, mu buryo bw'ikigereranyo c'ukubatizwa, si ugukuraho ubuhoma bwo ku mubiri, ariko ni isezerano ry'umutima utagiriza ikibi usezeranye ku Mana, abakirisha ukuzuka kwa Yesu Kristo,
ari i buryo bw' Imana, kuko yagiye mw'ijuru, amaze guhabwa gutwara abamarayika, abanyabubasha n'abanyabushobozi.
Nuko kuko Kristo yababarijwe mu mubiri, mwitwaze nk'ibirwanisho bene uwo mutima, kuko uwubabarijwe mu mubiri aba amaze kureka icaha,
kugira ngo amare imisi isigaye akiri mu mubiri atagikorera ivyifuzo vy'abantu, ariko akora ivyo Imana igomba.

Kuko igihe cashize gihagije gukora ivyo abanyamahanga bakunda gukora, no kugendera mu ngeso z'isoni nke, izo kwifuza, kunohorwa n'umuvinyu, kudandahirwa, kurundana aho bateretse n'ibizira vyo gusenga ibigirwamana.
Birabatangaza yuko mudafatanya na bo kwirukira mu birenze urugero vy'ubuhumbu, bakabadendereza;
mugabo ni bo bazobazwa ivyo n'uwiteguye kuzoca imanza z'abakiriho n'abapfuye.
Kuko icatumye abapfuye na bo babariwe ubutumwa bwiza kwari ukugira ngo bacirirwe imanza mu mubiri mu buryo bw'abantu, ariko babeho mu mpwemu mu buryo bw' Imana.
Ariko umuhero wa vyose uri hafi. Nuko ni mwitonde rero, mwirinde, kugira ngo mubone uko mushishikara gusenga.
Ikiruta vyose, mukovye mu gukundana, kuko urukundo rupfuka ivyaha vyinshi.
Muhane indaro mutidodomba.
Nk'uko umuntu wese yagabiwe ingabire muzifashishe abandi, nk'uko bibereye ababwiriza beza b'ubuntu bw'Imana bw'uburyo bwinshi.

Umuntu iyo avuze, avuge nk'uwubivugishijwe n' Imana; umuntu iyo agaburira abandi, agabure nk'uwufise ubushobozi Imana itanga; kugira ngo Imana iterwe icubahiro muri vyose, kubwa Yesu Kristo, afise icubahiro n'ububasha ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Abo nkunda, umuriro uri hagati yanyu wo kubagerageza ntukabatangaze, nk'aho mubonye akatabonetse.
Ariko munezerezwe n'uko mufatanije n'imibabaro ya Kristo, kugira ngo no mu gihe co guhishurwa kw'ubwiza bwiwe muzonezerwe muhimbarwe.
Iyo mututswe muhowe izina rya Kristo, muba muhiriwe; kuko Mpwemu w'ubwiza, ari we Mpwemu w'Imana, aba kuri mwebwe.
Ntihakagire umuntu wo muri mwebwe ahorwa kuba umwicanyi, igisuma, inkozi y'ikibi canke kwita mu vyo atagezwemwo.
Ariko ni hagira uwuhorwa kuba Umukristo, ntamaramare, ariko aheshe Imana icubahiro kubwo iryo zina.
Kuko igihe gishitse c'uko urubanza rutangurira mu b'inzu y'Imana, none ko rutanguriye kuri twebwe, iherezo ry' abatumvira ubutumwa bwiza bw' Imana rizomera rite?
Kandi ko umugororotsi akizwa agarukiye ku manga, uwutubaha Imana n'umunyavyaha bazoboneka hehe?
Nuko rero abababazwa nk'uko Imana igomba ni babitse ubugingo bwabo uwo Muremyi wo kwizigirwa, bakore ivyiza.

Ndahanura abashingantahe b'ishengero bo muri mwebwe ndabahanura, kuko nanje ndi umushingantahe mugenzi wanyu, kandi ndi icabona c'imibabaro Kristo yababajwe, kandi mfatanije namwe ubwiza buzohishurwa.
Muragire ubusho bw'Imana bwo muri mwebwe, mutaburagira nk'abagoberewe, ariko mubikunze, nk'uko Imana igomba. Ntimuburagirishwe no kurondera inyungu mbi, ariko muburagire muvyitangiye.
Kandi ntimuragire nk'abatwaza amanyama amasho mwagabanganirijwe, ariko mube ivyitegererezo vy'ubusho.
Nuko Umwungere mukuru ni yerekanwa, muzokwambikwa mu mitwe igitsibo c'ubwiza kitazoshira.
Namwe abakiri bato, mugamburukire abakurambere. Mwese mukenyere ukwicisha bugufi kugira ngo mukorerane, kuko Imana irwanya abibona, ariko abicisha bugufi ikabaha ubuntu.
Nuko mwicishe bugufi muri musi y'ukuboko kw'Imana kw'ubushobozi, kugira ngo izobashire hejuru mu gihe gikwiye.
Muyikorere amaganya yanyu yose, kuko ibababara.
Mwirinde ibiboreza, mwame mugavye. Umurezi wanyu, ari we wa mugarariji, agendagenda nk'intambwe yivuga, arondera uwo arotsa.
Mumurwanye mufise ukwizera gushikamye, muzi yuko imibabaro ihwanye n'iyanyu ishitswa ku bavukanyi banyu bari mw'isi.
Kandi Imana igira ubuntu bwose, yabahamagariye ubwiza bwayo budashira muri muri Kristo, ni mwaheza kubabazwa akanya gato, izobahingura rwose ubwayo, izobaremesha, ibahe inkomezi.
Ububasha bube ubwayo ibihe bitazoshira. Amina.
Ndabandikiye ikete c'amajambo make, canditswe na Siluwano, umuvukanyi w'umwizigirwa uko niyumvira; ndabahanura nshinga intahe yuko ubwo ari bwo buntu bw' Imana bw'ukuri. Mubuhagararemwo mushikamye.
Ishengero ry'i Babuloni ry'abatoranijwe nkamwe rirabatasha, bo na Mariko, umwana wanje.
Muramukanishe kugumbirana kw'urukundo. Amahoro abe muri mwebwe mwese muri muri Kristo.

Simoni Petero, umukozi wa Yesu Kristo kandi intumwa yiwe, ndabandikiye mwebwe abahawe ukwizera kw'akaburarugero kungana n'ukwacu, muguheshejwe n'ukugororoka kwa Yesu Kristo, ni we Mana yacu n'Umukiza.
Ubuntu n'amahoro bigwire muri mwebwe, mubiheshwa no kumenya Imana neza na Yesu Umwami wacu.
Kuko ubushobozi bw'ubumana bwayo bwaduhaye ivyo ubugingo no kwubaha Imana vyose, tubiheshwa no kumenya neza uwaduhamagarishije ubwiza bwiwe n'ingeso ziwe nziza.
Ivyo vyatumye aduha ivyo yasezeranye vy'akaburarugero, bihambaye cane, kugira ngo bibatere gusangira n'Imana akameremere kayo, mumaze gutoroka muva mw'iborero ryazanywe mw'isi no kwifuza."
Mbere kubwo iyo nyanduruko nyene, ubwanyu ni mugire umwete rwose; ukwizera kwanyu mukwongereko ingeso nziza; ingeso nziza muzongereko ubwenge;
ubwenge mubwongereko ukwirinda; ukwirinda mukwongereko ukwihangana; ukwihangana mukwongereko ukwubaha Imana;
ukwubaha Imana mukwongereko ugukunda abavukanyi; ugukunda abavukanyi mukwongereko urukundo.
Kuko namba mugira ivyo, bikagwira, bituma mutaba abanyabute canke abatunguka ku vyo kumenya neza Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo.
Kuko uwutagira ivyo ni mpumyi, abona ibiri hafi gusa, yibagiye umwuhagiro w'ivyaha vyiwe vya kera.
Ni co gituma, bavukanyi, mukwiye kurushiriza kugira umwete wo gukomeza ihamagarwa ugutoranywa kwanyu. Ni mwakora ivyo, ntimuzotsitara na gatoya.
Kuko ni vyaba bityo, muzohabwa rwose kwinjira mu bwami budashira bwa Yesu Kristo, ni we Mwami n'Umukiza wacu.
Ni co gituma imisi yose ntazohengeshanya kubibutsa ivyo, naho mubizi mukaba mushikamye mu kuri kuri muri mwebwe.
Ndiyumvira yuko nkwiye kubakangura ndabibutsa, nkiri muri uyu mubiri.
Kuko nzi yuko igihe co kwamburwa umubiri wanje kiza kuza gitebutse, nk'uko Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo yamenyesheje.
Ariko nzogira umwete, kugira ngo ni namara gupfa muzoshobore kwama mwibuka ivyo.
Kuko tutakurikiye imigani yaremwe n'akenge, hamwe twabamenyesha ubushobozi bw' Umwami wacu Yesu Kristo no kuzoza kwiwe; ariko n'uko twiboneye n'amaso yacu icubahiro ciwe gihambaye.
Kuko yahawe n'Imana Data wa twese ishimwe n'ubwiza, aho ijwi rivuzwe n'ubwiza bukomeye cane ryamushikako, rikavuga riti: "Nguwu Umwana wanje nkunda akampimbara."
Iryo jwi twaryumvise rivuye mw'ijuru, aho twari kumwe na we kuri wa musozi wera.

Ariko turafise ijambo ryavugishijwe, ryarakomejwe kurushiriza. Mugira neza ko murishirako umutima, ni nk'itara ryakira ahacuze umwiza, rigakesha ijoro, rikageza aho ikinyenyeri co mu gaturuturu kizokwakira mu mitima yanyu.
Irya mbere mukwiye kumenya, ni uko ata jambo ry'abavugishwa n'Imana ryo mu vyanditswe rishobora gusobanurwa nk'uko umuntu avyigombera,
kuko ata jambo ry'abavugishwa n'Imana ryazanywe no kugomba kw'umuntu, ariko abantu bavuga ivyava ku Mana, barongowe na Mpwemu Yera.

Ariko hari abigira abavugishwa n'Imana kandi, mu bwoko bw'Abisirayeli, nk'uko no muri mwebwe hazobaho abigisha b'ibinyoma, bazozana inyigisho mu mpisho zirema ibice, zitera guhona. Bazokwihakana na Shebuja yabaguze, bihamagarire uguhona gutebutse.
Kandi ingeso zabo z'isoni nke benshi bazozikurikira; kubwo ivyo inzira y'ukuri bazoyitukisha.
Kandi ukunohokera inyungu kwabo kuzobatera kubungukirako, bababwiye amajambo y'amaremano. Ntibateba gutsindwa n'urubanza kwabo uhereye kera, no guhona kwabo ntiguhunyiza.
Kuko, ko Imana itagiriye ikigongwe abamarayika bakoze ivyaha, ariko ikabakororera i kuzimu, ikabashira mu vyobo vy'umwiza, ngo babikirwe gutsindwa n'urubanza;
kandi ko itagiriye ikigongwe isi ya kera, ariko igakiza Nowa, umwigisha w'ivyo kugororoka, hamwe n'abandi indwi, aho yazana umwuzure kw'isi y'abatayubaha;
kandi ibisagara vy'i Sodomu n'i Gomora, ko yabiciriye urubanza rwo gukomvomvorwa ikabigira umunyota, ikabishiraho kuba akarorero k'abazogenda batubaha Imana,
ikarokora Loti, umugororotsi, yababazwa cane n'ingeso z'isoni nke z'abatirinda--
kuko uwo mugororotsi, aho yaba muri bo, yagira akabonge uko bukeye mu mutima wiwe ugororoka kubwo ibikorwa vyabo vy'ubugarariji yabona, akumva;--
Umwami Imana arazi gukiza abamwubaha ibibagerageza, no kurindira abagabitanya mu gihano gushitsa ku musi w'imanza,
ariko canecane abagenda bakurikira ivyo akameremere kabo, bifuza ibihumanya bagakengera ababaganza. Nta co batinya, ntibakurwa kw'ijambo, ntibahindishwa agashitsi no gutuka abanyacubahiro,
ariko abamarayika naho barusha abo bantu inkomezi n'ubushobozi, ntibarega abo banyacubahiro ku Mwami Imana, ntibabatuka.
Ariko abo bantu bameze nk'ibikoko bitagira ubwenge, ibikoko bukoko, vyavukiye gutegwa no kwicwa, batuka ivyo batazi, uguhonya kwabo kuzobahonya na bo,
bababazwe n'ibibi, ni zo ngero z'ubukozi bw'ibibi bwabo. Bumva ibibahimbara ari ukwirirwa badayangwa, abo ni amarabaga n'agasembwa, badayangishwa n'ivyo bagunze, bagisangira namwe ivyiza.
Amaso yabo yuzuye ubusambanyi, ntahaga ivyaha, bahendahenda imitima idashikamye, bafise imitima yamugariye kunohokera inyungu, ni abana b'ibivume.
Bataye inzira igororotse, barazimira, bakurikira inzira ya Balamu, umwana wa Beyori, umwe yakunze ingero zo kugabitanya,
ariko aharirwa ubugaba bwiwe, hamwe indogoba itazi kuvuga yavuga ijwi nk'iryo umuntu, ikabuza ibisazi vy'uwo muntu avugishwa n'Imana.
Abo ni amasoko akamye, kandi ni ibipfungu bitwarwa n'igihuhuta, barindirijwe umwiza w'umuzitanya.
Bavuga ibitumvye vy'ubwibone bitagira ico bimaze, bahendahenda abariko baridohora mu bagenda bazimiye, babahendahendesha ukwifuza kw'umubiri n'isoni nke.
Babasezeranira umwidegemvyo, ariko ubwabo ni abaja b'ibihumanye; kuko icanesheje umuntu kiba kimuhinduye umuja waco.
Namba kumenya neza Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu n'Umukiza kwarabateye kudohoka, bakava mu vy'isi bihumanya, maze bakongera kuvyizingiramwo, bikabanesha, ivyo hanyuma vyabo birusha ivya mbere kuba bibi.
Icobaye ciza kuri bo, iyaba batigeze kumenya inzira yo kugororoka, hako basubira inyuma, bamaze kuyimenya, bagata icagezwe cera bahawe.
Ivyabashitseko ni ivyo uwu mugani w'ukuri ngo imbwa isubiye ku vyo idashwe; kandi, ngo ingurube yuhagiwe isubiye kwivurunga mu vyondo.
Abo nkunda, none iki ni co cete ca kabiri ndabandikiye, muri ivyo vyose ndakangura ivyiyumviro vyanyu bitagira agasembwa, ndabibutsa;
kugira ngo mwibuke amajambo yavuzwe kera n'abavugishwa n'Imana bera, mwibuke n'icagezwe c'Umwami ni we Mukiza, cavuzwe n'abatumwa babatumweko.
Irya mbere mukwiye kumenya ni uko mu misi y'iherezo hazoza abacokoranyi bacokorana, bakurikira ukwifuza kwabo,
babaza bati: "Isezerano ryo kuza kwiwe riri hehe se?" Kuko uhereye aho ba sogokuruza basinziririye, vyose bihora uko vyamye, uhereye ku kuremwa kw'isi.
Kuko biyobagiza ibigirankana yuko kera hari amajuru, n'isi yakuwe mu mazi n'ijambo ry'Imana, rikayirema mu mazi.
Ivyo vyatumye isi ya kera amazi ayirengera, iratikira.
Ariko amajuru y'ubu, bo n'isi, iryo jambo ryabizigamye ribirorereza umuriro gushitsa ku musi w'imanza, wo gutikira kw'abatubaha Imana.
Ariko abo nkunda, iri rimwe mweho ntimuryiyobagize, yuko ku Mwami Imana umusi umwe umeze nk'imyaka igihumbi, n'imyaka igihumbi imeze nk'umusi umwe.
Umwami Imana ntitebeje isezerano ryayo, uko bamwe biyumvira ko iritevya. Ariko yihanganira mwebwe, ntigomba ko hagira abahona, ariko igomba ko bose bihana.
Ariko umusi w' Umwami wacu uzoza nk'igisuma, aho amajuru azovaho, hakaba n'ukwasana guhambaye, ivyo itanguriro vyose bigashongeshwa n'ikibengebenge gikaze, isi n'ibikorwa biri muri yo bigatongoka.
None, ko ivyo vyose bizoshonga bityo, mukwiye kumera mute mu ngeso zera no mu kwubaha Imana,
no mu kurereka ukuza kw'umusi w'Imana muwuhahamiye, uzotuma amajuru ashongeshwa no gusha, kandi ivyo itanguriro vyose bikayagishwa n'ikibengebenge gikaze?
Ariko nk'uko yasezeranye, tureretse ijuru rishasha n'isi nshasha, ivyo ukugororoka kuzobamwo.
Ni co gituma, abo nkunda, kuko mureretse ivyo, mukwiye kugira umwete wo kuzosangwa mu mahoro, mutagira ikirabagu, mutariko umugayo imbere yiwe.
Mwiyumvire yuko kwihangana kw'Umwami wacu ari agakiza; nk'uko umuvukanyi akundwa Pahulo yabandikiye, uko ubwenge yahawe bungana.

Yagenjeje atyo mu vyete vyiwe vyose, aho yavuze ivyo; muri vyo harimwo bimwebimwe bigoye itahura, ivyo abantu ataco bazi badakomeye bakavyihindurira ukwabo, nk'uko bagira ivyanditswe bindi, bakihamagarira guhona.
None mweho, abo nkunda, kuko musanzwe muzi ivyo, mwirinde ngo ntimutwarwe n'ubuzimire bw'abatirinda, mugata ugukomera kwanyu.
Ariko mukurire mu buntu bwa Yesu Kristo Umwami wacu n'Umukiza, no mu kumumenya. Icubahiro kibe iciwe ubu no gushitsa umusi utagira iherezo. Amina.
Icariho uhereye mu ntango, ico twumvise, ico twabonye n'amaso yacu, ico twitegereje, intoke zacu zikagikorako, ivyo kuri Jambo w'ubugingo--
kandi ubwo bugingo bwarerekanywe, turabubona, turabushingira intahe, kandi turababarira ivyo ubwo bugingo budashira, bwamanye na Data wa twese, tukabwerekwa--
ico twabonye tukacumva ni co tubabwira namwe, kugira ngo namwe mufatanye natwe. Kandi natwe dufatanije na Data wa twese n'Umwana wiwe Yesu Kristo.
Twanditse ivyo kugira ngo umunezero wacu wuzure.
Ubu ni bwo butumwa twumvise bwavuye kuri we, tukabubabwira, yuko Imana ari umuco, kandi muri yo ko hatagira umwiza na mukeya.
Tuvuze yuko dufatanije na yo, tukagendera mu mwiza, kuba ari ukubesha, ntituba dukora ivyo ukuri.
Ariko tugendeye mu muco, nk'uko na yo iri mu muco, tuba dufatanije ubwacu, kandi amaraso ya Yesu Umwana wayo atwoza icaha cose.
Tuvuze yuko ata caha dufise, tuba twizimiza, ukuri ntikuba kuri muri twebwe.
Ni twatura ivyaha vyacu, ni yo yo kwizigirwa kandi igororoka, ivyo ni vyo bituma iduharira ivyaha vyacu, ikatwoza ukugabitanya kwose.
Tuvuze yuko ata caha twakoze, tuba tuyigize umubeshi, kandi n'ijambo ryayo riba ritari muri twebwe.
Bana banje bato, ndabandikiye ivyo kugira ngo ntimukore icaha. Kandi ni hagira umuntu akora icaha, dufise Umwitsa kuri Data wa twese, ni Yesu Kristo umugororotsi,
kandi uwo ni we ndishi y'ivyaha vyacu, mugabo si iyo ivyacu twenyene, ariko ni iyo ivyo abari mw'isi bose.
Iki ni co kitumenyesha ko tumuzi, ni twitondera ivyagezwe na we.
Uwuvuga ngo Ndamuzi, ntiyitondere ivyagezwe vyiwe, ni umubeshi, ukuri ntikuri muri we.
Ariko uwitondera ijambo ryiwe wese, ugukunda Imana kuba guhinguwe muri we vy'ukuri. Iki ni co kitumenyesha ko turi muri we;
uwuvuga ko ahora muri we, akwiye na we kugenda nk'uko uwo yagenda.
Abo nkunda, si icagezwe gishasha ndabandikiye, ariko ni icagezwe ca kera, mwamanye uhereye mu bihe vya kera. Ico cagezwe ca kera ni co rya jambo mwumvise.
Kandi ndabandikira icagezwe gishasha, kandi ico n'ico ukuri muri we no muri mwebwe. Kuko umwiza uriko urashira, umuco w'ukuri umaze kwaka.
Uwuvuga ko ari mu muco, akanka umuvukanyi wundi, aba akiri mu mwiza gushika n'ubu.
Uwukunda umuvukanyi wundi aguma mu muco, nta gitsitaza kiri muri we.
Ariko uwanka umuvukanyi wundi ari mu mwiza, kandi agendera mu mwiza, ntazi iyo aja, kuko umwiza wamuhumishije amaso.
Ndabandikiye bana bato, kuko mwahariwe ivyaha vyanyu kubwo izina ryiwe.
Ndabandikiye ba se, kuko mwamenye uwamyeho mu ntango. Ndabandikiye misore, kuko mwanesheje wa Mubi. Narabandikiye bana bato, kuko muzi Data wa twese.
Narabandikiye ba se, kuko muzi uwamyeho mu ntango. Narabandikiye misore, kuko mufise inkomezi, kandi ijambo ry'Imana rikaguma muri mwebwe, kandi mwanesheje wa Mubi.
Ntimugakunde isi, canke ibiri mw'isi. Umuntu ni yakunda isi, ugukunda Data wa twese ntikuzoba kuri muri we.
Kuko ikiri mw'isi cose ari ivyifuzo vy'umubiri, ivyifuzo vy'amaso n'ubwibone bw'ubu bugingo, bitanduruka kuri Data wa twese, ariko vyanduruka mw'isi.
Kandi isi iriko irashirana n'ivyifuzo vyayo, ariko uwukora ivyo Imana igomba yamaho ibihe bidashira.
Bana bato, ubu ni igihe c'iherezo; kandi nk'uko mwumvise yuko Antikristo azoza, n'ubu hamaze guseruka ba Antikristo benshi. Ni co gitumye tumenya ko ari igihe c'iherezo.
Bavuye muri twebwe, ariko ntibari abacu. Iyo baba bari abacu, baba baragumanye natwe; ariko icatumye batuvamwo kwari ukugira ngo bahinyuke bose ko atari abacu.
Namwe mwarobanujwe amavuta n'Uwera, kandi muzi vyose.
Sindabandikiye kuko mutazi ukuri, ariko ni uko mukuzi, kandi kuko ata binyoma biva mu kuri.
Umubeshi ni nde, atari uwuhakana ko Yesu ari Kristo? Ni we Antikristo, ahakana Data wa twese n'Umwana.
Umuntu wese ahakana Umwana, na Data wa twese ntamufise. Uwemera Umwana afise na Data wa twese.
Mweho ico mwumvise uhereye ku va mu ntango kigume muri mwebwe. Ico mwumvise uhereye mu bihe vya kera ni caguma muri mwebwe, namwe muzoguma mu Mwana no muri Se.
Iri ni ryo sezerano yadusezeraniye, n'ubugingo budashira.
Ivyo ni vyo ndabandikiye ku vy' abobazimiza.

Mweho ukurobanuzwa amavuta mwarobanujwe na we kuguma muri mwebwe, namwe ntimurinda kugira uwo kubigisha, ariko nk'uko ukwo kubarobanura kwiwe kubigisha vyose, kandi ari uko ukuri, atari ibinyoma, kandi nk'uko kwabigishije, ni ko muguma muri we.
Na none bana bato, mugume muri we, kugira ngo ni yahishurwa tuzoshire ubwoba, ntidutetererwe imbere yiwe aho azozira.
Ko muzi yuko uwo ari umugororotsi, murazi yuko uwukora ivyo ukugororoka wese yavyawe na we.
Murabe urukundo uko rungana Data wa twese yatugiriye, ko twitwa abana b'Imana; kandi ni ko turi. Ni co gituma ab'isi batatuzi, kuko batayimenye.
Abo nkunda, none turi abana b'Imana, ariko uko tuzomera ntikurahishurwa; ico tuzi, n'uko Yesu ni yahishurwa tuzosa na we, kuko tuzomuraba uko ari.
Kandi umuntu wese amuzigako ivyo, ariyeza, nk'uko uwo ari uwera.
Umuntu wese akora icaha akora ivyo ubugarariji; kandi icaha ni co mugararizo.
Kandi murazi yuko uwo yahishuwe kugira ngo akureho ivyaha, kandi ata caha kiri muri we.
Umuntu wese aguma muri we ntakora ivyaha; uwukora ivyaha wese ntiyamubonye kandi ntiyamumenye."
Bana bato, ntihakagire uwubazimiza. Uwukora ibigororotse ni we agororoka, nk'uko uwo agororoka.
Uwukora ivyaha ni uwa wa mugarariji, kuko uhereye mu ntango uwo mugarariji yamye akora ivyaha. Icatumye Umwana w'Imana ahishurwa ngiki; ni ukugira ngo asangangure ibikorwa vy'umwansi.
